apps.title: Fooducate: Nutrition Coach
apps.description:
Since 2010, Fooducate has been helping millions of people eat healthier, lose weight and improve their health.

• Recommended by doctors, dietitians, fitness trainers, and personal coaches 
• Apple's Best of the iPhone Health & Fitness category
• 1st prize - US Surgeon General Healthy App Challenge 
• Media praise: USAToday, NYTimes, Dr. Oz, Oprah, WSJ, ABC, FOX, etc.


THE BEST NUTRITION & HEALTH TRACKER
+ Log your food intake and exercise 
+ See the quality of calories
+ Count your macros: protein, fats, carbs
+ Analyze your sugar intake
+ Track your sleep, mood, and hunger levels
+ Enter your recipes and instamagically & see their nutritional value!
+ Seamlessly integrated with Apple Health

PERSONALIZE FOODUCATE
- set your desired weight loss rate
- keto diet coach
- low-carb advice & carb management
- lower your cholesterol, 
- discover foods for heart health
- eat to beat diabetes
- women's health (pregnancy, lactation,PCOS)
- dietary goals (non processed foods, vegetarian)
- avoid MSG, HFCS, GMOs and other ingredients
- low FODMAP diet
- Gluten free and other allergens
(Note: some personalization features require a premium account)

EAT FOR HEALTH!
Fooducate analyzes information found in product nutrition panels and ingredient lists. Scan to discover things manufacturers don't want you to notice:
- added sugars
- artificial sweeteners such as aspartame
- trans fats 
- high fructose corn syrup 
- MSG
- controversial food colorings 
- GMO - genetical modified organisms (premium feature) 
- additives and preservatives 
- and more... 

HUGE FOOD DATABASE
+ Scan hundreds of thousands of unique product barcodes 
+ Get a personalized nutrition grade (A, B, C, or D) for each food
+ Get suggestions for healthier foods based on what you scan

THE BEST DIET ADVICE
+ health & diet tips from nutrition professionals
+ weight loss suggestions
+ Motivation, love & support from the community

USER REVIEWS 
***** "I lost 55 pounds with this app!"
***** "Eating healthy is the easy way to lose weight. Thanks Fooducate!"
***** "I am learning so many helpful new things about healthy eating."
***** "Makes healthy food checking a breeze"
***** "Fooducate is undoubtedly the best weight loss coach I ever had."

Health App integration:
- import your exercise & sleep data from other apps and devices
- export your meal nutrition data - calories, carbs, and more

IN-APP PURCHASES:

* Pro
—> KETO & Low-carb diet
—> Diabetes, kidney disease, heart health, and more
—> Paleo, vegan, vegetarian diet
—> GMO warnings
—> Weekly health & diet tips
—> Priority support
—> No ads.
Subscription options: monthly auto-renew, annual auto-renew, one-time purchase

* Gluten & Allergies
—> Gluten-free diet
—> Uncover gluten and allergens in your food
—> Choose allergen free alternatives
—> Includes gluten, milk, lactose, soy, peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, sesame, and corn.
—> Priority support. 
Subscription options: monthly auto-renew, annual auto-renew, one-time purchase

* Diet Kickstart
one-time purchase 

* Pet Food 
one-time purchase

Notes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. When your subscription ends, you can still use the app, without premium features

---
Our terms of use: www.fooducate.com/terms 
Our privacy policy: www.fooducate.com/privacy
Our website: www.fooducate.com
Questions or feedback support@fooducate.com
Disclaimer: Nutrition info is based on the U.S. system - please use at your own discretion in other regions

raw_data.releaseNotes:
A new version of Fooducate is here! Here’s what’s new:

* Performance improvements and bug fixes

Thanks for using Fooducate! Have questions or feedback? Email us at support@fooducate.com for fast & friendly support.

apps.title: Blood Pressure Log, Heart Rate
apps.description:
With Heart Rate - Blood Pressure Log App you can effortlessly monitor, analyze, and share your data from your iOS device.

Easily take your heart rate by simply placing your finger on the camera, and keep track of your heart rate trends. Start today to make heart monitoring easier than ever and take charge of your wellbeing!

KEY BENEFITS

 • Heart Rate Measurement & Analysis - Gain detailed insights into your heart rate, allowing you to observe how it varies with different activities and emotions.
 • Blood Pressure Log - Record your systolic and diastolic blood pressure, along with your pulse (BPM).
 • Stress & Energy Tracking - Monitor your stress levels and energy throughout the day to support effective stress management and optimize your activities.
 • RMSSD & SDNN - Get a comprehensive view of your heart rate by analyzing the time between heartbeets.
 • Oxygen Level Log - Log your blood oxygen saturation to assess respiratory function and overall oxygen supply.
 • History - Review detailed history and statistics to keep tabs on your progress.
 • Sharing & Export - Quickly share or export your data as needed.
 • Daily Tracking Reminders - Stay consistent and proactive about your wellbeing with gentle daily reminders.

IMPORTANT NOTE

This app is not intended for medical use, nor to diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent any disease.
It is not classified as a medical device and is designed solely for general wellness and lifestyle insights.
This app does not directly measure blood pressure and requires an external blood pressure monitor.
Always seek professional medical advice for any health-related questions or decisions.

By using the app, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
 • Terms of Use: https://tou.bloodpressuremonitor.pro/
 • Privacy Policy: https://pp.bloodpressuremonitor.pro/

apps.title: Withings
apps.description:
Whatever your goal—weight loss, activity, blood pressure management, or better sleep—the Withings App is your gateway to health management, offering education, insights, and a seamless way to stay connected.

Built on clinical expertise, it unifies your health data to drive smarter decisions and lasting results.

YOUR HEALTH ECOSYSTEM, SEAMLESSLY CONNECTED
Easily install all your Withings devices and sync your data to bring your health universe together.

ALL YOUR HEALTH APPS UNIFIED 
Connect your health apps like Apple Health, Strava, MyFitnessPal, and more to centralize your data with ease.

TRUST MEDICAL-GRADE PRECISION, TO DRIVE PROGRESS
Clinical-grade accuracy delivers reliable insights that help you make confident, informed decisions about your health. 
• WEIGHT & BODY COMPOSITION MONITORING
• ACTIVITY MONITORING 
• SLEEP SCORE
• HYPERTENSION MANAGEMENT
• CARDIOVASCULAR DISEASE DETECTION
• MENSTRUAL CYCLE TRACKING 
• NUTRITION TRACKING "

SHAPE YOUR HEALTH JOURNEY 
Create a tailored health profile, monitor symptoms, and set achievable goals to better understand your body, stay motivated, and improve your health over time

MULTIPLE PROFILES TO TRACK FAMILY HEALTH
Track the health of your entire household from one app and easily share data between profiles for a more connected approach to care.

INSTANTLY SHARE WITH YOUR DOCTOR
Generate secure, shareable reports or send a live link to your health dashboard, giving your healthcare provider immediate access to your most up-to-date metrics.


Withings+ 

POWERING YOUR JOURNEY TO LONGEVITY 
Precision health made personal—AI and in-app cardiologists guiding you forward.
With Withings+, our premium subscription service, you decode your health through clinical reviews and AI assessments, delivering precise, tailored care to strengthen long-term habits and help support your journey toward a better, longer life.

YOUR HEALTH SIMPLIFIED
All metrics consolidated in one powerful Health Improvement Score to guide your long-term health.

SPECIALIST CARE AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Get your ECG reviewed by a cardiologist within 24 hours — with an average wait time of just 4 hours (Observed Jan–Mar 2025). Feel confident knowing your heart health is in expert hands, quickly and reliably.

DECODE YOUR BODY 
With Withings Intelligence, experience around-the-clock AI-driven insights, smart trend analysis, and personalized coaching to help you take control of your health.

Kickstart your day with our brand new Vitality Indicator.
This powerful tool brings together key health metrics—including HRV, temperature, sleep patterns, and more — to evaluate your rest and effort levels. Based on these insights, it offers personalized suggestions to help you boost your energy and optimize recovery for the days ahead. You’ll also receive a detailed breakdown that can highlight early signs of potential illness and signal when it’s time to give yourself extra care.

YOUR WEEKLY HEALTH BREAKDOWN
Track your strengths and weaknesses each week to refine and boost your Health Improvement Score.

EXCLUSIVE HEALTH CONTENT
Explore personalized tips, articles, recipes, and more—curated to support your health and wellness.

ABOUT WITHINGS
​​Withings creates clinically validated health devices embedded in beautifully designed, easy-to-use products. A universe of insights all synced to a single source of truth, providing you with the ultimate way to stay connected to your health.

Terms of use:https://www.withings.com/legal/applications-conditions#/legal/services-terms-and-conditions
Privacy policy: https://www.withings.com/legal/applications-conditions#/legal/privacy-policy
Medical compliance: https://www.withings.com/eu/en/compliance?srsltid=AfmBOoovZiYectAmYJC5gs2HhHrMxHAhPdN4NFQQI5RSImnQdrLoxKSc

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Withings App 8.0.1
This update resolves an issue where some users would get stuck on an unusually long loading screen, preventing the app from starting. We've also included various bug fixes and stability improvements for a smoother experience.

Withings App 8.0

This major release brings a redesigned health experience with new ways to understand and act on your data:

- Vitality Indicator

Optimize your recovery and boost your energy. From workouts to rest, the Vitality Indicator tracks your effort, recovery, and well-being, delivering real-time insights, personalized suggestions, and highlighting potential health signals when your body needs more attention.

- Cycle Tracking Update

A completely reworked cycle experience with smarter predictions based on Basal Body Temperature, tailored onboarding flows, and simplified data visualization adapted to your goals and life stage.

- Continuous Temperature Tracking

Track your temperature continuously, alongside sleep and activity, with clear indicators of what’s usual or elevated. A simple way to monitor health trends and detect early changes.

- Device Settings Improvements

The device settings screen has been fully revamped for clarity and easier navigation, with improved notifications and better visibility of device status.

Update now to discover these new features and get the most out of your Withings devices.

apps.title: Teladoc Health
apps.description:
Teladoc Health connects you with complete care, at your convenience and an affordable cost. You’ll find what you need to get well—like 24/7 care—alongside primary care, therapy and programs proven to keep you well.

EXPERIENCE AND EXCELLENCE
Teladoc Health has been modernizing healthcare since 2002. More than 50 million visits later, we are the leader in telemedicine. With our app, top-quality doctors and data-driven programs are just a tap away.

SEAMLESS CARE FOR ALL OF YOU
Our app brings together doctors, therapists, dietitians, nurses, coaches and self-guided programs that tend to every aspect of your well-being. If you need in-person care, we can refer you to in-network providers and care sites. But don’t underestimate us.

With a suite of connected devices, in-home lab services and prescription delivery (in some locations), we cover most common health needs. And with insurance, your copay for care could be as low as $0.

PERSONAL AND PERSONALIZED
Teladoc Health providers and coaches will get to know you. 

Plus, the app integrates with our devices and Apple Health to put data in your hands. Analyze it during appointments with your care team, or on your own on the go. Then apply what you learn about your health and your habits to find the right path to your goals. We’ll send you notifications and nudges to keep you on the right track.

OUR SERVICES INCLUDE:

24/7 CARE
On-demand appointments any time of day with board-certified physicians for:
- Colds and flu
- Pink eye
- Sore throats
- Sinus infections
- Rashes

PRIMARY CARE
Access within a week to board-certified primary care physicians and nurses who become your dedicated virtual care team for:
- Routine checkups and preventive care
- Goal-setting and a personalized care plan
- Lab orders (bloodwork)
- Checking blood pressure and other vitals
- Managing chronic conditions

CONDITION MANAGEMENT
Depending on your coverage, you may be eligible for:
- Programs to help manage conditions like diabetes and high blood pressure
- Connected devices like a blood glucose meter or blood pressure monitor
- Expert health coaching
- Health data, trends and actionable insights


MENTAL HEALTH
Licensed therapists, psychiatrists and self-guided content for help with:
- Anxiety and stress
- Depression or not feeling yourself
- Relationship conflicts
- Trauma


NUTRITION
Registered dietitians who can help with:
- Weight loss
- Diabetes
- High blood pressure
- Digestive issues
- Food allergies

DERMATOLOGY
Dermatologists who diagnose and treat common skin conditions, such as:
- Acne
- Psoriasis
- Eczema
- Rosacea
- Skin infections

Your coverage might also provide virtual access to:
- Specialist for an expert second option on surgery, a diagnosis or treatment plan
- Therapy and coaching to help with back and joint pain
- Imaging and sexual health testing referrals


CHECK YOUR COVERAGE
Sign up to see which telemedicine services are covered by your health insurance or employer.

SECURE AND CONFIDENTIAL
Teladoc Health takes your privacy seriously. Your health information is protected by federal and state laws, including HIPAA. Please see our Notice of Privacy Practices for more information on how Teladoc Health uses your health information.

AWARDS AND RECOGNITION
- Company of the Year—Healthcare Dive, 2020
- World’s Most Innovative Companies—Fast Company, 2021
- Largest Virtual Care Company—Forbes, 2020

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Two new features are here to help you stay on top of your health: 

Activity tracker: Connect Apple Health to view your activity, set goals and get insights. 
Next steps: Right on your home screen, find up to 3 important things to do for your health. They’re personalized based on how you’re using the app. 

Plus, the app should run more smoothly thanks to bug fixes and other updates.

apps.title: Corewell Health App
apps.description:
At Corewell Health, we are making your experience better by making it easier. Introducing the Corewell Health App, bringing care to your fingertips whenever and wherever you need it.  
  
What Can You Expect from the Corewell Health App?  
  
Take Control of Your Health Journey with MyChart: Access your health records at your fingertips. Quickly retrieve medical information, seamlessly view health data from other institutions, request prescription refills, view any health test results, and effortlessly communicate with your healthcare provider.  
  
On-Demand Video Visits: Experience healthcare on your terms. Connect with Corewell Health providers within minutes through video visits, addressing a diverse range of health concerns, all from wherever you are.    
  
Seamless Scheduling: Effortlessly schedule, reschedule, or cancel video or in-person appointments with our diverse network of 1000+ providers across primary and specialty care.  
  
Streamlined Experience: Your time matters. Navigate our user-friendly interface to make the most of your precious moments. Utilize features including eCopay, Fast Pass and eCheckin, designed to streamline your experience so you can focus on what truly matters. You can also message your provider and/or a billing specialist directly from the app.   
  
Constant Innovation: The Corewell Health app is always thinking ahead. It evolves to anticipate and cater to present and future needs. Stay prepared with our expanding capabilities, rolling out throughout the year. Integrate your Apple Health Kit account, so your personal health device data can be added to your Corewell Health MyChart.   
  
Safety and Security: Your privacy is our commitment. Safeguarding your personal health information is our top priority. The Corewell Health app adheres to HIPPAA compliance standards and fortified with multiple layers of security, ensuring your data’s safety both online and offline.   
  
Ready to experience the future of healthcare with Corewell Health? Visit CorewellHealth.org/app to explore more and experience healthcare designed around you.

apps.title: My Highmark App
apps.description:
Easily manage your health - and health coverage. All in My Highmark.

Simplify your benefits
Easily check your health plan benefits and see what’s covered, all in one place.

Get expert care when you need it
Whenever you need support, find all your virtual care programs and services together in one place.

Personalize your app experience
Build your Health Profile to get curated recommendations for the goals that matter most to you.

Get new recommendations every day
Check your Journey daily to see a new mix of activities, content, and support personalized just for you.

Connect Devices
Hook up Apple Health and your connected wearables so that you can automatically track your progress, sync health info, and get extra motivation to hit your goals.
 
The App is intended for Highmark’s Blue Shield members in 21 counties in central Pennsylvania and 13 counties in northeastern New York, and Highmark’s Blue Cross Blue Shield members in 29 counties of western Pennsylvania, 13 counties of northeastern Pennsylvania, the state of Delaware, the state of West Virginia plus Washington County, Ohio and 8 counties in western New York.  All references to “Highmark” are references to Highmark Inc., and/or to one or more of its affiliated Blue companies, which are independent licensees of the Blue Cross Blue Shield Association.

apps.title: Sharecare: Health & Well-being
apps.description:
Improve your health and lower your RealAge with Sharecare. Whether you’re looking to sleep better, lose weight, reduce stress or find a new doctor, we’re here to help. We recommend simple, personalized actions you can do every day to improve your well-being — and remind you to do them. From step tracking to vital signs, we store all of your health information in one secure, easy-to-use app. 

LEARN HEALTHY HABITS 
• Take the RealAge test to learn your body’s actual age compared to your calendar age
• Keep track of your daily health and wellness goals, including weight, sleep, stress, activity levels, fitness, diet and blood pressure
• Watch your progress toward lowering your RealAge directly from your phone or by connecting Apple’s Health app

MANAGE YOUR HEALTH IN ONE PLACE
• Store and access all your health information, including key biometrics, vital signs, immunizations, lab results, medications and list of medical conditions and past procedures
• Upload your health and vision insurance card for easy access for you and your family members 
• 100% secure without the hassle; Set a security PIN to stay signed in while maintaining your privacy

GET TIPS AND INSIGHTS 
• Check out personalized health and wellness tips on what you can do to live younger based on your RealAge, interests and activities 
• See daily insights based upon your progress and learn the impact on your overall health
• Follow health topics that interest you from our health and wellness experts

QUICKLY GET THE CARE YOU NEED
• Identify what could be causing your symptoms and have a better doctor’s visit with a sharable summary of your results
• Find a doctor in your area who specializes in your symptoms or conditions.

CONNECT YOUR EMPLOYER AND/OR HEALTH PLAN
• If your employer or health insurance plan is part of Sharecare, you also can find information about health screenings, open enrollment deadlines and exclusive programs to help you manage your health

See what people are saying about Sharecare -
“This app has everything you need health wise. It tracks everything, including steps, and has information on almost every topic you could think of… Oh and the RealAge is super cool. It gives you customized tips and health advice.” – Sharecare App User

“I’m always looking for apps that combine information or daily tasks into a streamlined experience. This app does that big time for all things related to health & wellness! “RealAge” is such a great motivator to make small improvements every day. Can’t wait to get my RealAge under 40!” – Sharecare App User

apps.title: WHOOP
apps.description:
WHOOP is the leading wearable that turns comprehensive health insights into daily action. By capturing dozens of data points every second, WHOOP delivers personalized Sleep, Strain, Recovery, Stress, and health insights—24/7. WHOOP uses those insights to provide coaching based on your body’s unique physiology and recommends everything from when to go to bed to new daily behaviors that will help you reach your goals.

If you’re new to WHOOP, you can try both the wearable and app free for 1 month. Terms and conditions apply.

WHOOP is screenless, so all your data lives in the WHOOP app—for a distraction-free focus on your health. The WHOOP app requires a WHOOP wearable.

How it works:

Healthspan*: A powerful way to quantify your age and slow your Pace of Aging. Backed by leading longevity research, it pinpoints the daily habits that impact your long-term health.

Sleep: WHOOP helps you understand how well you sleep each night by measuring your Sleep Performance. Every morning, WHOOP provides a Sleep score from 0 to 100%. Sleep Planner calculates how much sleep you need to recover, tailored to your habits, schedule, and goals. You can even set a Haptic Alarm that wakes when you're fully rested, or at a specific time, with gentle vibration. Quality sleep is essential for improving your healthspan, metabolic mental resilience, recovery, and performance.

Recovery: WHOOP lets you know how ready you are to perform by measuring your heart rate variability, resting heart rate, sleep, and respiratory rate. You'll get a daily Recovery score on a scale of 1 to 99%. When you're in the green, you're ready for strain, when you're in the yellow or red, you may want to evaluate your training program.

Strain: WHOOP does more than just track your activity–it measures cardiovascular and muscular exertion to give you the most comprehensive view of the demands you put on your body. Each day, Strain Target will provide a Strain score from 0 to 21 and recommend your optimal target exertion range based on your Recovery score.

Stress: WHOOP gives you daily insights to pinpoint your stressors, understand your physiological response, and discover techniques to help manage. Get a real-time stress score from 0-3 and, based on your score, choose a breathwork session to enhance your alertness or increase relaxation.

Behaviors: WHOOP tracks over 160+ daily habits and behaviors—like alcohol intake, medication, and more—to better understand how these behaviors impact your body. WHOOP provides weekly guidance for behavior change and helps set accountability goals with the Journal and Weekly Plan features.

WHOOP Coach: Ask questions about your health & fitness and get highly personalized, on-demand answers. Using your unique biometric data, the latest performance science, and generative AI, WHOOP Coach generates responses on everything from training plans to why you’re feeling tired.

Menstrual Cycle Insights: Go beyond period tracking to better understand your fifth vital sign and get tailored cycle-based insights.

What else you can do in the WHOOP app:

• Dig into the details: See heart rate zones, VO₂ Max, steps, and more trends over time to adjust your behaviors, training, sleep and more based on your goals.

• Join a team: Stay motivated and accountable by joining a team. Chat directly with your teammates in the app, or as a coach, see how your team's training is going.

• Apple Health: WHOOP integrates with Apple's Health app to sync activities and personalize your experience.

WHOOP provides products and services designed for general fitness and wellness purposes. WHOOP products and services are not medical devices, not intended to treat or diagnose any disease, and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content available through WHOOP products and services is for general informational purposes only.

Discover the future of health and performance.

*Some availability restrictions apply.

apps.title: Ro: Online Healthcare
apps.description:
Welcome to Ro. Healthcare designed to help you feel your best and achieve your goals. 

On Ro, you can connect with Ro-affiliated, US-licensed healthcare professionals, 100% online. Get world-class treatment options and products for weight management, sexual health, fertility, skincare, and more. Ro offers a flexible range of options so you can improve your health with expert care that fits your lifestyle. 

HOW TO GET STARTED: Create your account on Ro.co first, then log into the app.

The Ro app puts you in control of your care. 

- Reliable, convenient, and discreet care—all in one place
- Access to GLP-1s and Sparks (only available on Ro)
- Quality customer care
- Curated content and support through your care journey
- Real-time order tracking
- Regular treatment updates
- Free GLP-1 Insurance Checker to see if you're covered

apps.title: Ivim Health
apps.description:
Ivim is integrative health. Start and manage your programs, check in and stay on track, celebrate milestones with direct access to your care team. Learn something new and chat daily with friends and other members on their care journey. 

Start your personalized health plan 
Build a program tailored to your body and goals. Get science-backed support with provider care, expert coaching, and proven results. 

Stay on track with daily check-ins 
Log your weight, steps, water, sleep, and medication — all in one place. Get custom reminders and see your progress in real time. 

Follow a functional nutrition plan 
Simplify your meals with personalized planning. Use our built-in meal builder, recipes, and grocery list to stay on track effortlessly. 

Manage your program and meds with ease 
View prescriptions, check dosage info, track shipments, and update your plan — anytime, right from the app. 

Get direct access to your care team 
Ask questions, get advice, or update your provider. Our built-in chat connects you with licensed clinicians and coaches who know your journey. 

Learn something new every day 
Explore expert videos, FAQs, patient stories, and health tips personalized to your care path — from GLP-1 to HRT and beyond. 

Join a supportive wellness community 
Exclusive to members: get inspired by others on their journey and share your own wins in our private group. 

Connect Apple Health & your devices 
Sync your wearable data for even smarter tracking of steps, sleep, heart rate, and more. 

*This app uses Apple Health to share health data with your provider and personalize your experience. This is an optional feature.

Get direct access to your care team 
Ask questions, get advice, or update your provider. Our built-in chat connects you with licensed clinicians and coaches who know your journey. 

Learn something new every day 
Explore expert videos, FAQs, patient stories, and health tips personalized to your care path — from GLP-1 to HRT and beyond. 

Join a supportive wellness community 
Exclusive to members: get inspired by others on their journey and share your own wins in our private group. 

Connect Apple Health & your devices 
Sync your wearable data for even smarter tracking of steps, sleep, heart rate, and more. 

*This app uses Apple Health to share health data with your provider and personalize your experience. This is an optional feature.

apps.title: Included Health
apps.description:
Included Health is a healthcare benefit provided by employers to help members track healthcare spending, find a high-quality doctor, get 24/7 health advice, and more. We’re not an insurance company, but a team of healthcare experts available over the phone, in the app, or online.

Why use Included Health?

It’s free to activate. – You don’t have to pay a cent to access your benefits because your employer has already footed the bill. 

Primary, urgent and mental health care – See a board-certified doctor, licensed psychiatrist, or therapist in person or virtually with best-in-class care available 24/7.

Unbiased insurance and claims support – For billing issues, we work directly with your insurance to resolve problems for you.

Experts opinions from leading specialists – With access to 4,000 of the nation’s leading specialists, get the best doctor in the country to review your current care.

Experts available around-the-clock – With an on-call care team answering any healthcare questions, you get treated the way you deserve without having to wait on hold for answers.

Welcoming care for every community – We ensure every member from every community has access to high-quality care that’s safe, welcoming, and inclusive.

How It Works:

Download the app.
Enter your employer information.
Get access to amazing benefits offered at no cost to you.

Common healthcare needs Included Health supports
- Insurance and benefits questions
- Access to in-network, high-quality care
- Expert second opinions from leading specialists
- Support for chronic conditions
- Advocating for the healthcare needs of Black and LGBTQ+ patients
- Deductible, healthcare spending, and claims tracking
- Mental health support
- Prescription refills & lab orders via virtual care

Frequently Asked Questions
Who has access to Included Health?
Included Health is available to members and their covered dependents enrolled in an employer-sponsored benefits plan that includes coverage of Included Health. Top employers, including one third of the Fortune 100, provide this service so that employees have access to the best medical care possible. 

When is Included Health available to help?
While availability depends on your specific package, for millions of members, our team is available 24/7, 365 days a year, including weekends and holidays. 

Who are the doctors and specialists Included Health offers access to?
Included Health contracts with experts based on many indicators of quality, including their education and training, patient outcomes, and institutional affiliation. As a result, we’re able to match you with highly experienced doctors and specialists who are best suited to your personal preferences and medical needs. 

What can your virtual care providers treat? 
Our urgent care doctors can treat hundreds of issues, including cold and flu, urinary tract infections, allergies, headache, sprains, and skin conditions. They can also order labs and screenings to help with preventative care and help manage chronic care conditions. 

Is Included Health my insurance?
We’re not your insurance. We’re a health benefit offered by employers that works directly with your insurance on your behalf. So, instead of having to resolve claims issues on your own, we do the hard work for you. We have built extensive experience working with major insurance companies and can get claims processed and questions answered accurately.

*Not all benefits described above are available to all Included Health members. Services vary depending on your employer benefits package. 

Your Privacy is Our Priority
We adhere to strict HIPAA guidelines to protect your health data and personal information.

Our providers are unable to prescribe controlled substances. 

Get Started Today
Join millions of members who use Included Health to get healthcare designed to treat you better. Download the app now to activate for free!

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve made improvements to the app’s performance, stability, and user experience. This includes enhancements to our home page, messaging, and open enrollment capabilities. If you have any feedback or experience any issues, please reach out to member-services@includedhealth.com.

apps.title: Hello Heart • For heart health
apps.description:
Provided by participating employers and health plans, Hello Heart is a FREE easy-to-use app that empowers you to improve your blood pressure and cholesterol with simple tracking, personalized  insights, and daily tips and reminders. 

Check if your organization offers Hello Heart at https://join.helloheart.com

More than 50% of people with high blood pressure lower it within 2 weeks of joining Hello Heart.

==How it works==
Track Your Heart Health

•Blood pressure
•Pulse and potential irregular heartbeat
•Lab results (e.g. cholesterol)
•Activity
•Medications
•Weight

Our FDA-cleared monitor connects with your phone via Bluetooth so you can track and see your blood pressure and heart rate readings right in the Hello Heart app. Easily import your cholesterol test results from your clinic and sync your Apple Health data, too.

Understand Your Numbers
Find out what high, low, or normal blood pressure may mean for your health.

Manage Heart Disease Risks
Tracking your blood pressure and cholesterol regularly can help you reduce your risk of developing chronic conditions like heart disease or even the event of a heart attack. 

Get Personalized Health Tips
Heart health doesn’t have to be hard. We think small lifestyle changes are the way to go. And we’ll show you how with a heart healthy tip each time you log in.

Protect Your Data
We’re committed to complying with HIPAA and adopt strict security standards to safeguard your data.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've fixed some bugs under the hood to make Hello Heart smoother and better.

apps.title: Carby Health
apps.description:
Great healthcare should be easy and accessible for everyone. That's why Carbon Health helps you get care that doesn't end when you leave the clinic. Our easy-to-use app allows you to book appointments, message your provider, view your health history, and manage your prescriptions — all in one place.
 
With Carbon Health’s mobile app, you can:
 
- Book a virtual or in-person appointment that fits your schedule 
- Get care for your body and mind, whether it's urgent or preventive
- Find a provider that prioritizes you
- Message your care team
- View medical records — including lab results, prescriptions, care plans, X-rays, and more!
- Follow through on your care plan with personalized, easy-to-complete tasks
- Reference upcoming milestones like booking an in-clinic follow up appointment through our health checklists
- Participate in personalized chronic condition programs, including diabetes management (and soon hypertension and asthma)
- Get provider recommendations based on your connected-device health data, including continuous glucose monitoring

To access your medical information, you will need to be a patient of Carbon Health. Join today at https://carbonhealth.com/.

Some of the benefits we offer:
- No membership fees
- Coverage through most insurance plans 
- Telemedicine across the United States
- Timely appointments for COVID-19 antibody and travel testing
 
Have feedback or need help? Select Contact Support within the app.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
At Carbon Health, we’re constantly working to build the best healthcare experience for our patients.

We’ve: 
- Addressed minor bugs and made improvements.

If you love Carbon Health, please leave us a review!

For feedback or support related inquiries, email support@carbonhealth.com

apps.title: Oura
apps.description:
Meet Oura Ring - the revolutionary smart ring that translates your body’s most meaningful messages to transform how you feel every day. 

The award-winning Oura App is your personal health companion, delivering valuable insights and daily recommendations to help you to make health and wellness a daily practice. 

THREE DAILY SCORES
Your Sleep, Activity, and Readiness scores give you a clear understanding of the state of your body with actionable guidance on how to stay balanced.

ACCURATE BY DESIGN
Your finger provides the most accurate reading for over 30 biometrics like heart rate, body temperature, blood oxygen, and more.

BEST-IN-CLASS SLEEP MONITORING
Wake up to in-depth analysis of your sleep patterns and personalized tips to optimize your routine, so you’ll feel more energized every day.

ADVANCED ACTIVITY TRACKING
From mountain climbing to meditating, Oura Ring tracks your daily movement while prioritizing balance and rest. Measure your daily activities, calories, steps, and inactive time.

CYCLE INSIGHTS
Better understand your body’s cycle patterns or help improve your chances of getting pregnant by tracking daily and monthly body temperature trends.

STRESS RESILIENCE
Understand how daily stress is affecting your body and learn how to be more resilient to stress by finding balance between moments of strain and recovery.

RECOVERY 
Get personalized insights and guidance on how rest and recovery affects your overall Readiness Score. Feeling under the weather? Activate Rest Mode to give yourself a break.

ILLNESS DETECTION
Oura Ring monitors shifts in your body temperature and heart rate so you can tell when you may be getting sick.

LONG-TERM TRENDS
View your daily, weekly, and monthly trends, and discover how your choices and environment affect your body.

TRACK HABITS WITH TAGS
Customize your experience and test out new habits by adding tags — like "caffeine" or "alcohol" — and discover how your choices affect your sleep and recovery.

Oura Ring is not a medical device and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, monitor, or prevent medical conditions or illnesses. Oura Ring is only designed for general fitness and wellness purposes. Please do not make any changes to your medication, daily routines, nutrition, sleep schedule, or workouts without first consulting your doctor or another medical professional.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We're continuously working to delight you with innovations and improve your experience by fixing bugs.

apps.title: Well Digital
apps.description:
Well is your personalized daily health partner.

With Well, you’re treated like a name instead of a number. Well works to understand you, then suggests the next step fit for you — while rewarding you every step of the way. Get your first bonus just for signing up.

With Well, you are…

- WELL known: We get you. Answer just a few questions and we’ll share the next thing you can do for your health. Personalized multi-day health journeys and “look ahead” suggestions, designed by our experts and suggested by Well’s advanced health engine. Well knows your next healthy step even before you do.

- WELL rewarded: Healthy is job one. So why not get paid to do it? Earn hundreds in rewards by taking simple, healthy steps. Celebrate the small wins, because they add up over time. And when you’re ready to cash in on your good work, choose gift cards from a wide variety of your favorite brands.

- WELL empowered: It’s easier to take that next step when you know the facts. Build confidence and momentum in your health journey with do-able tips that fit into your regular day and help move you towards your goals. With someone in your corner, you can get started on that new health routine.

- WELL guided: Every now and then, we all need a little human guidance. Need help understanding bills and coverage, healthcare navigation guidance, and finding and scheduling a local provider? You’ll be happy to know our Well Guide team does it live and on-demand. Does that sound like typical healthcare to you? 

Well also integrates with the Apple Health app! This means your suggested health tips can be personalized to any real-time data you may store in Apple Health. (If you want to integrate, you can opt-in through your settings within the Well app.)

What others are saying about Well:

- “It's not just about losing weight, getting exercise, or lowering blood pressure. It's about all of that. It’s about your overall health.” — Kim W.

- “Thank you so much for finding them (a urologist) for me! I’ll be able to stay within the group for all of my needs…Thank you again for your help!” — Pablo L.

- “I love the emphasis on mental health in the workplace, because for a very long time, all I did was work.” —  Hannah L.

- “Well is by far my favorite app on my phone.” — Mark D.

Learn more about us at well.co

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and improvements!

apps.title: 98point6 by Transcarent
apps.description:
98point6 by Transcarent provides on-demand consultation, diagnosis and treatment from board-certified clinicians and sends necessary prescriptions to your pharmacy—all via secure, in-app messaging. Our unique, text-based care delivery means you can get care conveniently, when and where you need it. No appointments, no travel. We're available nationwide, 24/7, 365 days a year. 
 

WHO IS TRANSCARENT? 
Transcarent is a health and care experience company that makes it easy for people to access high-quality, affordable health and care. The 98point6 by Transcarent app provides access to Transcarent’s on-demand virtual care clinic. 
 
HOW MUCH DOES IT COST? 
Some employers and health plans provide access to 98point6 by Transcarent at no charge and offer visits at low/no cost to eligible members and their dependents ages 1+. To see if you're eligible, please check with your health plan or employer. 
Please note, the account holder must be 18+ to create an account and seek primary care; 19+ in Nebraska. 
 

WHO ARE YOUR DOCTORS? 
Our on-demand virtual clinic is staffed by carefully selected providers and board-certified physicians who are passionate about making care more accessible. Transcarent Clinic providers are specially trained to treat and diagnose via text-based care. (The 98point6 by Transcarent app supports photo, video and audio as needed.) 
 

WHAT CAN YOU TREAT? 
Our care team, including board-certified clinicians, are available on-demand to diagnose and treat, answer questions, offer peace of mind and when appropriate, guide you toward options for next steps.  
 

Common conditions we can treat or advise on include: 
Cold, cough and flu 
Urinary tract infections (UTI) 
Acid reflux, heartburn and digestive issues 
Diagnosis and treatment via medications for anxiety and depression 
Skin conditions, rashes, bites and sunburn 
Nausea, stomach flu and gastroenteritis 
General health questions 
Activity and fitness 
Nutrition and weight management 
Weight Health support and step counter for tracking physical activity 
Stress management, relaxation, mental acuity 
Diseases and conditions management 
Clinical Decision Support 
Disease prevention and public health 
Healthcare services and management 
Mental and behavioral health 
Medical reference and education 
Medication and treatment management 
Physical therapy and rehabilitation 
Reproductive and sexual health 
...and more 
 

WHAT IS YOUR PRESCRIPTION POLICY? 
Our doctors can prescribe a wide variety of medications. However, we do not prescribe controlled substances (such as Percocet), muscle relaxants (such as Flexeril), lifestyle medications (such as Viagra or Propecia), weight loss medications (Ozempic or Wegovy) or medications that require strict monitoring. Our physicians adhere to evidence-based standards with respect to the responsible use of antibiotics. If we are unable to prescribe a medication, it's likely due to a combination of factors, including state and federal regulations related to virtual care practices, as well as what's in the best interest of patient safety and well-being. 
 

Note: 98point6 by Transcarent is not intended for medical emergencies. If you are experiencing a medical emergency, call 911 or immediately go to the nearest emergency room.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Transcarent is a new, different, and better health and care experience that puts you back in charge of your health and care – in as little as 60 seconds, 24/7, from the palm of your hand. This release includes some enhancements, bug fixes and performance improvements.

apps.title: Health Optimizer by CVS Health
apps.description:
Make managing your health condition easier with added support. With the Health Optimizer™ app, you get tips and advice along your health journey when you need them. It fits easily into your daily life. It’s simple to use and secure.

Health Optimizer can help make living with your health condition easier with:

•	Syncing your medications, nutrition, activity, devices, and health data such as data from Apple Health®
•	Healthy recipes and meal plan options
•	Tailored digital coaching to help you take control of your health
•	Access to your program care team via secure chat 
•	Resources you can trust to learn about your health 

Health Optimizer is not intended to replace the care provided by a licensed healthcare professional, including prescriptions, diagnosis, or treatment. Seek the guidance of a licensed healthcare professional before making medical decisions.

The privacy and security of your personal information is very important to us. We protect it in accordance with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act.

Manufactured by Welldoc, Inc. Distributed by CVS Pharmacy, Inc. and/or one of its affiliates. Health Optimizer is intended for visitors from the United States.

apps.title: UnitedHealthcare
apps.description:
It’s easy to make the most of your United Healthcare benefits and access care on-the-go with the UnitedHealthcare app†. Just sign in or create an account for secure, convenient access to your health plan.  
 
Check your benefits: 
 - See what your plan covers, including copays and out-of-pocket expenses.  
 - Track your deductible and out-of-pocket max. 
 - Follow new claims from start to finish and review old claims too.  
 - Check your health reimbursement, flexible spending, and Optum Bank HSA balances. 
 - † Pay your claims using Optum Bank HSA balances 
 
Find & price care:  
 - Search doctors, specialists, hospitals, and clinics in-network and near you 
 - † Access virtual primary care and start a virtual urgent care visit, 24/7

apps.title: UPMC Health Plan
apps.description:
This mobile app is for UPMC Health Plan insurance members only. Not a member? Learn more at www.upmchealthplan.com.

The UPMC Health Plan mobile app puts your health insurance information in the palm of your hand. It offers convenient, on-the-go access to your health insurance benefits and wellness plans. Whether you need to chat with a Health Care Concierge about a benefit related question or forgot your member ID card for your doctor’s visit, this app has you covered.

ACCESS INSURANCE BENEFITS 
- View member ID cards for you and your family, and email them to your provider directly from the app.
- Review current coverage and benefits for you and your family.
- Use live chat and secure messaging to connect with a Health Care Concierge.
- Check the status of your recent claims and review your claim details.

FIND CARE IN YOUR NETWORK
- Easily search for in-network providers and hospitals.
- Browse medical, dental, vision, and behavioral health providers and facilities.
- Filter results by proximity, view directions, and tap to call a provider or facility. 

WELLNESS CONNECTIONS
- Live chat with a health coach to set lifestyle goals or stay motivated.
- Track your steps with Apple Health app integration and check your Take a Healthy Step progress.
- Take the MyHealth Questionnaire to learn about your health, understand how to reduce your risks, and spend less on care.

apps.title: Dashboard for Apple Health App
apps.description:
Your fitness and health dashboard, designed and based on Apple Health app (a.k.a. HealthKit) on iPhone / iOS.

Featured on Superphen:
http://superphen.co/2015/09/19/review-health-dashboard-for-apple-health-app/

- Designed for Apple Health app, more ways to view and interact with your data
- Separates data from your iPhone vs from wristbands (Fitbit, Jawbone, etc)
- Monitor your achievements in percentages, helps you reach your fitness goals
- Shows data in Daily, Weekly, Monthly, for maximum date range
- Change units (km/mi)
- Choose your own theme color
- Shows steps and distances
- Shows flights climbed
- Shows heart rate
- Shows sleep, calorie, Nike Fuel data
- Shows weight, BMI, body fat percentage, lean body mass

HealthKit integration:
Health Dash reads your personal health data from Apple HealthKit. Data is displayed to you for your convenience; we don’t send it to our server, don’t send it to any 3rd party, and will never use it for advertisement purposes.

- Steps
- Walking and Running Distance
- Heart Rate
- Sleep
- Weight
- Flights Climbed
- Cycling Distance
- Active Calories
- Body Mass Index
- Body Fat Percentage
- Lean Body Mass
- NikeFuel

• You can subscribe for Health Dash Pro inside the app; subscriptions are billed monthly or annual at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
• Alternatively a one-time payment plan is available (this is not a subscription).
• Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
• To manage your subscriptions or turn off auto-renewal:
  - Go to Settings > iTunes & App Store
  - Tap your Apple ID at the top of the screen
  - Tap View Apple ID. You might need to sign in or use Touch ID.
  - Tap Subscriptions.
  - Tap the subscription you want to manage.
  - Use the options to manage your subscription.
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.
We take the securities of our customers very seriously.
Read our Terms of Service at
https://dashboard-for-apple.flycricket.io/terms.html
and our Privacy Policy at
https://dashboard-for-apple.flycricket.io/privacy.html

Acknowledgements:
- Scale Created by Rohan Gupta from the Noun Projects
- Checkmark Created by Arthur Shlain from the Noun Projects
- Fire Created by SuperAtic LABS from the Noun Projects
- Fire Created by Eugen Belyakoff from the Noun Projects
- Moon Created by P.J. Odor from the Noun Projects

apps.title: MyOchsner
apps.description:
MyOchsner gives you quick and easy access to the most important tools, resources, and information you need to live your happiest, healthiest life. Wherever you are, MyOchsner is here for you and those you care about — putting the full power of Ochsner Health into the palm of your hand.


PATIENT PORTAL
• Pre-register for your appointments through ePre-check
• Message your care team
• View upcoming visits, tests, and procedures
• Manage your prescriptions
• Review lab test results
• Read your After-Visit Summary
• Access health information for yourself and your family, including medical history, allergies, and immunizations
• Upload health and fitness data, including data from the Apple Health app, when enrolled in self-tracking programs



FIND CARE
• Schedule and manage appointments
• Choose the right care for you — online, by phone, or in-person
• Locate urgent care facilities
• Find a doctor
• Get advice through Ochsner On-Call (24-hour nurse line)
• Explore clinical trials


VISIT OCHSNER
• Locate medical centers, pharmacies, and vision centers near you
• Get directions, explore campus maps and find parking
• Look up visiting hours for regular and specialized care rooms
• Find guides to on-site gift shops, coffee stands, cafes, and vending machines
• Book a room at the Brent House or Alder Hotel



BE WELL 
• Find everything you need to be well, including fitness, nutrition, and sleep support
• Access nutrition tips, health info. and advice from our medical experts on the To Your Health Blog
• Learn about smoking cessation services



PRODUCTS AND PRESCRIPTIONS
• Find pharmacies and vision centers
• Shop home medical supplies
• Access one-on-one personalized care through Digital Medicine and Concierge Health
• Get matched with Ochsner digital products at our O Bar
• Stay connected with your loved ones through Connected Living



BILLING AND FINANCIAL SERVICES
• Explore estimates and pay your bill
• Find answers to all your billing questions



HELP AND SUPPORT
• Ask a question via our live chat: Ask Ochsner


Getting started is easy.
1.  Download the app.
2.  Explore — most healthcare resources are available to you without needing to log in!
3.  To access your Patient Portal, sign in with your MyOchsner account or create an account in the app.

apps.title: MyDrAI - AI Health Doctor Chat
apps.description:
MyDrAI - Your Personal AI Health Assistant

Get instant access to AI-powered medical advice and health insights with MyDrAI, the revolutionary health app that puts expert medical guidance in your pocket.

 MEET YOUR AI DOCTORS: 
• Dr. Mia - General Medicine
• Dr. Aaron - Cardiology
• Dr. Grace - Mental Health
• Dr. Ethan - Nutrition
• Dr. Leo - Fitness
• Dr. Aisha - Women's Health

 PERFECT FOR:
• Health-conscious individuals
• People seeking medical advice
• Wellness enthusiasts
• Fitness trackers
• Anyone wanting AI health guidance
• Remote health monitoring
• Preventive healthcare

MEDICAL CITATIONS & SOURCES:
All medical information provided includes proper citations from verified, peer-reviewed sources including:
• American Heart Association (AHA) - 2023 Chronic Coronary Disease Guidelines
• National Health Service (NHS) - UK Government Health Guidelines
• U.S. Department of Health and Human Services - Physical Activity Guidelines
• U.S. Department of Agriculture - Dietary Guidelines for Americans 2020-2025
• World Health Organization (WHO) - Mental Health and COVID-19 Research
• Mayo Clinic - Evidence-based Pregnancy and Nutrition Guidelines
• National Institute on Aging (NIH) - Exercise and Physical Activity Research
• American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists (ACOG) - Clinical Practice Bulletins
• Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) - COVID-19 and Public Health Guidelines
• Annual Review of Public Health - Sleep Health Research
• Journal of Health Psychology - Stress and Health Studies

 KEY FEATURES:
• Chat with 6 specialized AI doctors (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• Voice conversations with medical experts (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• Personalized health tracking (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• Daily wellness habits monitoring (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• AI-powered health insights (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• 24/7 medical consultation (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• Privacy-focused conversations (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• Health score tracking (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• Achievement system (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)
• Personalized notifications (PREMIUM FEATURE - Requires Subscription)


 SUBSCRIPTION PLANS:
• Weekly Plan: $4.99/week
• Monthly Plan: $16.99/month
• All premium features require active subscription
• Cancel anytime through App Store settings


PRIVACY & SECURITY:
Your health conversations are completely private and secure. We use advanced encryption to protect your personal health data.

 IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER:
This app provides general health information and should not replace professional medical advice. Always consult with qualified healthcare professionals for medical diagnosis and treatment. In case of medical emergency, contact emergency 

HEALTH TRACKING:
• Monitor daily habits
• Track health scores
• Set wellness goals
• Get personalized insights
• Achievement rewards

 AI DOCTOR CHAT:
• Natural conversations
• Voice input support
• Instant responses
• Specialized medical advice
• 24/7 availability

Download MyDrAI today and experience the future of AI-powered healthcare. Get personalized medical advice, track your health, and chat with AI doctors whenever you need guidance.

apps.title: Lark Health
apps.description:
Health looks different for everyone, which is why Lark offers unique programs designed to target your individual health goals. Whether you want to build healthy habits to lose weight, get help preventing or managing diabetes, lower your blood pressure, or just feel your best, Lark has a program for you. Every Lark program includes 24/7 digital health coaching from your smartphone or tablet, a smart scale, the Lark health app with food and activity trackers, helpful tips and resources, and other program-specific devices. 

The best part? If you qualify, you can join Lark at no extra cost to you with eligible insurance! 

The Lark coach can help you:
- Create healthy eating habits
- Move more and feel stronger
- Reach and maintain a healthy weight
- Learn how to manage common GLP-1 medication side effects 
- Plan meals and create grocery lists
- Build healthy habits to prevent and manage chronic conditions like diabetes and hypertension
- Improve your sleep and manage stress
- Connect with other Lark members just like you! 

FOOD COACHING
Food coaching with Lark’s Coach+ technology provides real-time, tailored healthy eating advice that’s generated based on your specific questions and responses.  Whether you want feedback on a recent meal, help planning an upcoming meal, or a personalized grocery list, your digital coach is ready to help.

TRACK ALL OF YOUR HEALTH DATA
Display everything in one place: Weight readings, daily activity levels, sleep, stress, meals and key ingredients, blood sugar, blood pressure, and more. See everything in one dashboard to understand how you’re progressing toward each of your health goals.

24/7 SUPPORT
Message your digital coach anytime, anywhere for helpful tips and daily education. Guided chats help you achieve your goals in just 5 minutes a day! Most Lark programs also include live coaching opportunities with our certified coaches and the ability to join a community of other Lark members.  

COMPLIMENTARY DEVICES
When you enroll, you’ll receive a smart scale and other program-specific devices at no extra cost to you! Your devices connect and send measurements right to the Lark app, making it easy to track your progress as you go.

ENROLL THROUGH YOUR INSURANCE BENEFITS
Answer a few simple questions to see if you qualify for Lark at no extra cost to you. 

HEAR FROM LARK MEMBERS JUST LIKE YOU!
“65 lbs down and 100 times happier. Keep going even when you think it's not working because small losses add up in the end.” - Charles

“I joined Lark a year ago and I reached my weight loss goal, it feels amazing! I have more energy and feel better than I have in years. Thank you, Lark, for helping me.” - Lisa 

“This morning I was getting dressed and pulled on a pair of jeans that are a size too small that I keep just in case, and they FIT!  When I went to the store later, I treated myself to a new sweater a size down, too. Small wins sometimes mean more than the scale.” - Carol

Disclaimer:
The Lark app is designed for personal health tracking for informational purposes only. It's not a medical device and isn't intended to diagnose, treat, or cure any disease. The content provided on the Lark app is not medical advice or a substitute for professional medical guidance. Consult a qualified healthcare provider with any medical questions or before making health decisions. Do not disregard or delay seeking professional medical advice based on information provided in the Lark app.

apps.title: Center Health—The Diabetes App
apps.description:
See all of your data in one place • Sync CGMs + fitness trackers • Search carbs • Your very own virtual assistant

* * *

Welcome to Center Health for iOS!

+ Beautiful, easy to use apps for iOS and web

+ Real-time stats — make quicker, more accurate decisions based on your current status

+ Trend analysis — keep an eye on your overall trends with daily, weekly, monthly, and quarterly stats

+ Offline support — use Center seamlessly when travelling or low signal conditions!

+ Estimated HbA1C — no more guesswork or unwelcome surprises

+ Logbook view — complement your sleek dashboard with a traditional timeline view

+ Full integration with Apple Health — import blood sugar, meals, exercise, and sleep in real-time

+ Advanced food logging — automated carb counting, barcode scanning, and ingredient search from our comprehensive nutritional database

+ Dexcom API sync — import CGM readings, meals, insulin, and exercise

+ Manual logging done right — log everything from blood sugar, insulin, and carbs, to exercise, sleep, feelings, and more, without frustration

+ Connected Apps — upload data from a variety of sources, including other diabetes apps and devices like Dexcom CGMs and the FreeStyle Libre

+ Real-time sync — pick up where you left off on all of your devices

* * *

This is just the start! We're hard at work on a number of amazing features.

We live for feedback. Please don't hesitate to get in touch with any ideas, questions, or issues, via email or on social media.

See you soon!

* * *

Center does not constitute medical advice. Always seek the advice of your physician, pharmacist, or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. You and your healthcare provider are responsible for any treatment decisions you make based on your use of Center. If you are experiencing a medical emergency or believe you have a health issue that requires immediate attention, dial 911 and contact your healthcare provider immediately.

The information and guidance provided by Aria is for informational and general-wellness purposes only and should not be considered as medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment recommendations. This information is limited to well-understood general wellness topics from reputable sources including among others the American Diabetes Association, American Heart Association, and US CDC. Aria is not a substitute for professional medical advice, examination, diagnosis, or treatment. Aria is not designed to offer a diagnosis, cure, mitigation, prevention, or treatment of any disease or medical condition of the body. apps.title: Cardi Health: Heart Health App
apps.description:
Meet Cardi Health, the cardiovascular health app that helps you manage and better understand your heart health. Cardi Health is developed by Kilo Health, a member of the Innovators' Network of the American Heart Association's Center for Health Technology and Innovation. 

Here are the features that you'll enjoy with Cardi Health:

Heart Health Monitoring & Tracking: Seamlessly track your heart rate and blood pressure using our advanced tracker, providing real-time insights and personalized recommendations for optimal cardio management.

Personalized Meal Plans & Activity Tracking: Access customizable meal plans designed by nutrition experts to complement your heart health goals. Utilize the activity tracker to monitor your fitness routines and ensure you're on the right path to achieving your desired cardio results.

Comprehensive Cardio Insights: Gain valuable insights into your cardio health trends and patterns through comprehensive data analysis and easy-to-understand visualizations. Monitor your progress over time to make informed decisions and maintain a healthy heart.

Freeform Exercise Tracking: Use the app's freeform exercise tracking feature to log your workouts and physical activities, ensuring you're staying on top of your cardio goals and maintaining an active lifestyle.

Integrated Blood Pressure Monitor: Utilize the integrated blood pressure monitor to keep an accurate record of your hypertension management, ensuring that you're always aware of your current cardiovascular status.

Expert Guidance & Cardio Support: Connect with certified nutritionists and cardio specialists for personalized guidance and support. Access articles and resources that provide insights into managing cardiovascular health and achieving optimal blood pressure levels.

Community & Cardio Challenges: Join our active community to share your cardio journey, participate in challenges, and stay motivated. Engage in discussions centered around heart health and share tips and strategies to achieve collective cardio success. 

Cardi Health is not a substitute for the medical management of cardiovascular disease, nor is this app intended to cure, treat, or diagnose any medical condition. Developed by cardiologists and designed to help anyone manage and track cardiovascular disease, the Cardi Health app features are created according to the guidelines of the American College of Cardiology and the American Heart Association.



Terms and Conditions: https://cardi.health/terms-of-services
Privacy Policy: https://cardi.health/privacy-policy

apps.title: Hundred Health
apps.description:
Hundred Health is your personal health companion, built with the expertise of a world-class scientific advisory board and powered by advanced biomarker intelligence.

For decades, personalized well-care was reserved for the wealthy. Now, Hundred makes it available to everyone.

Here’s what you get:

• 160+ advanced lab tests covering heart, hormones, inflammation, metabolism, and more
• Wearable integration with 45+ devices for a complete health picture
• Personalized care plans based on your unique data: nutrition, supplements, fitness, recovery, and lifestyle
• Biomarker Intelligence: Our doctor-built engine interprets your results, showing not just “in range” but your true optimal, all evidence-based
• Exclusive member marketplace: Clinically vetted supplements, better than Amazon prices, no guesswork
• Progress tracking: Re-test included. See how your biomarkers improve, and watch your plan adapt

Hundred Health is where science meets simplicity, turning elite precision health into everyday guidance you can trust.

Hundred Health. Your body. Your data. Your personal path to 100.

---

Disclaimer

Hundred Health is a health optimization platform that provides personalized insights, tools, and protocols to support your wellness and longevity goals. We are not a medical provider, and our services do not include medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

All laboratory testing and advanced diagnostics available through Hundred are ordered and reviewed by independent licensed healthcare providers. The information, recommendations, and data interpretations you receive through the Hundred app are for informational purposes only and are not intended to replace professional medical guidance.

Always consult your physician or another qualified health provider with any questions about a medical condition, diagnosis, or treatment. Do not ignore or delay seeking medical advice because of something you read or receive through Hundred.

raw_data.releaseNotes:

apps.title: MOBE Health Guide
apps.description:
Approach your health from a whole-person perspective–where you focus on one or many areas of well-being that help you work toward one goal: living your healthiest life. MOBE provides personalized one-to-one guidance from experienced professionals (including registered nurses, dietitians, health coaches, chiropractors, and clinical pharmacists), making sure you are supported on your journey toward better health. Together, you’ll create a vision and plan to build habits that help you manage your well-being, lifestyle, and medications.

**********************************

FEATURES

Get paired with a MOBE Guide and Pharmacist to work on specific areas of health.

Schedule appointments and send direct messages to your MOBE Guide and Pharmacist.

Track areas of health like nutrition, movement, stress, hydration, and more–all in one spot.

Stay in sync by connecting health data from other devices.

Access visit summaries after meeting with your MOBE Pharmacist.

Explore and save educational content on nutrition, movement, sleep, mental health, and more.

Get inspired in the kitchen with new, unique recipes.

**********************************

“I have this private connection with somebody who listens to me. If I have concerns, I get this information and feedback. It’s helping me—changing me as a person.” —Sarah K.

“MOBE can help you make improvements, increase your quality of life. It really helped me get my life in check. I feel less out of breath and less exhausted, and I can focus better.” —Thanh B.

**********************************

ABOUT MOBE

MOBE is a health outcomes company based in Minneapolis, Minnesota. We specialize in using health care data to inform our one-to-one health coaching model. MOBE works with health plans and employers nationwide. This app, and access to a MOBE Guide and Pharmacist, requires eligibility for MOBE or a valid subscription.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've improved how you understand and manage your medications by displaying recommendations from your MOBE Pharmacist as separate, interactive cards, helping you intuitively work through each item one by one. Additionally, we've streamlined the Plan functionality by consolidating long-term and short-term goals into a single goal type, which will help you focus more clearly on target dates and the most important steps to achieve your health outcomes. This release also includes other minor enhancements and bug fixes.

apps.title: Vida Health
apps.description:
Available to members of participating employers and health insurance plans

Change is hard. Having the right team and the right tools makes it easier. Whether you want to lose weight, better manage diabetes, reduce stress, or improve eating and exercise habits, Vida’s coaches, dietitians, therapists and medical providers can help you. Choose a health coach whose style you like for a program that fits your unique health goals. 

At Vida, we meet you where you are, and help you get somewhere better.

CONVENIENCE
With Vida’s mobile app, easily stay in touch with your health team through messaging, phone calls, and video sessions. Vida integrates with more than 100 devices and apps, including Apple Health, to track your progress and share it with your care team.

PROVEN RESULTS
Vida works. On average, Vida members in weight loss lose 7% of their body weight, those working on diabetes see an average A1C reduction of 1.4 points and those in therapy reduce anxiety by 58%, depression by 60%, and stress by 33%. 75% of those working on blood pressure reduce their hypertension by one full stage. 

EMPLOYEE AND HEALTH PLAN PARTNERS 
Vida is trusted by Fortune 500 employers and national health plans, many of which cover the full cost of Vida Health. 

*****************
“My therapist helped me overcome stress and anxiety both at home and work.”
- Kytn

“Everything has changed. I lost 30 pounds. I had retired from boxing and came back to the sport with the support of my Vida coach – it’s unbelievable. I’m ready to jump back into the boxing ring again. I’m 40 years old, but feel like I’m 20.”
- Mauricio

“I'm proud to say I'm still smoke-free, breathing easy, and I've now lost 85 pounds. I'm more active than I've ever been.”
- Lyndsey

“I’m exercising daily and taking over 10,000 steps daily, which was foreign in the past. My diet has also completely changed, with more fruits and vegetables and grains. With these changes, I feel a lot more energetic and have clarity of mind.”
- Chris, lost 25 pounds and reduced his elevated blood pressure

“I feel empowered by being healthy, losing weight, going to the gym, cleaning my diet, and changing my perspective about life. I am happy again!”
- Frank, lost 30 pounds and reversed his diabetes

apps.title: Wondr Health
apps.description:
Flip what the world has told you about diets upside down

Bring mindfulness to mealtime with our 10-5-10 timer

Learn practical, scientifically-proven skills from experts

Receive personal guidance and support from our coaches

Practice what you eat with our meal log

Progress makes perfect - track yours

Set goals - we’ll celebrate victories together

Download the Wondr app to access your Wondr Health program anytime, anywhere. Wondr takes what we’ve been told to believe about health and weight loss... and flips it upside down. Forget the points, plans and restrictions. Our skills-based digital weight loss program will teach you the science of how to eat the foods you love so you can lose weight, feel better and live stronger. Get started or continue your journey now with the app.

By downloading the app, you get:

Access to your complete library of personalized lessons from our team of experts

Daily and weekly tasks, plus a personal progress dashboard and goal setting, to keep you on track

Our 10-5-10 meal timer to make it easier to slow down and savor your food

Feedback and support to help you when you need it

Prompts and reminders to keep you motivated to reach your health improvement goals

Integration with fitness trackers and HealthKit so that you can easily track weight and steps.

Get started or continue your journey now with the app.

By downloading the app, you get:

Access to your complete library of personalized lessons from our team of experts

Daily and weekly tasks, plus a personal progress dashboard and goal setting, to keep you on track

Our 10-5-10 meal timer to make it easier to slow down and savor your food

Feedback and support to help you when you need it

Prompts and reminders to keep you motivated to reach your health improvement goals

Integration with fitness trackers and HealthKit so that you can easily track weight and steps.

apps.title: myCigna
apps.description:
The myCigna app gives you a new and improved way to easily access your important health information. You must be a Cigna customer to use the secure myCigna mobile app. Features available are based on the coverage you have with Cigna. 

HealthKit is integrated into myCigna in order to serve the ability to customize your Find Care and Telehealth experience. 
 
ID Cards  
•    Quickly view ID cards (front and back) 
•    Easily print, email, or share from your mobile device
 
Find Care
•    Search for a doctor, dentist, pharmacy or health care facility, from Cigna's national network and compare quality-of-care ratings and costs
 
Claims
•    View and search recent and past claims
 
Account Balances
•    Access and view health fund balances
 
Pharmacy
•    View and refill your prescriptions right from your mobile device
•    Update billing and shipping preferences 
 
Coverage
•    View plan coverage and authorizations
•    Review plan deductibles and maximums
•    Find what’s covered under your plan
 
Wellness 
•    View goal activity and awards

Languages Supported
•    Spanish and English
 
About Cigna
 
More than just a health insurance company, Cigna is a global health service company--dedicated to helping the people we serve improve their health, well-being and sense of security. We make this happen through a broad range of integrated health care and related plans and services, and proven health and well-being programs that are targeted to the unique needs of our customers, clients and partners.

apps.title: Ada – check your health
apps.description:
Get a health check for yourself and your relatives. You can check your symptoms online 24/7 and find out possible causes. Whatever's bothering you, from pain, headache, or anxiety to allergy or food intolerance, the free Ada app (symptom checker) could help you find answers from the comfort of your home.

Doctors have trained Ada for years so that you can get an assessment within minutes.

How do free symptom checks work? 

You answer simple questions about your health and symptoms.


The AI of the Ada app assesses your answers against its medical dictionary of thousands of disorders and medical conditions.
You receive a personalized assessment report that tells you what may be wrong and what you could do next.

 What can you expect from our app? 

- Data privacy and security – we apply the strictest data regulations to protect and keep your information private.
- Smart results – our core system connects medical knowledge with intelligent technology.
- Personalized health information – your guidance is personal to your unique health profile.
- Health assessment report – share relevant information with your doctor by exporting your report as a PDF.
- Symptom tracking – track your symptoms and their severity in the app.
- 24/7 access – you can use the free symptom checker anytime, anywhere.
- Health articles – read exclusive articles written by our experienced doctors.
- Assessments in 7 languages – choose your language and change it from the settings at any point: English, German, French, Swahili, Portuguese, Spanish, or Romanian.
- BMI calculator – check your body mass index (BMI) and find out if you’re a healthy weight.

 What can you tell Ada? 

The Ada app can help you if you have common or less common symptoms. Here are some of the most common searches:

Symptoms:
- Fever
- Allergic rhinitis
- Loss of appetite
- Headache
- Abdominal pain and tenderness
- Nausea
- Fatigue
- Vomiting
- Dizziness


Medical conditions:
- Common cold
- Influenza infection (flu)
- COVID-19
- Acute bronchitis
- Viral sinusitis
- Endometriosis
- Diabetes
- Tension headache
- Migraine
- Chronic pain
- Fibromyalgia
- Arthritis
- Allergy
- Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)
- Anxiety disorder
- Depression


Categories:
- Skin conditions such as rashes, acne, insect bites
- Women's health and pregnancy
- Children's health
- Sleeping problems
- Indigestion issues, such as vomiting, diarrhea
- Eye infections


Disclaimer: The Ada app is a certified Class IIa medical device in the European Union.  

CAUTION: The Ada app cannot give you a medical diagnosis. Contact urgent care immediately in an emergency. The Ada app does not replace your healthcare professional's advice or an appointment with your doctor.

We want to hear from you. If you have any feedback or just want to get in touch, reach us at hello@ada.com. Your feedback will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy [https://ada.com/raw/privacy-policy/].

raw_data.releaseNotes: Hi there. Our latest update includes bug fixes and performance improvements. Take care of yourself and email your feedback to hello@ada.com
