apps.title: LetsGetChecked: Health Testing
apps.description:
LetsGetChecked offers empowering at-home health testing, with fast and accurate CLIA-certified lab results. Take control of your health with your own personalized dashboard which allows you to track your health insights from home.

Looking for peace of mind? No need for clinics or appointments with LetsGetChecked. Order the health testing you need, from cancer screening to general wellness, COVID-19 testing, hormonal health, fertility, and sexual health. You now have the ability to order your test and track your results, all from your phone.

Experiencing symptoms or need some health advice? Try our Virtual Consultations with board-certified medical experts via secure clinical messaging. At $39 per virtual visit, our healthcare providers will assess your health and provide next steps for testing, prescriptions, and treatment. All you need is your mobile device.

Want FDA-approved medication without the hassle? Save time and money without the waiting rooms and long lines and get your medication delivered to your home through our pharmacy. Our options include erectile dysfunction (ED) medication and birth control pills with easy automatic renewals. 


Follow these simple steps for a better understanding of your health:

1. Order your test

Order your test online with free shipping. All of our tests are delivered discreetly in a plain envelope with no reference to LetsGetChecked visible, for a private experience.

2. Collect your sample

You can collect your sample from home in just minutes, with easy-to-follow instructions provided. Simply return your sample using the prepaid shipping label included in your test.

3. Receive fast results in 2 to 5 days

Your sample will be processed in a state-of-the-art CLIA-certified lab, the same used by doctors and hospitals. You can access these results through your secure online account.

4. Get medical support

Our dedicated clinical team may talk you through your results, answer any questions you have, and offer guidance on your next steps.



Our at-home health tests include:

Cancer screening, including FIT Colon Cancer and PSA screening tests and Kidney testing

Diabetes (Hba1c) and Cholesterol testing

Male hormone testing, including Testosterone

Female hormone testing, including Ovarian Reserve

Thyroid testing

Sexual Health testing (STIs)

Lyme Disease testing

Vitamin and mineral testing, including Vitamin B12 & D

…and many more!

LetsGetChecked's Activity section allows users to connect their health data through their apps and wearables.
With integrations with Apple's Health app or Garmin, users can see their data displayed in one place via the LetsGetChecked app.

LetsGetChecked is guided by science and empowered by technology. We are passionate about caring for people. Download LetsGetChecked today for access to actionable health insights and the power of knowing.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Updated the sign-in and account creation process for a more secure and seamless experience.

apps.title: Evidation: Earn Health Rewards
apps.description:
Discover health insights & Contribute to medical research—while earning rewards

Take charge of your health and contribute to cutting-edge medical and public health research—all while redeeming cash and rewards for daily activities like walking, sleeping, exercise and more. Evidation empowers you to monitor your health behaviors, connect with trusted health and fitness apps and wearables, and engage in clinical and observational studies that support scientific breakthroughs and evidence-based healthcare innovation. By securely sharing your health data, you can help fuel research in chronic disease prevention, public health trends, and wellness outcomes.

With Evidation, Earn Rewards for exercise and Everyday Healthy Actions. Redeem points for cash, gift cards or charitable donations, while staying motivated to improve your well-being. 

Join a Research Community That Makes an Impact

Evidation partners with top universities, medical institutions, and public health organizations to drive research on chronic conditions, disease prevention, and overall wellness. Your participation can potentially support studies on:
- Heart health & cardiovascular research
- Diabetes management & prevention
- Mental wellness & cognitive Heath
- Sleep patterns & circadian rhythms
- Physical activity & lifestyle habits

Key Features:
- Earn Rewards for Health Actions: Get rewarded for tracking steps, sleep, weight, heart rate, exercise and more. 
- Participate in Health Research: Contribute to studies that help improve medical knowledge and public health outcomes.
- Track & Sync Health Data: Securely connect with Fitbit, Apple Health, Google Fit, Samsung Health, Oura, and other wearables to function seamlessly with your health tracking.

- Receive personalized content, Insights, trend reports, and gain evidence-based articles tailored to your health and wellness goals.
- My Health: View your progress through your health dashboard

How It Works
- Track Your Health: Log walking, running and other activities; sync wearables; and monitor trends in steps, sleep, physical activity, and heart health.
- Answer Health Surveys: Provide valuable feedback on lifestyle habits, chronic conditions, and wellness routines.
- Engage in Research: Receive invitations to participate in clinical and observational studies relevant to your health profile.
- Get Rewarded.

Our data practices
- We’re committed to trust & transparency at all times.
- We do not & will not sell your personal information.
- Your health data is shared only with your consent or at your request.

Participate in research opportunities while maintaining full control over your information.

Join Millions Contributing to Health Research

With nearly 5 million members, Evidation is helping to redefine how individuals engage with their health while advancing critical research. From understanding flu trends to improving heart disease prevention strategies, your participation has a real-world impact.

"My sister told me about it, and it seemed too good to be true at first. But when she said that she had already received $20, I signed up. It was so easy and a monetary motivation really encouraged me to get up and get moving."- Estella

“I have had back problems for many years. Walking is one of the only ways I keep my back problems under control since the more you move the looser your back becomes and helps blood flow to heal your back. When I have the benefit of making money from keeping myself healthy, I go just a little longer each day." --Kelli C
”...Evidation Health helps users integrate a variety of wearable trackers, but in addition to using quantitative data pulled from said trackers, they also posed more qualitative questions of their user base for the purposes of this research. “ --Brit & Co

Elevate your health journey with Evidation—track, learn, contribute, and earn while making a difference in medical research and healthcare advancements. Download the Evidation app today!

apps.title: Accolade, Inc.
apps.description:
Personalized Healthcare focused on integrated access to benefits and clinical guidance right from your phone. Your Accolade Health Assistant® now adds our best-in-class virtual urgent and primary care physicians. You also gain access to our own therapists and medical specialists right at your fingertips. Our goal is to provide you with the best whole-person care in a way that meets your goals and your schedule.

* Message your health assistant securely, with an easy way to connect by phone if needed

* Get answers to coverage and benefits

* Speak to a physician virtually 24 hours a day

* Connect with with mental health providers

* Get a second opinion with access to our nation-wide specialists

* Ask your health assistant for help finding a nearby local physician or facility

* Get answers to your questions regarding your healthcare bills

* Use the Accolade virtual wallet - share cards with your doctor right from the app

* Also use your prescription benefit card from the app

Don’t have an Accolade Health Assistant® yet? When you send your first secure message from the app, you’ll be assigned a dedicated health assistant for your entire family. Your health assistant gets to know you and understand your needs and goals. They will help you make the best decisions for you and your family.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
An app update to enable a more cohesive and personalized member experience across feature areas and part of our commitment to continuous improvements that empower members throughout their healthcare journey.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements

apps.title: Droobi Health
apps.description:
“It's great to have the health coach give immediate advice and support. Also, Droobi helped me improve my habit of monitoring my blood glucose levels readings daily.” 

Featured as “Tech Startup of the Year” by Qatar IT Business Awards 2018, Droobi is a science-based, lifestyle program to help you get your diabetes under control and prevent complications.

On average, Droobi members lower their A1C by 1.8% and have lost up to 10% of their body weight. 

How does it work?

Our approach combines behavior change science, tracking tools and real-human support to help you reach your unique health goals!

Our programs include: 
Droobi for Diabetes and Prediabetes: receive around-the-clock feedback from a health coach about your blood glucose levels, food intake and physical activity to ultimately prevent long-term complications and improve your quality of life.
Droobi for Wellness: chat with a dietician to help you lose weight and build healthy habits that fit your lifestyle to feel your best and fight off disease!

In each program, you’ll get to: 

Track your meals on-the-go by simply uploading a picture of what you eat 
Track your physical activity, weight, Blood pressure for the day with the Apple Health App using Healthkit
Receive smart insights about your health based on your tracked data
Chat with your very own health coach who will support you every day of the week!
Empower yourself with knowledge through weekly engaging lessons
Choose or modify your own goals as you progress 

About Droobi Health
Pioneering digital care for the Arab world, Droobi health is one of the leading chronic disease management platforms that is tailored for the Arabic-speaking region. We create digital programs to help people manage their health and chronic conditions to ultimately inspire and enable them to live healthier lives.

Terms of use: https://trial-ios.droobihealth.net/user-app-pages/en/terms-conditions.html

raw_data.releaseNotes: We consistently enhance the Droobi app, ensuring it's faster and more reliable for your convenience. This latest version incorporates freestyle libre integration aling with various bug fixes and performance

apps.title: Reputable Health
apps.description:
Wearable Powered Health Research

** Only compatible for people with Oura Rings or Whoop Bands at this time **

Welcome to Reputable, your partner in discovering what truly works for your health and wellness. Our platform connects you with real-world studies that use data from wearable devices to help you make informed decisions about your well-being.


FEATURES:
Participate in Real-World Studies: Join studies tailored to your unique health goals, whether it’s improving sleep, managing stress, or boosting overall wellness. Track your progress and see what strategies work best for you.
Easy Integration with Wearables: Seamlessly connect your wearable devices, like Oura Ring or Whoop Strap, to start gathering insights right away.
Personalized Health Insights: Gain instant access to data-driven insights that help you understand the impact of your daily habits on your health. Get clear, actionable feedback based on your own data.
Your Privacy, Your Control: Your data stays secure and private. Share only what you choose, knowing all information is anonymized and protected.


Join Reputable today and take the guesswork out of your wellness journey. Experience the power of personalized, data-backed health insights and start discovering what works best for you!

Disclaimer: The insights provided by this app are for general health and wellness purposes only and are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Users should seek a doctor’s advice before making any medical decisions.

apps.title: Texas Health MyChart
apps.description:
Use your Texas Health MyChart account to manage your health information and communicate with your care team on your mobile devices. With Texas Health MyChart you can:
* Review test results, request refills for medications, view your immunization history and more
* Stay in touch with your care team 
* Manage your appointments 
* Upload health and fitness data, including data from the Apple HealthKit app (when enrolled in self-tracking programs) 
* Access your family’s health information 
* Receive Health Reminders 
* Complete History Questionnaires 

If you already have a Texas Health MyChart account, you are ready to begin. 

You must first create an account through the MyChart.Texashealth.org website.

For assistance email MyChartHelp@Texashealth.org.

You must first create an account through the MyChart.Texashealth.org website.

apps.title: Brightside Health
apps.description:
Every mental health journey is unique. That’s why our expert providers take a hands-on approach to tailor treatment to your needs. Whether you need therapy, medication, or both, you can see improvement at every step—no matter how severe your symptoms.

86% of Brightside members get better within 12 weeks
Appointments within 48 hours 
Treatment tailored to you
1:1 dedicated support from start to finish 

Here’s what you can expect at Brightside:

1:1 Video Sessions 
Share how you’re feeling and get 1:1 support from your provider.

Proactive Progress Tracking 
Look back at your progress over time and signal if you need your treatment adjusted.

Anytime Messaging 
Send your provider a message to get questions or concerns off your chest between sessions.

Skill-Building Lessons 
Learn how to integrate new thought and behavior patterns into your daily life. 

Getting better starts now, with Brightside by your side.

apps.title: Castlight Mobile
apps.description:
Do you have access to Castlight through your employee benefits plan? If so, you and your dependents can download Castlight Mobile: a personal healthcare dashboard that helps you find affordable and high quality care, anytime, anywhere.

Key features:
Find care  - Search for a doctor near you. Results are always in-network and include personalized cost estimates and quality data so you can make choices that are right for you.
Past care - Track your health care spending and claims with at-a-glance information about what you’ve spent and why.
Plan status - Track how much of your deductible you’ve met, see your HSA balance, and review basic information about your health coverage all in one place.
eCard - A medical insurance card is part of the app so you’ll never be without your insurance card again.

Please note:
The Castlight Mobile app is available exclusively to individuals and their dependents who have access to Castlight’s services through their employee benefits program. If you’re not sure if Castlight is part of your employee benefits, contact your employer’s HR or Benefits leader.

If available through employer, Castlight Health supports all major activity trackers including Apple Health, Fitbit, and Jawbone to conveniently synchronize your steps, food, and sleep data.

About Castlight:
Castlight Health is a trusted third party that connects directly to your insurance plan and does not share your personal information with your employer. Your health information is always confidential and secure.

apps.title: Levels - Metabolic Health
apps.description:
Levels helps you understand your body through comprehensive lab testing, glucose monitoring, and AI-powered habit tracking—so you can take daily action and improve what matters most.

Levels is backed by advisors who are key leaders in metabolic health: Dr. David Perlmutter; Dr. Robert Lustig; Dr. Sara Gottfried; Dr. Terry Wahls; Ben Bikman, PhD; Dom D’Agostino, PhD, and was co-founded by Dr. Casey Means.


LEVELS CHANGES HOW PEOPLE LIVE THEIR LIVES:

- “I’m far more aware of my body and its reactions to food, exercise, sleep, and stress. I feel better when I have more food choices than when I was limiting myself too much.” —Laurel Touby, 59, New York

- “I was focused on course correcting my dietary and lifestyle choices to improve my metabolic health, but I realized very quickly that it was much more than that. This is not about deprivation and what I cannot eat.” —Celia Chen, 49, Los Angeles

- “It’s the combination of intermittent fasting and using the CGM that has accelerated my metabolic health optimization. I finally feel like I’ve cracked the code on my body.” —Chris Wise, 42, Los Angeles

Everybody has health goals. Whether you’re tuning your diet, optimizing your exercise, or just trying to stay healthy, monitoring your blood glucose with Levels can help—you’ll finally be able to unlock what will work best for YOUR body.


NUTRITION

Your favorite “healthy” foods may be holding you back from feeling your best. Learn exactly how your diet affects your glucose so you can cut through diet and nutrition advice and find what works for you. 


FITNESS

To stay energized throughout your workouts, you have to know how to fuel properly. Levels helps you eat the right food at the right time to help you improve metabolic flexibility, which can give you stable energy outside of the gym.


LONGEVITY

By monitoring your blood glucose to see what your diet does to your body in real-time, you may be able to reduce the risk of developing chronic diseases, and you may maximize long-term health.


MEMBER FEATURES

- Glucose biosensors delivered to your door
- Log food and exercise to see how they correlate to your glucose levels
- In-app, personalized suggestions to improve your glucose stability
- Compare meals to see how food swaps affect blood glucose
- Track your progress with Zone Scores and daily reports
- Challenge yourself to keep your glucose levels stable throughout the day
- Access key blood tests with our Basic or Comprehensive lab panel
- Levels integrates with Apple Health to sync exercise logs automatically, which creates personalized insights for how your glucose is trending based on your Apple Health metrics like sleep hours, step count, heart rate, weight, and age


HOW MUCH LEVELS COSTS

- Join Levels to become a Member ($199/year) for full access to the app and community.
- Purchase glucose monitors at your preferred cadence.
- Access comprehensive Lab testing
- These prices are for United States customers.
- Pricing and availability in other countries may vary.
- Members may delay their glucose monitor kits or cancel membership at any time.


DISCLAIMER

The Levels app is not designed or intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or condition; it is intended for general-wellness purposes only. Users should make medical decisions only through consultation with their physicians, and not based on any information presented in the Levels app. For additional information:

Privacy Policy: https://levels.link/privacy

Terms of Service: https://levels.link/terms

Levels Glucose and Lifestyle Data Patterns in the General Population Study: https://levels.link/study

raw_data.releaseNotes: See a full list of new features and bug fixes at https://levels.link/releases

apps.title: Brook Health Companion
apps.description:
Brook Health Companion helps you find your healthy zone in the flow of your everyday life.

For people managing chronic conditions like diabetes or hypertension, or those who need a little extra support with their health, Brook builds your complete health story and helps you reach your goals.


HOW BROOK WORKS

Brook collects health information automatically and manually to help you track your health journey, and gives you the tools you need to get healthy and feel your best.

Through Brook, you can chat with our Health Coaches - skilled nutritionists, dietitians, and other health professionals available for live chat every weekday. They even answer questions on the weekends so you can get the support and guidance you need for success. 


CHECK OUT WHAT OUR MEMBERS ARE SAYING

“Brook has been THE MOST IMPORTANT TOOL in this journey. The ease of tracking, the reminders, the encouragement and compassion of the Health Coaches aligns well with my motivation.” - JP

“Brook helps me so much. I love it. I don’t feel like I’m alone dealing with this disease.” - BM

“Had my Dr. visit this afternoon. He was very pleased with the progress. I was down 13 lbs from my last visit. BTW not only were my A1c 6.0 but overall cholesterol was 139 and triglycerides were 119.....Woo Hoo!! It’s a great day. Thank you Brook!” - KM


FEATURES:

Chat your way to success

- Get answers and guidance from Health Coaches about nutrition, sleep, stress, exercise, and more
- 1-on-1 advice and support, 7 days a week
- Chat with your doctor and the clinic care team (for those participating in Remote Monitoring)

Quick data capture

- Log your data through simple messaging and notifications
- Background logging of daily activities like sleep and exercise and other health data through connected devices
- Integration with Apple HealthKit for retrieving health data directly into Brook

Insights and Dashboards

- Get instant feedback on your data from our friendly chat-bot, and personalized insights and support for improving your health from our Health Coach team.
- View data dashboards to track progress and explore your full data history
- Share data reports with your doctor for data-driven office visits
- Share health data with your doctor (for those participating in Remote Monitoring)



Note: Brook is not a medical device and is not a replacement for medical treatment. Insights from Brook are general and are not a substitute for advice from your licensed health providers.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Hi everyone, we’ve made a number of improvements and bug fixes to keep the app running smoothly. This update includes performance enhancements, stability fixes, and UI adjustments for a better experience. If you encounter any problems or want to provide feedback, please send us a message at support@brook.health.

apps.title: HealthEquity Mobile
apps.description:
The HealthEquity mobile app is a convenient and powerful tool that gives you on-the-go access to your benefit accounts. 

Features include: 

- New member: Sign up or activate your account right from the app.  

- On-the-go access and history: Access all account balances and history wherever you go. 

- Documentation: Take a photo with your device, upload images from your gallery, or add images and PDFs from the Files app to initiate claims and payments. 

- Send payments and reimbursements: Send payments to providers or reimburse yourself for out-of-pocket expenses directly from your account. 

- Manage debit cards: Link your debit card transactions to claims and documentation, or order, activate, and replace cards for yourself and dependents. 

- Claims initiation and status viewing: View the status of claims as well as link payments and documentation to claims. 

- Investments: Manage your HSA investments. View performance, research funds, and place trades.  

- Notifications: Receive alerts when your HealthEquity card is used. 

- Enjoy personalized support: Get instant answers to your questions with chat and live help.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
HealthEquity Mobile App Release: 
- OpenLoop Integration

apps.title: Health Planner & Tracker
apps.description:
Health Planner & Tracker is an all-in-one application designed to support your holistic well-being by providing a comprehensive array of features and tools. Whether you're aiming to improve your physical fitness, mental health, or dietary habits, Health Planner & Tracker offers a diverse range of resources to guide you on your wellness journey.

Health Disclaimer:
· This application is created for health awareness and stress relief purposes.
· It is crucial to avoid utilizing this application for diagnosing, preventing, or treating any medical conditions. This app is not a replacement for specialized medical equipment or professional medical advice.
· Kindly note that this app's functionality is confined to heart rate measurement and does not encompass the monitoring of blood pressure or blood oxygen levels.
· Should you have any health-related concerns, it is always recommended to seek guidance from a certified medical professional before making decisions or adhering to any advice.

Guidelines for Accurate Heart Rate Measurement:
· Gently hold your phone, maintaining a calm and relaxed state.
· Use your fingertip to cover the rear camera entirely.
· Ensure to remain still throughout the entire measurement process until it is finished.

Key Features:
· Personalized AI Health Advisor: Use the power of GPT technology for customized health insights and recommendations, tailored to your unique profile and goals. This AI Advisor also analyzes food nutrition from photos and interprets data from PDFs for complete health management.

· Health Plans Across Various Formats: Access an extensive library of educational content presented in various formats, including videos, articles, and podcasts. These plans cover a wide range of health-related topics, ensuring a well-rounded understanding of different aspects of wellness.

· Health Tests and Tips: Engage in health assessments and receive personalized tips based on your test results. These insights will assist in understanding your current health status and provide guidance for improvement.

· Fitness Courses: Explore a multitude of fitness courses catering to different levels and interests. From beginner workouts to specialized training, there's something for everyone, empowering users to achieve their fitness goals.

· Healthy Recipes and Articles: Discover a vast collection of nutritious recipes and informative articles focused on maintaining a healthy diet. Explore culinary delights that are both delicious and beneficial for your well-being.

· Meditation and Podcasts: Unwind and improve your mental health with guided meditation sessions and an assortment of enriching podcasts, aiding relaxation and stress reduction.

· Heart Rate Monitoring: Utilize heart rate measurement features to track and analyze your cardiovascular health during exercise or at rest. Monitor your heart health in real-time to ensure a balanced and safe workout routine.

· Health Data Check: Access tools to monitor and analyze your health data. Keep track of various health metrics and gain valuable insights into your overall well-being.

Subscription Options: Weekly/ Monthly/ Yearly
1. Upon purchase confirmation, payment will be deducted from your iTunes Account.
2. Post-purchase, you can handle subscriptions and disable auto-renewal in your Account Settings.
3. Failure to disable auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the current period concludes will result in automatic subscription renewal.

Embark on a journey towards better health with Health Planner & Tracker. Whether you're aiming for physical fitness, mental peace, or a balanced diet, this application is your comprehensive guide to a healthier lifestyle. Start your wellness journey today!

Terms of Service: https://www.goldwrightmedia.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.goldwrightmedia.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: Push Health: Telehealth App
apps.description:
Push Health is your personal telehealth app, providing convenient, reliable, and secure medical services from the comfort of your home. Whether you need a prescription refill, virtual consultation, or lab testing, Push Health connects you with licensed medical providers ready to assist you. Transparent, affordable pricing with no health insurance or subscriptions required.

Join the 1,000,000+ patients who have made Push Health their go-to telehealth solution. Download now and experience a seamless, personalized healthcare experience like never before.

FOR PATIENTS
Navigating the healthcare system can be overwhelming, inconvenient, and costly. Push Health simplifies this process, offering a hassle-free way to connect with licensed medical providers for a range of medical services - all without leaving your home.

WHY PUSH HEALTH?
Convenience: Access healthcare anytime, anywhere.
Efficiency: Streamlined process enables faster, more efficient care.
Affordability: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees.
Quality Care: Connect with licensed and experienced providers.
Privacy: Secure, encrypted communication protects your health information.

HOW IT WORKS
Sign Up: Download Push Health and create your account in minutes.
Connect: Choose a service and connect with an independent, licensed medical provider.
Receive Care: Get medical advice, prescriptions, and lab tests as needed.
Follow Up: Receive follow-up care and manage your health through the app.

POPULAR SERVICES :
Antibiotics: Azithromycin, Augmentin, Cephalexin, Clindamycin, Z-Pak
Asthma: Albuterol, ProAir, Ventolin
Weight Loss: Zepbound, Ozempic, Wegovy, Saxenda, Semaglutide, Tirzepatide

OTHER CONDITIONS & PRESCRIPTION REFILLS:
Acne: Aczone, Dapsone, Doxycycline, Tretinoin
Anti-Inflammatory: Prednisone
Antivirals: Acyclovir, Valtrex
Antidepressants: Prozac, Sertraline, Zoloft
Birth Control: Apri, Xulane, Yaz
Diabetes: Glyburide, Glipizide, Metformin, Mounjaro
Erectile Dysfunction: Cialis, Levitra, Sildenafil, Tadalafil, Viagra
Eye Care: Latisse, Vuity
Hair Loss: Finasteride, Minoxidil, Propecia
High Blood Pressure: Amlodipine, Lasix, Lisinopril, Losartan, Metoprolol, Propranolol
Cholesterol: Atorvastatin, Simvastatin
Scabies: Ivermectin, Permethrin
Strep Throat: Amoxicillin, Penicillin
Thyroid: Levothyroxine, Synthroid
UTI: Bactrim, Ciprofloxacin, Nitrofurantoin
Yeast Infections: Fluconazole, Diflucan

Push Health is available in the United States.

FOR MEDICAL PROVIDERS
Push Health provides the tools you need to operate a secure, virtual medical practice. Create your free account, set your professional fee, and start connecting with patients today. Connected with 55,000+ pharmacies and integrated with Quest Diagnostics for lab testing, Push Health ensures secure, efficient service delivery. Through Push Health, you can message securely with patients and other providers, document encounters, e-prescribe, order labs, and send invoices with just a few clicks.
Whether you are looking to grow an online practice with new patients or serve your own patients or network, Push Health can help you take your practice online. Join the thousands of medical providers using Push Health to practice independently again today.
Key Features for Providers:
KEY FEATURES FOR PROVIDERS:
Bank-level security and encryption
Connected to 55,000+ pharmacies
Integrated with thousands of lab locations in the United States
LegitScript certified

TESTIMONIAL
"I frequently get asked for medical advice from patients and my personal network when I am outside of the ER or the office. Push Health enables me to document electronically and send prescriptions, lab orders, messages and invoices to patients from my mobile phone and eliminates many of the hassles of being curbsided. I think Push Health is a big step in the right direction for improving access to healthcare."
- Stephen Phan, MD
For more information, please visit our FAQ page: pushhealth.com/pages/faq

Follow Up: Receive follow-up care and manage your health through the app.

POPULAR SERVICES :
Antibiotics: Azithromycin, Augmentin, Cephalexin, Clindamycin, Z-Pak
Asthma: Albuterol, ProAir, Ventolin
Weight Loss: Zepbound, Ozempic, Wegovy, Saxenda, Semaglutide, Tirzepatide

OTHER CONDITIONS & PRESCRIPTION REFILLS:
Acne: Aczone, Dapsone, Doxycycline, Tretinoin
Anti-Inflammatory: Prednisone
Antivirals: Acyclovir, Valtrex
Antidepressants: Prozac, Sertraline, Zoloft
Birth Control: Apri, Xulane, Yaz
Diabetes: Glyburide, Glipizide, Metformin, Mounjaro
Erectile Dysfunction: Cialis, Levitra, Sildenafil, Tadalafil, Viagra
Eye Care: Latisse, Vuity
Hair Loss: Finasteride, Minoxidil, Propecia
High Blood Pressure: Amlodipine, Lasix, Lisinopril, Losartan, Metoprolol, Propranolol
Cholesterol: Atorvastatin, Simvastatin
Scabies: Ivermectin, Permethrin
Strep Throat: Amoxicillin, Penicillin
Thyroid: Levothyroxine, Synthroid
UTI: Bactrim, Ciprofloxacin, Nitrofurantoin
Yeast Infections: Fluconazole, Diflucan

Push Health is available in the United States.

FOR MEDICAL PROVIDERS
Push Health provides the tools you need to operate a secure, virtual medical practice. Create your free account, set your professional fee, and start connecting with patients today. Connected with 55,000+ pharmacies and integrated with Quest Diagnostics for lab testing, Push Health ensures secure, efficient service delivery. Through Push Health, you can message securely with patients and other providers, document encounters, e-prescribe, order labs, and send invoices with just a few clicks.
Whether you are looking to grow an online practice with new patients or serve your own patients or network, Push Health can help you take your practice online. Join the thousands of medical providers using Push Health to practice independently again today.
Key Features for Providers:
KEY FEATURES FOR PROVIDERS:
Bank-level security and encryption
Connected to 55,000+ pharmacies
Integrated with thousands of lab locations in the United States
LegitScript certified

TESTIMONIAL
"I frequently get asked for medical advice from patients and my personal network when I am outside of the ER or the office. Push Health enables me to document electronically and send prescriptions, lab orders, messages and invoices to patients from my mobile phone and eliminates many of the hassles of being curbsided. I think Push Health is a big step in the right direction for improving access to healthcare."
- Stephen Phan, MD
For more information, please visit our FAQ page: pushhealth.com/pages/faq

apps.title: Cix Health
apps.description:
Taking care of family members can be overwhelming, especially when it comes to managing their health. Cix Health is your guide to managing health care for you and your loved ones.

This app helps you easily manage conditions and stay on track when it comes to caring for your family and yourself. Plus with the health snapshot, you’ll have peace of mind knowing you’re prepared with all of the right information when an emergency pops up. 

• Create accounts for the whole family—including pets

• Upload and store medicines, health data, insurance cards, doctors, pharmacies, allergies, and more

• Use the health tracker to keep track of vitals including weight, blood glucose, heart rate, blood pressure, cholesterol, and more

• Manage conditions, share profiles, and stay informed with family and loved ones using the Cix Health app

• Use the health calendar to manage health appointments, get reminders, and invite loved ones to attend. Plus, add upcoming surgeries to stay organized and track progress from preparation through recovery.

• Track potential side effects and interactions between medicines and allergies 

• Get medicine reminders and refill reminders so you can avoid falling out of routine and missing doses

• Create and share health snapshots with loved ones and healthcare providers so you’re prepared at your next appointment. 

• Look up symptom causes, get recommendations for care, learn about potential complications, and much more with the symptom checker.

• Use the healthbook to stay organized and store medical contacts in one place for easy reference when making appointments, filling out forms, and sharing care plans with family members

• Connect Cix Health with HealthKit to better manage your health. This app integrates with the Health app to read and track then consolidate your health data (e.g. wellness tracking, vitals, and basic information) in one convenient place on the Cix Health App.

Cix Health is here to help you take control of your health management and feel confident knowing your data is safe and secure. We manage health care information responsibly; all of your information is 100% private and secure.

Always seek the guidance of your doctor or other qualified health professional with any questions you may have regarding your health or a medical condition and seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app before making any medical decisions.

Terms of Use: https://cixhealth.com/terms-and-conditions/

Privacy Policy: https://cixhealth.com/privacy-policy/

More info: https://cixhealth.com/

Contact us: info@cixhealth.com

apps.title: HealthTap Primary Care Doctors
apps.description:
HealthTap is a telehealth app where you choose & keep one primary care doctor you love to get ongoing care — affordably with or without great insurance or benefits!

Get personalized, quality medical advice without an expensive and inconvenient trip to a doctor’s office. Meet with your favorite new doctor regularly for health checkups, prescriptions, lab tests & results, treatment plans and referrals to specialists. Our amazing doctors seek to build long-term, trusted relationships with their patients to take care of Americans' ongoing health needs.

Our top U.S. board-certified doctors are available for virtual visits 7 days per week in all 50 U.S. states.

~~~ SUBSCRIPTION BENEFITS ~~~

Subscribe for $15/month* (billed twelve months at a time) to save hundreds of dollars & countless hours each year with:

• Same day or week video appointments with your doctor — $44/visit or less**
• Free texting with your doctor for follow-ups and clarifications
• Speak with the first available doctor during nights, weekends, holidays, or while traveling out of state for urgent care — $59/visit or less**
• Get prescriptions, lab tests ordered, referrals to specialists, and even doctor’s notes for school or work
• Save up to 75% on prescriptions with coupons for local pharmacies
• Set up profiles for your children at no additional cost

We accept hundreds of insurance plans and even HSA/FSA cards.

* Subscription may be covered by select insurance plans
** Insurance coverage may reduce your out-of-pocket cost

~~~ AVAILABLE WITHOUT SUBSCRIPTION ~~~

$129 Urgent Care Video Visits — talk with the first available doctor within minutes (7 days per week) over video or text for advice, prescriptions, test orders, and referrals. Just $129 per visit (retail price) or your insurance copay.

FREE Educational Doctor Answers — Get educational text answers to your health questions from a network of over 90,000 U.S. doctors across 147 specialties volunteering their time to help millions like you for FREE! Search millions of answers or post your own and get responses from real doctors within hours.

~~~ WHAT WE TREAT ~~~

We can help with a broad range of medical issues, including the following examples:

MANAGING YOUR CONDITION
High blood pressure, diabetes, asthma, allergies, high cholesterol, arthritis, thyroid disorders

WOMEN’S HEALTH
UTI, birth control, menopause, period problems, yeast infections, skin and hair care

CHILDREN’S HEALTH (ages 2+)
Cold & flu symptoms, diarrhea or constipation, skin rashes, allergies

MEN’S HEALTH
STI symptoms, erection issues, bladder or bowel issues, skin and hair care

SENIOR HEALTH (ages 65+)
Muscle or joint pain, medication management, preventive health screenings

WELLNESS & PREVENTION
Weight counseling, skin and hair care, supplements, health screenings, stress reduction

SEXUAL HEALTH
STI prevention or testing, erectile dysfunction, birth control counseling

MENTAL & BEHAVIORAL HEALTH
Anxiety, depression, sleep issues, school or work stress, alcohol abuse, smoking cessation

…and much more!

~~~ SEE WHAT MEMBERS ARE SAYING ~~~

“Great prices, very friendly doctor, very convenient, and I was able to get a same or next-day appointment and prescriptions that I needed.” – Joe C

“Super quick and efficient. Doctor was very personable and made me feel comfortable through the telehealth visit. She explained everything and made sure I understood.”  – Katlyn A

“When I moved I lost my medical insurance.  I found HealthTap and it was a lifesaver.  I have told many people about it.” – Steven B

“My doctor is extremely accommodating. She has multiple appointment times open throughout the weekend. She is never in a hurry and very thorough. HealthTap is a wonderful service!” – Diana C

~~~

100% SECURE & CONFIDENTIAL:
We take your privacy very seriously. Your visit with the doctor is confidential and HIPAA compliant.

QUESTIONS?
You’re always welcome to contact us at support@healthtap.com for responsive and helpful support.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Enhancements to the Visit Transcript
•When switching PCPs or booking a follow-up visit, users can now see more information about the doctor to help make their decision (e.g. whether you've seen the doctor before, in or out-of-network for insurance, which ages doctors can see, and the language(s) doctors speak) 
• We’ve added a motion detection check to help keep virtual visits safe. If you’re in a car or driving, the app will prompt you to let us know before starting your visit.

apps.title: Vori Health
apps.description:
Vori Health is on a mission to empower humanity to lead their healthiest life. We believe that great health holds the keys to unlocking personal potential. Our goal is to deliver high-value virtual and in-person care that enables a path to better health. Our human-centered approach, starting with musculoskeletal care, combines innovations in technology and timely communication with integrated care teams designed to cultivate a community of support which ultimately provides the most effective setting for both restorative and preventative healthcare.

The best care comes from understanding your goals and needs. Our team of highly skilled providers listen to your needs and help you find the right path that works for you on your time. 

In this release of the Vori Health app, you will be able to perform these functions;
• Schedule virtual and in-person visits with providers
• Secure messaging directly with your health coach
• Receive at-home physical therapy exercises 
• Track your progress over time 
• Get real-time assessment with providers during your visits   

Download the Vori Health app. 
Create a mindful connection with your body.
Receive helpful reminders that keep you on track.
Get the support you need to achieve your goals.
Build daily habits that you can take anywhere. 

Our reason for being is because we love who you are and we take pride in providing the best care you can get both virtually and in-person.

apps.title: Health Wealth Safe
apps.description:
The Health Wealth Safe app helps you Track, Monitor, and Manage your health right from your phone.  Import secure health data and share it instantly with your Doctor and Family Members.  Customize your Care Team and begin making the best, informed decisions about your health.  Engage in your healthcare journey by creating custom goals, answering daily health surveys, and completing health activities.  With the Health Wealth Safe app you will unlock the healthier you.
App Features:

KNOW YOUR HEALTH
+ Preview Your Current Health Stats
+ Answer Personalized Health Surveys
+ Schedule Virtual Doctors Visits

TRACK YOUR HEALTH
+ Connect Health Devices (Blood Pressure Cuffs, Weight Scales, Blood Glucose Monitors, and more.)
+ Set Medication and Appointment Reminders
+ Complete Customizable Health Goals & Health Activities
+ Improve Your Health Engagement Score and Earn Rewards

MANAGE YOUR HEALTH
+ Communicate with your Doctor and Care Team
+ Access Your Medical Records (Lab Results, Prescriptions, Procedures, and more.)
+ Share Your Health Records with Doctors and Family Members

DAILY... and unlock the healthier you!

MEDICAL ADVICE
Please consult a licensed medical professional for seeking medical advice. If you believe that you are having a medical emergency, please dial 911.

HEALTH WEALTH SAFE APP SUPPORT
Please contact Health Wealth Safe at +1 (877) 581-8810 for additional support with the Health Wealth Safe app.

PROVIDE FEEDBACK
Your user experience matters to us. Please review the Health Wealth Safe app and leave feedback so that we can improve and give you the best experience with our app.

APP UPDATE NOTICE
Please ensure that your mobile device is updated to the latest version of the operating system for the best user experience.

apps.title: Sutter Health My Health Online
apps.description:
Use your existing My Health Online account at Sutter Health to manage your health information and send messages to your physician and care team from your mobile device.
With Sutter Health’s My Health Online mobile app, you can:
•	Message your physician and care team
•	Review test results
•	Request prescription refills
•	Schedule and manage your  appointments
•	View and pay your bill
•	View your immunization history,  medications and health reminders
•	Access your family’s health information through proxy access
•	If you’ve joined a My Health Online pilot, you can integrate Apple HealthKit data into your medical record via the app

You will need to have an active My Health Online account before you can start using the mobile app. If you do not yet have a My Health Online account, you can find out how to register on our website: https://mho.sutterhealth.org

To learn more about My Health Online, visit our FAQs: https://mho.sutterhealth.org/myhealthonline/frequently-asked-questions.html

Have feedback or need help? Select Contact Support within the app.

apps.title: Salvo Health
apps.description:
In partnership with your GI physician, your Salvo Health remote patient monitoring program delivers continuous care in-between appointments by providing access to personalized care plans and continued support and messaging with an interdisciplinary Care Team.

When you become a Salvo Health patient, you work with a team of gut-focused clinicians who support and equip you with resources, tools, and strategies to better manage your chronic condition. They provide science-backed treatments based on Salvo Health's model of care called Whole Self Science, treating the 'whole' you to uncover and treat root causes and find long-term progress.

apps.title: Trellus Health
apps.description:
Trellus Elevate™ is a clinically proven program designed specifically for individuals living with chronic health conditions. Trellus Elevate™ equips and empowers individuals living with chronic health conditions with the tools and support team necessary to master their health and enhance their overall well-being. This virtual program is designed to complement your current treatment plan and provides continuous support between doctor visits.

As a member, you will have access to the following:

•	Engaging learning modules and expert skills for mastering your health.

•	A personalized health roadmap based on your unique needs.

•	One-on-one coaching with a multidisciplinary team of experts.

•	Emotional, social, and nutritional support.

•	Flexibility to progress at your own pace.

•	The ability to track your progress and celebrate successes.

If you want to master your health and flourish, you can do so with Trellus Elevate™!

apps.title: Rally Coach™
apps.description:
Take small steps toward big health improvements with the Rally Coach™ app. Our app has programs for weight loss, quitting tobacco, diabetes prevention, diabetes management, and wellness coaching.*
 
Real Appeal Weight is proven to help you achieve real and lasting results. You’ll get tools you need to reach and maintain a healthy weight, like weekly online live coaching sessions and anytime, anywhere coach messaging. Plus, trackers for food, activity, weight, and more to help you live a healthier life. Included are separate tracks to help prevent and manage diabetes for you to share, listen to, and learn more about diabetes to live healthier.
 
Quit For Life helps you to quit tobacco using proven tools and strategies. Quit for good with live coaches who develop and guide through personalized quit plans. Access videos, articles, text support, and more anytime, anywhere, and stay on track with nicotine replacement therapy (like gum and patches) delivered right to your door. Now featuring enhanced tracks to fit your unique needs.

Digital Wellness Coaching provides the tools, strategies, and live coaching (for some programs) to tackle everyday challenges from eating smarter to financial wellbeing. Everyday life is tricky to navigate but this program includes the tools to make life easier. 
 

Download now.

*Programs and some features on Rally Coach are available to eligible program participants. Check with your employer or health care provider to learn which programs are available to you.

*Our trackers are integrated with Apple HealthKit and you can easily sync your data with your HealthKit supported devices.

apps.description:
Be Seen. Be understood. Get concierge support to address your health needs. Our team works with you to understand your health status and the resources you need to stay healthy. Everyone deserves to thrive and be as healthy as they can. We integrate your health history with focused understanding to create a personalized health plan -- made for you.

Benefits and Services
   • Integrated health history across clinical organizations that informs your next best steps

Preventive health assessments

   • Securely and easily share data with caregivers and health teams
   • Referrals to health service resources tailored to your unique needs.

Our promise on privacy: Patient health data belongs to patients, which is why we never sell it or make it available to another person or organization without patients telling us where it should go.

Valeo Health is your trusted health partner, empowering you to take care of your health. 

Valeo Health offers convenient at-home blood test & IV Drip services, expert consultations, personalized treatment plans, and top-quality supplements. All accessible through a user-friendly app where you have easy access to testing, monitoring and tracking your health. Experience the future of healthcare with Valeo Health. 

What you get
- At-home health services: Blood Tests & IV Drips
- Top-quality clean supplements  
- 100% science-based in-app results analysis & solutions
- Personalized diet & lifestyle recommendations 
- FREE one-on-one sessions with Valeo Health Coaches
- Personal health trends & history tracking in-app
- 10% off for new users & special offers 
- Painless experience
- Great value packages
- Everything in one place

- Advanced Female & Male Blood Tests

Get Top Quality Supplements:

apps.title: KoreHealth
apps.description:
KoreHealth App: Health Fitness Tracker 
Track Workouts, Sleep, Heart Rate, and More

Fitness and health monitoring made simple! KoreHealth App tracks workouts, health data, sleep patterns, heart rate, and so much MORE! Get accurate health and fitness data from your Kore 2.0 smartwatch and Korescale delivered straight to your smartphone. Access over 22 health metrics with just a few taps and see them update in real time!

Learn from unique exercise insights, set benchmarks, track progress, and understand your health and fitness to reach your goals faster!

So many users have been inspired to get back in shape thanks to the KoreHealth health app. Get in shape and feel better today!

FEATURES
24/7 health and fitness monitoring keeps you informed and motivated to stay active!

-  Track Progress: Plan workouts, set goals and track your success. 
-   Heart Rate Monitor: Measure your pulse and NEVER miss a beat
-   Body Temperature Tracking: 24/7 monitoring and scheduled readings
-   Blood Oxygen: Train safely and monitor exercise recovery
-   Pedometer & Step Tracker: Count every step you take
-   Red Light Therapy: Improve sleep, reduce pain, promote recovery, and more!
-   Sleep Monitoring: Get your best night of sleep yet 
-   Intuitive Interface: Super easy to read and navigate
-   24/7 Customer Support: Ask questions, get assistance, or give feedback.
-   5 Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, German & French.

HOW IT WORKS
  1.  Download the KoreHealth fitness tracker app
  2.  Pair your Kore 2.0 device or Korescale
  3.  Health and fitness data instantly sync when your Kore device is in range

BONUS FEATURE: Any data stored on the KoreHealth app can seamlessly integrate with the Apple Health app. Get a full backup of all your tracked health and fitness data!

Hear from Our Founder:
"KoreHealth empowers me to track what matters most. From workout progress and calorie burn to heart rate analysis and sleep quality, every essential aspect is covered." - Jason Manly

Raving Testimonials:
"I've embraced daily runs as part of my routine. The challenge of surpassing my own records fuels my motivation. KoreHealth simplifies tracking critical metrics, accelerating my progress." - Dr. Tyler Van

Ready to Crush Your Goals? Download KoreHealth NOW and feel better than ever before!

apps.title: Healthians - Full Body Checkup
apps.description:
Planning to prioritise your health? Let the Healthians app help you!

Healthians is India’s leading doorstep medical diagnostics service provider that brings accurate medical
checkups and full body checkup packages to your doorstep.

The Healthians app is your comprehensive health companion, offering easy access to a wide range of lab
tests and blood tests at home. With our user-friendly interface, you can book tests, track your reports,
and learn about the latest health tips all in one place.

How are Full Body Checkups Beneficial for My Health?

Did you know a simple blood test a home can help diagnose a plethora of health issues? Early detection
helps in creating an effective action plan comprising accurate treatment and lifestyle changes. Full body
checkups are never a regret, but an investment towards a long and healthy life.

Why Choose Healthians?

● Presence in 250 cities
● 22 fully owned state-of-the-art labs across India
● 1,500 trained phlebotomists
● 60 lakh satisfied customers & counting
● Serving 1.8 lakh customers a month
● LIVE real-time sample tracking & reporting of lab tests, individual blood tests at home and full
body checkups.
● AI-based recommendations in reports
● Automated AI-based video health report analysis & recommendations
● Youngest CAP-USA accredited lab
● NABL accredited labs
● Free Home Sample Collection for Blood Tests
● Free wellness consultation post-test with customised diet + lifestyle recommendations

How Does it All Work?

It’s easy peasy. You just have to take the first step of booking a lab test or health checkup and we’ll
handle the rest! Here’s a breakdown

● Book a full body checkup or blood tests at home, of your choice at your convenient time slot
● Our sample collectors will visit you to collect your samples
● The sample will then be transported & tested at the nearest Healthians NABL-accredited lab
● Smart reports will be generated within 6 to 24 hours

What Do We Offer?

The list is long! But here’s a brief description of our offerings -

Accurate and Reliable Diagnostic Services

Healthians is one of the top medical diagnostics service providers in India, renowned for providing top-
tier health packages at home ranging from full body checkups to individual tests like lipid profile test,
diabetes tests, liver function tests etc, pathology lab tests. Founded in 2015, we have etched a
significant position in the market, serving over 6 million households nationwide.

Affordable and Reliable Imaging Services

We are your trusted partner for lab tests (radiology). With over 350 diagnostic
centres across 30+ cities, we have access to experienced and dedicated radiology test specialists
committed to delivering accurate results.

Herbved - Ayurveda based all natural health supplements

Herbved has a range of trusted Ayurvedic supplements that are crafted from 100% pure natural herbs
with no artificial substitutes or chemicals, ensuring authenticity and safety.

Unique Features of Healthians App

Our app offers more than just a platform to book full body checkups! Consider us your wellness buddy!
● Health tracker to track your weight, BP, and sugar
● Health Karma for your personalised health score
● Step & Calorie Tracker
● Health & nutrition articles
● Instant booking with complete order tracking for blood tests at home.
● Smart Reports with Personalised Diet Plan
● Special offers for Friends & Family
● Wellio - Your Personal Health Assistant - AI-based chatbot that’s capable of answering health-
related queries, recommending suitable lab tests and blood tests at home, helping provide
comprehensive health solutions.

To stay tuned about the latest happenings, follow us on:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Healthians/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/healthians
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/healthians/

Liked our app? Please support us by rating us on the app store.
Have any feedback to share? We’re all ears! Write to us at AppSupport@healthians.com

apps.title: Fullscript
apps.description:
Manage your supplement and medication routine with tools that keep you on track.

The Fullscript app gives you a way to order high-quality, clinically-effective supplements. It also gives you the tools you need to keep your wellness on track, no matter how busy life gets.

With easy-to-use tools and features, it’s a simple way to manage your supplement and medication routine, as well as work more closely with your provider—all in one place.

Tools to stay on track
Unlock exclusive, mobile-only tools like dose reminders and medication tracking. You can also access Fullscript features like auto refills, or refill on-the-go in just a few taps.

Provider guidance 24/7
By using Fullscript, you’ll be giving your provider a better view of your routine so they’ll be able to suggest products, give insights, and adjust doses in real time.

Order trusted products the easy way
Use Fullscript to easily order leading supplements right to your door with fast, free shipping on orders over USD $50 and CAD $150.

Quality Assured
We invest $10 million annually in our Fullscript Quality Program, making sure you and your provider can trust the products that support your care.

Currently, the app is only available to patients in the US and Canada.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve made a few behind-the-scenes improvements to keep your experience running smoothly.

apps.title: ActiveHealth
apps.description:
Friendly disclaimer: To log in, your employer or health plan must offer this free benefit.

The latest ActiveHealth® mobile app makes it easier to achieve your best health with proven ways to start healthy habits. Find your own path to success with action plans based on your health goals and what motivates you.

With the ActiveHealth app you can:
•	Use the health dashboard to find health actions and activities to complete in the app as well as view articles and healthy recipes
•	Collect hearts, unlock content and recipes and race to the finish by joining adventure challenges that progress based on your tracked steps and physical activity
•	Discover and enroll in coaching options that are available to you
•	Connect wearables and apps like Apple HealthKit to track your progress
•	Earn rewards for completing your healthy activities (for some members)
 
You can also review your health and fitness information on the MyActiveHealth™ website.
ActiveHealth is here to help you achieve your best health and stay active.

Questions? Contact us at mobilesupport@aetna.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
At ActiveHealth we say, "Tech, yes!" Thanks for updating your app.
In this release we have:
• Enhanced app security for forgot username and reset password with one-time passcode based authentication
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

apps.title: iHealth MyVitals
apps.description:
The MyVitals App allows users to easily manage and view their health data. By creating an iHealth account and connecting our devices, you'll be able to store data securely in the cloud.

[Device Support]
This app will support iHealth blood pressure monitors, pulse oximeters, touchless forehead thermometers, and weighing scales.

[Graphs and charts]
Using easy-to-read graphs and charts, you'll be able to view changes and trends over time. You can view all types of graphic trends on the same screen and use the share function to keep your care team up to date with your condition status.

[Measurement Results]
After taking a measurement, you'll be able to see the results in real-time. By connecting the device to your iHealth account, you'll be able to sync the data and access it at any time.

[Contact Us]
If you have any questions about how to use our products, or if you would like to provide feedback, please let us know in the app. You may message the care team directly or fill out the feedback form in the settings section.

[Support Healthkit]
After authorization, you can sync your measurement data in this app to your Healthkit to conduct comprehensive health data monitoring and health management.

apps.title: Lyra Health
apps.description:
Whether you're coping with sadness or anxiety, a loss in your family, stress at work, living in a new country or raising your kids, Lyra can get you back on your feet. Lyra Health is a mental health and well-being benefit. You can use the Lyra Health app if your organization or health plan offers Lyra and has enabled the app.

Easily find confidential care for your emotional and mental health how, when, and where you need it. Access self-care resources or schedule an appointment with a provider personalized to your needs and preferences right from the app.

With the Lyra Health app, you can:

‣ Access well-being resources through the Lyra mobile app anytime, anywhere
‣ Meet with providers personalized to you and share how you are feeling
‣ Complete video lessons, exercises, and meditations to reinforce new skills and behaviors
‣ Message your provider to ask questions or get support
‣ Track your symptoms and progress over time if you’re seeing a provider


-- HOW TO GET STARTED--
1. Download the Lyra Health app and register to get started.
2. Start using the on-demand well-being resources.
3. If you’re interested in meeting with a licensed provider, share more about what you’re experiencing and find providers with the right expertise.
4. Schedule your first appointment.
5. Attend your first session on the app or on your computer. 
6. If your provider offers messaging and digital activities, use the Lyra Health app to access these features on the go.


-- DOES MY LYRA PROVIDER OFFER MESSAGING AND DIGITAL ACTIVITIES? --

Yes! Many Lyra providers support messaging and will offer guided mental health activities like videos and exercises between sessions. It’s important to note, however, that not all providers support these features. Features can vary based on the Lyra program you are enrolled in. If you’re not sure, ask your Lyra provider if 1:1 provider messaging and digital activities are part of your care plan.

-- WHAT IS LYRA ESSENTIALS? --

Ready to stress less, sleep more, and build healthy habits? Explore Lyra Essentials, a library of well-being resources available within the Lyra app. Access content personalized to your interests, developed by Lyra clinicians, and based on science. Each video, article, strategy, and meditation is designed to bring more joy to your life. 

--  ABOUT LYRA HEALTH--

Lyra provides care for your emotional and mental health, whenever and wherever you need it. Whether you’re feeling stuck, stressed, on edge, or down, support from Lyra’s well-being programs, coaches, therapists, and physicians can set you on a path to feeling better. 

-- WHO CAN USE LYRA SERVICES? --

Lyra Health is a mental health care benefit offered to individuals and their families. If you’re not sure whether your organization or health plan provides you and/or your dependents with access to Lyra, please contact your HR team or customer support team. 

-- IS LYRA SECURE? --

Safety, security, and confidentiality are #1 priorities at Lyra. Our technology is HITRUST certified and compliant with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA). For more information, find our complete Privacy Policy at https://www.lyrahealth.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: Kaia Health
apps.description:
Kaia helps people manage their pain at home. Our approach offers a drug-free option with exercises for the body and mind based on guidelines recommended by the American College of Physicians.

Kaia is offered exclusively to the individuals of our participating health insurance plans and employers at no cost. We are constantly expanding our coverage network and hope we can soon provide our best-in-class program to even more people in need of pain relief.

▶ THE ADVANTAGES OF KAIA TRAINING:

• DESIGNED BY MEDICAL EXPERTS: Kaia was developed by a team of doctors and pain specialists from Klinikum Rechts der Isar in Munich, Germany and is inspired by the “National Guidelines for the Treatment of LBP (Lower Back Pain)”.
• PERSONALIZED TO EACH USER: Kaia actively adapts its exercises to each user’s pain level, pain localization, and daily feedback via intelligent algorithms. 
• USE AT HOME OR IN THE OFFICE: Kaia can be used anytime and anywhere at your own convenience.
• HOLISTIC MIND-BODY TRAINING: Kaia combines a variety of mobility, strengthening, breathing, & wellness exercises to target both physical and psychological causes of pain.
• EDUCATION: Kaia includes regular insights and learnings to teach users more about back and joint health, chronic pain, wellness, etc. 
• ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY: Kaia uses the latest technology including a motion tracking (through the smartphone camera) to track and correct your movement in real-time.
• EXTRA SUPPORT: Kaia offers on-call professional health coaches to further assist users with insight, instruction, and motivation.

▶ HOW KAIA WORKS:

• DAILY CHECK-IN: Start every session with a quick self-assessment of pain intensity and sleep quality.
• PERSONALIZED ROUTINE: Kaia sets up a combination of mobility, strengthening, and breathing exercises within a 15-minute routine.
• DEMO VIDEOS: Each exercise begins with a high-quality demo to give you optimal guidance
• FEEDBACK: Give your feedback regularly to further personalize and improve your exercises.
• PROGRESS & MOTIVATION: Kaia tracks your training and keeps you motivated towards your health goals.

▶ WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM KAIA: 

• Smart and simple daily routines designed to build strength, mobility, and awareness.
• Physio-therapeutic strengthening exercises that stabilize the entire musculature of the spine.
• Psychological relaxation exercises that target mental wellness and pain perception.
• Extensive knowledge and insights on how to relieve pain, manage chronic pain, improve spine health, improve posture, build muscle, structure physical therapy, and more. 

▶ WHAT KAIA USERS SAY:

“Kaia can help you stand up to back pain and poor posture.” - Apple App Store

“This app is so well thought out combining movement, relaxation, and knowledge––the three things (I am learning) that I can use to control my pain. It’s easy to use and the exercises are really helping. Much easier and cheaper than paying for a pilates training course…” Colin M. - Kaia User

---

Follow us and stay up to date:
facebook.com/kaiahealth
twitter.com/kaiahealth

For support, please visit our Help Center.
You can also contact our support team in app!

PRIVACY & TERMS:
https://www.kaiahealth.com/legal/privacy-policy/
https://www.kaiahealth.com/legal/terms-conditions/

The Kaia Health App is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on Kaia Health App.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Smaller improvements and bug fixes

We thank all of our users who help to improve our app. Please keep telling us your excellent ideas and we will give our best to provide you with the most professional digital pain therapy out there. Just send us an email at service@kaiahealth.com

apps.title: Round Health
apps.description:
Round makes it easier to remember to take your medicine, so you can worry less, live healthier, and be happier.
 
This simple, beautiful app organizes all of your medications and vitamins in one place. 

It provides subtle, persistent reminders that go beyond awkward phone alarms. By helping you set “reminder windows” tailored to your medicine and schedule, Round accommodates life’s unpredictable distractions and removes the stress of staying healthy.

Round features:
・Simple and intuitive interface to viewing all of your medications and vitamins
・Complex scheduling of various doses and schedules
・Tracking and taking of as-needed/PRN medications
・Apple Watch App and Complications
・Refill reminders for medications
・Persistent push notifications that remind you even if you forget or miss the first one
・Streak counting and historical viewing of previous days and months
・Refill tracking and reminders
・Specialized flow for birth control packs
・User accounts for backup and syncing between devices


We love user feedback! If you have any questions, ideas or complaints at all reach out to us at feedback@roundhealth.co or @roundhealthco on Twitter.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

This update has an important fix for the account sync feature.

apps.title: iHome Fitness & Health
apps.description:
With the iHome Fitness & Health app, paired with the new line of iHome fitness Products, you can measure and keep track of your body weight, calories burned, and more with just a few taps using the iHome Fitness & Health app.

iHome Smart Scale & iHome Smart Scale Pro - Track body weight, mass, fat, bone mass and much more. 

The iHome Smart Body Scale and iHome Smart Body Scale Pro accurately measures more than just your body weight. This high-quality Smart Scale measures your full body composition including water percentage, muscle & mass bone, body fat percentage, body weight without fat, body muscle percentage, water weight, and more.

Disclaimer: Always seek the guidance of your doctor or other qualified health professional with any questions you may have regarding your health or a medical condition

apps.title: ShareMyHealth
apps.description: ShareMy.Health revolutionizes maternal and child health through our offline digital health platform. Nonprofits, NGOs, and governments partner with us to transform their paper-based workflows into offline, integrated workflows. Mothers, neighbors, health workers, clinics, and public health systems all collaborate to end maternal mortality and end malnutrition.

apps.title: Sidekick Health
apps.description:
At Sidekick, we create free programs for people living with specific chronic health conditions. We design our programs to give you the support you need to take control of your health. You’ll learn how your lifestyle and health are linked. Then, Sidekick will help you adjust your habits to improve how you feel.

You’re more likely to succeed when you’re engaged with your goals. That’s why Sidekick’s approach to digital health empowers you to make informed decisions.

WHAT DOES SIDEKICK OFFER?

COACHING
In some programs, you can chat with a specialized health coach. Your coach will help you gain better control of your health. They assist you in setting goals and staying motivated to reach them.

MINDFULNESS
Sidekick's programs teach you all about the mind-body connection. Get tips and info on adding mindful habits to your daily life. Doing so can set you on the path to lowering stress and symptoms of anxiety and depression.

LEARN ABOUT YOUR DISEASE
Knowledge is power when it comes to your health. Sidekick simplifies learning about your chronic conditions like IBD, ulcerative colitis, or cancer. Every day, you’ll receive concise, trustworthy information about your disease to help you understand the symptoms and their underlying causes. This knowledge empowers you to manage your health effectively, encouraging the development of healthy habits and a better lifestyle.

SMALL IMPROVEMENTS EVERY DAY
Every day, you’ll see new tasks on your Sidekick home screen. These are designed to teach you about your health and help you set goals to improve your well-being. Of course, there’s no one-size-fits-all approach to health! That’s why you can choose which topics to deep dive into. Sidekick offers daily lessons and tasks about fatigue, mental health, sleep, nutrition, and physical activity.

SLEEP HYGIENE
Sleep is a big part of good health, so Sidekick’s programs were designed to help you get the good quality sleep you need and deserve. All Sidekick programs feature educational content on sleep habits and tips to help you build a healthier bedtime routine.

MEDICATION REMINDERS
One of the best ways to feel better is to stick with your treatment. In our “Medication” section, you can list any medicine or supplements and tell us when you want to be reminded to take them. Miss a reminder? No worries, you can log it later.


WHICH SIDEKICK IS RIGHT FOR YOU?

IBD - ULCERATIVE COLITIS
Sidekick’s Colitis program begins by teaching you what’s going on in your gut. The program offers compassionate tips, tools, and guides to help you handle your symptoms. These include relaxation, mindfulness, physical activity, and more. Along the way, you’ll learn how to identify and deal with triggers and flare-ups.
To access the ulcerative colitis program, enter the following PIN when opening the app: ucus-store

CANCER SUPPORT
Getting a Cancer diagnosis can be difficult in many ways. Sidekick’s Cancer Support program is designed to make your daily life a little easier. The program covers typical symptoms and how to deal with them. You’ll get to learn ways to keep up your quality of life as much as possible. Sidekick’s Cancer Support program helps people living with 7 types of cancer: breast, melanoma, colorectal, kidney, bladder, head & neck, and lung cancer.
To access the cancer support program, enter the following PIN when opening the app: cancer-support-store


About Sidekick programs

Having the right support means everything. That’s what drives us at Sidekick to create our programs.

Our healthcare solutions are designed to help you not just survive–but thrive.

Download the free app today and discover what your Sidekick can do for you.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Minor fixes are indeed worthwhile. Stick with us!

apps.title: Urinify
apps.description:
Simplify your home general wellness management with a tech-driven tracking system.

Urinify is a powerful yet simple test that offers valuable insights into your overall wellness. With Urinify kits, you can conveniently perform this test at home to monitor your general wellness and maintain a healthy routine with personalized recommended feedback.

In this latest version, Urinify now helps you track not just your urine data, but also crucial body data like activity, sleep, and heart rate. These additional insights enable you to maintain a balanced lifestyle with comprehensive monitoring.

We understand that your busy schedule leaves little time for managing wellness. That's why Urinify's advanced technology ensures you stay well-informed. You'll never miss crucial early signs and symptoms again because the app will notify you when it's necessary to consult your physician. Stay vigilant, stay healthy, and take control of your wellness journey.

Disclaimer:

The Urinify app is not a medical device and is expressly intended for informational purposes only. It does not offer, provide, or claim to provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Users of the Urinify App should not rely on it as a substitute for professional medical advice and consultation with qualified healthcare professionals. The app does not endorse specific medical treatments or therapies and does not constitute a replacement for the expertise of licensed healthcare providers. Users must exercise their judgment and seek professional medical advice for any health concerns or conditions. By using the Urinify App, users acknowledge and accept these terms, understanding that it is not a substitute for medical judgment and that the app's creators and developers disclaim any liability for actions taken based on the information provided within the app. It is the user's responsibility to prioritize their health and well-being through appropriate medical consultation.

apps.title: Health Tips for Healthy Living
apps.description:
1000+ Top Health Tips! 

This amazing app gives you a rich collection of 1000+ interesting and useful health tips -- concisely written for quick and easy review. 

This cool app is entirely FREE! So be sure to check it out today! 

Learn these important health tips: 

- Diet, Exercise & Weight Loss Tips 
- Stress Reduction Tips
- Muscle Building & Cardio Tips 
- Toning, Aerobics & Strength-Training Tips 
- Healthy Snack Ideas & Good Nutrition Tips 
- Food Safety & Fitness Safety Tips 

App Features:

- Save your favorite health tips!
- Share your favorite health tips via Email!
- SMS your favorite health tips!
- Post your favorite health tips directly to Facebook! 
 
Enjoy!

Legal disclaimer: If you have an emergency medical condition, call 911 or go to the nearest hospital. In no way should the information found on this application be considered as medical advice. The content on this application is presented for informational purposes only. Never disregard professional medical advice from your physician or health care provider or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this application. This application offers health information for general educational and informational purposes only. It is not the intention of this application to provide specific medical recommendation or professional advice. You should always consult with your physician or health care provider before trying any homeopathic remedies, new treatment, diet or fitness program. You should not use this information to diagnose or treat a health problem or disease without consulting with a qualified healthcare provider. You should never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this application. This application provides the information content on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. No warranty is expressed or implied that this application is a comprehensive source of information on any topic of health or otherwise. In no event shall the creator of this application be liable in any manner for any direct, incidental, consequential, indirect or punitive damages arising out of your access, use or inability to use this application, or any errors or omissions in the information on this application. This application reserves the right at any time and from time to time to add, change, modify, update, or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, this application (or any part thereof) with or without notice. This application shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any addition, modification, suspension or discontinuance of this application.
