apps.title: Well World
apps.description:
Whether you are trying to lose weight, “get healthy”, or are addressing a serious health issue or condition, creating healthy habits and behaviors is hard. You have to learn new things, try new things, and do new things to become a healthier you. 

And if you’re working with a health practitioner, how do you keep track of and share progress on all these new changes – healthier food, healthier activities, which supplements to take and when, how much water to drink, and so on and so on?

Enter Well World - a powerful tool you can use with your health practitioner, to help you follow healthy lifestyle recommendations designed specifically for you, and create new habits and behaviors that lead to better health. Well World includes everything you need to follow your plan and track your progress - including nutrition, supplements, sleep, exercise, meditation and more – all in an easy-to-use, intuitive mobile app.

Well World makes it easy for you to successfully follow your customized health & wellness plan, share your progress with your physician or coach, and work together to improve results. 

Well World has tons of valuable resources and smart features to help you reach your health goals:• Set Personal Health Goals together with your doctor, nutritionist or health coach• Track Nutrition, Sleep, Exercise, Meditation, Supplements, Mood, Pain and more.• Lifestyle plans and educational information including nutrition, meal plans, recipes, and videos, • Nutritional supplement recommendations – so you know what to take and when to take it• Electronic Journal for keeping track of important information or reflection• Automated reminders - never worry about forgetting anything again• Use Health App to share movement, sleep, blood pressure and more data from your favorite health and fitness tracking devices.• Stay in touch with your practitioner or coach with secure HIPAA-compliant messaging and video conferencing. 

And most importantly, Well World gives you a direct connection to your health practitioner or coach and gives them ability to monitor your progress in real-time, to give you the ongoing support and coaching you need to help you get healthier, feel better and truly enter a Well World.

Well World is only available through your healthcare practitioner.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've improved the connection process with Fitbit to ensure smoother syncing and a more reliable experience when linking your account.

apps.title: Health Diary by MedM
apps.description:
The world’s only holistic health monitoring diary that can collect 25+ measurement types from 900+ Bluetooth-enabled sensors. MedM Health is more than a vital sign log book for blood pressure and glucose, body weight and temperature, heart rate and oxygen saturation, it is a comprehensive health diary app that supports users in taking control: reaching their wellness goals, managing a chronic condition, improving their quality of life.




MedM health is a single entry point for tracking, journaling, analyzing, and sharing (with family or caregivers) of 30+ types of recorded physiological & wellness parameters. Data can be collected automatically from connected fitness trackers and health monitors or entered manually via the Smart Entry interface. MedM Health does not require registration, but with it - offers synchronization and backups with a cloud service. Unregistered users can keep their health diaries in offline mode (data stored on their smartphone only). Please note that some features require a subscription that is available only for registered users.




Basic Features:

▶ Automatic data collection from an unlimited number of connected health meters

▶ Manual data entry

▶ App use with or without registration

▶ Online data backups for registered users

▶ Reminders for taking medications & making measurements

▶ Configurable dashboard

▶ Measurements history, trends, and graphs

▶ Basic data export

▶ A two-week free MedM Health Premium trial




Premium Features:

▶ Multiple health profiles for family (including pets)

▶ Data sync with connected health ecosystems (Apple, Garmin, Google, Fitbit, etc.)

▶ Health profiles sharing

▶ Remote health monitoring (via the app or MedM Health Portal)

▶ Notifications for threshold, reminders, and goals

▶ PDF & XLSX Reports

▶ Special offers from MedM partners and more




Jurisdiction statement: MedM Health allows users to log 30+ types of measurements, which can either be entered manually, received from Apple Health, or collected from health and wellness monitors that received regulatory clearance in their respective countries of sale.




Data safety: MedM employs all applicable data protection best practices - cloud synchronization via HTTPS, data is stored encrypted on securely hosted servers. Users exercise full control over their records and can export or request to delete them at any time. User health data is never sold or shared with unauthorized parties.




MedM is the absolute world leader in smart medical device connectivity - we support Bluetooth, NFC, and ANT+ meters by the following vendors: A&D Medical, AndesFit, Andon Health, AOJ Medical, Berry, BETACHEK, Borsam, Beurer, ChoiceMMed, CMI Health, Conmo, Contec, CORE, Cosinuss, D-Heart, EZFAST, FindAir, Finicare, Fleming Medical, Fora Care Inc., iChoice, Indie Health, iProven, i-SENS, Jerry Medical, J-Style, Jumper Medical, Kinetik Wellbeing, Masimo, MicroLife, Mio, MIR, Nonin, Omron, Oxiline, PIC, Roche, Rossmax, Sinocare, SmartLAB, TaiDoc, Tanita, TECH-MED, Transtek, Tyson Bio, Viatom, Vitalograph, Yonker, Zewa Inc. and more.




NOTE! Device compatibility can be checked here: https://medm.com/sensors



Disclaimer: MedM Health is intended for non-medical, general fitness and wellness purposes only. Always consult a doctor before making any medical decisions.



Privacy Policy: https://health.medm.com/en/privacy



Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
1. Added support for a new measurement type: Glucose-Ketone Index.
2. Blood pressure scales updated according to the latest recommendations.
3. UI improvements.
4. New supported connected meters and bug fixes.

apps.title: Altrua HealthShare
apps.description:
Welcome to the healthcare experience you've always deserved. The Altrua HealthShare App transforms how you manage your health, shifting focus from the stress of management to the joy of staying healthy.

Key Features:
* Health Records at Your Fingertips: See your different health records in one convenient platform.
* On-Demand Scheduling: Get access to your doctors whenever you need, right from your phone.
* Wearable Device Integration: Seamlessly connect your fitness trackers and health monitors to keep your health data updated and actionable.
* Easy-to-access Insurance Details: Easily access your coverage and claims details without wading through paperwork.
* Personalized Health Content: Receive health tips and insights customized to your preferences and health status.

Download the Altrua HealthShare app now and experience the convenience of having your health in your hands!

This app is currently exclusive to select individuals. Interested in taking control of your health journey? Please contact your HR representative, insurance provider, or healthcare provider for access.

apps.title: Creda Health
apps.description:
We are on a mission to ease the lives of people dealing with chronic conditions.
 
Whether you are recently diagnosed or you’ve been living with a chronic condition for some time, Creda Health is your one-stop destination for staying on top of your health.

Living with chronic conditions can be tough. Monitoring medications, symptoms, vitals, lab tests, doctor visits, food, lifestyle, etc. can be overwhelming. Creda Health does all of that for you and helps you identify triggers and take steps to prevent complications and worsening of diseases. It finds better ways of staying on top of these health elements.

Our condition-specific care models analyze your symptoms, medications, vitals, labs, nutrition, and lifestyle elements, and monitor your disease progression and treatment effectiveness, unlike anything else on the market. We send you reminders, alerts, warnings, articles, actions to take, and things to talk to your doctor about – all to help you stay on top of your health.

Available for free to users across the globe, our app offers a range of features to help you stay on top of your condition.

With our app, you can:

  1. Manage medications, symptoms, vitals, diet, exercise, check-ups, and more
     a. Receive reminders, alerts, and education.
     b. Customize by condition and needs
  2. Get personalized articles, videos, guidance
     a. Understand your condition
     b. Learn what to expect
  3. Review your ongoing health report
      a. See how you do every week
      b. Know what to ask your doctor
  4. Ask questions and get answers via chat
  5. Creda Health App connects with Apple Health and the Fitbit app for auto retrieval of vitals. Connecting to these apps requires user consent.
      

Creda’s Digital Health Assistant is available for Diabetes, Pre-diabetes, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia (high cholesterol), Heart Failure (and other cardiac-related conditions), Lupus, Inflammatory Bowel Syndrome (IBS), Irritable Bowel Disease (IBD), and more.

Disclaimer: WE DO NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE OR DIAGNOSIS. THE SERVICES PROVIDE A GENERAL INFORMATIONAL RESOURCE AND DO NOT CONSTITUTE MEDICAL OR HEALTHCARE PRACTICE, NOR DO THEY CREATE A PATIENT-PROVIDER RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN ANY PERSONS. WE DO NOT ENDORSE, NOR DO WE WARRANT, THE APPROPRIATENESS, ACCURACY, TIMELINESS, EFFECTIVENESS, MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, APPLICABILITY TO A PARTICULAR PERSON, OR SAFETY OF ANY MEDICAL OR PHARMACEUTICAL TREATMENT, OR OTHER HEALTH REGIMEN, OR SERVICE PROVIDER, OR OF ANY PORTION OF THE SERVICES.

ALWAYS CONSULT THE ADVICE OF A QUALIFIED HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL IMMEDIATELY IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS ABOUT A MEDICAL CONDITION, ISSUE, OR TREATMENT, OR BEFORE CHANGING ANY DIET OR COMMENCING, CHANGING, OR DISCONTINUING ANY COURSE OF TREATMENT. IF YOU ARE EXPERIENCING SERIOUS OR PERSISTENT SYMPTOMS, OR SUSPECT THAT YOU HAVE A MEDICAL PROBLEM, YOU SHOULD CONTACT YOUR PHYSICIAN, OR SEEK URGENT-CARE MEDICAL TREATMENT, IMMEDIATELY.

apps.title: ekincare
apps.description:
Health Benefits, Simplified!

*Enterprise app, Reach out to your HR if you want these benefits!*

Trusted by Fortune 500 companies, ekincare is a patented integrated health benefits platform helping organizations save up to 25% healthcare costs and lowering their health insurance premiums. 

A holistic health benefits platform, ekincare integrates latest technologies with offline healthcare services. Download ekincare and track and manage health of your loved ones.

Manage Health history:
Store all your medical history at one place by uploading them to ekincare! We digitize them and you do not have to share it with your doctor every time you visit them. All your health transactions are converted into one score for you to track.

Book a health check:
Avail discounts up to 50% when booking a health check for yourself or your family member across partner circle of 500+ NABL / NABH / CAP / ISO certified diagnostic centers covering 50+ cities across India. Where possible, the samples can be collected from your home as well. 

Talk to Doctor, 24x7:
Get in touch with a MBBS qualified doctor every time you need a medical advice. 24x7, 365 days. Interact on chat or call without appointment hassles & get your health queries answered. 

Order Medicines:
Get your medicines delivered to your doorsteps at up to 20% discount. You just have to upload your valid prescription for the medicines on ekincare app.

Take care of your family:
Extend the same benefits to your family as well. You can track the health of up to 5 dependents on ekincare and they can transact on the platform too!

Connect wearables:
Using a wearable to measure steps, heart rate, sleep etc? Connect it to ekincare and track the impact on your overall health! ekincare supports Google Fit, Apple Health, fitbit, strava, garmin and many other wearables.

Personalized for you:
Get insights about your health and know how you can improve it through regular engagement on the app. Receive notifications that are personalized based on your health history!

Safe and Secure:
All your health data is safe and secure and cannot be accessed by anyone else, without your permission. ekincare is ISO 27001 certified and takes data security very seriously!

Health Coach Programs:
Manage diabetes, BP, stress, weight, through personal coaches over 3, 6, or 12 months. Designed specifically for your needs, take care of your health issues through the step-wise program on ekincare. Special programs are also available for pregnancy management and smoking cessation as well.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thank you for choosing ekincare! Our recent update offers notable enhancements to the user interface, resolves several glitches, and boosts the overall functionality of our platform.

apps.title: ColigoMed
apps.description:
THE APP USES APPLE HEALTH KIT TO SUPPORT IOS USERS

Connect with doctors, access your health records, manage health goals, monitor health progress.
We recommend consulting an authorized medical professional for any medical decision or medical guidance you might need.

The ColigoMed App provides users a platform to store and synthesize health data collected from multiple supported devices including Apple health. The supported devices are all FDA cleared to return accurate health information. The user is able to link the supported devices. The ColigoMed App collects the data from the supported devices in real-time and synthesizes the data to provide the user a graphical risk categorization range. ColigoMed does not modify any of the data collected from the supported devices. The risk categorization range is a comparison between the user's data collected from the supported devices and the established guidelines published by the CDC (cdc.gov), American Heart Association (heart.gov), American Diabetes Association (diabetes.org).

DISCLAIMER: THE COLIGOMED APP IS NOT A SUBSTITUTE FOR PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE, DIAGNOSIS, OR TREATMENT. THE HEALTH-RELATED INFORMATION AVAILABLE THROUGH THE APP IS GENERAL IN NATURE AND IS NOT A SUBSTITUTE FOR PROFESSIONAL HEALTHCARE SERVICES. IT IS PROVIDED FOR SUPPLEMENTAL INFORMATION PURPOSES ONLY AND IS NOT INTENDED, AND SHOULD NOT BE USED, TO REPLACE THE ADVICE OF HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS. ALWAYS SEEK THE ADVICE OF YOUR PHYSICIAN OR OTHER QUALIFIED HEALTH PROVIDER WITH ANY QUESTIONS YOU MAY HAVE REGARDING A MEDICAL CONDITION. NEVER DISREGARD PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL ADVICE OR DELAY IN SEEKING IT BECAUSE OF SOMETHING YOU HAVE READ ON THE COLIGOMED APPLICATION. IF YOU HAVE A MEDICAL EMERGENCY OR BELIEVE YOU NEED MEDICAL ASSISTANCE IMMEDIATELY PLEASE CALL 911
USERS OF THE APP ARE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL DECISIONS OR ACTIONS RESULTING FROM THEIR USE OF THE APPLICATION AND ITS CONTENT, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY DECISION NOT TO SEEK OR REFRAIN FROM SEEKING MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS OR TREATMENT.

apps.title: Antidote Health
apps.description:
Seamlessly manage healthcare on your terms with the Antidote Health app. Whether you're an Antidote Health insurance plan member or using our one-time or monthly subscription-based telehealth services, the Antidote Health app is designed for you.

For Antidote Health Insurance Members:

- See your Antidote virtual primary care provider (PCP)
- Find in-network doctors and facilities
- Refill prescriptions
- View claims and visit summaries
- Access ID cards for you and family members
- Review benefits and track deductibles
- Chat with Member Support

For Antidote Telehealth Service Users:

- Answer simple questions about your symptoms
- See a virtual provider for primary or urgent care
- Consult with a provider
- Get prescriptions refilled
- Help managing chronic conditions
- Use with or without insurance
- Get sick notes for work

After downloading the app, log in with your existing account or create a new one in just a few minutes.

About Antidote Health

Antidote Health offers accessible, affordable ACA-compliant insurance in Ohio. Our "virtual-first" approach features $0 virtual visits, low copays, and $0 medication benefits. We also provide telehealth services in several states.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Improvements and bug fixes.
Demo video attached. 
Also in order to be able to connect and test by yourselves you need to be located in one of our supported states in the US ("CA", "TX", "PA", "OH", "CO", "NY", "NJ", "NC", "FL", "MI", "GA", "IL", "AZ", "WA", "DC", "WI","MD", "VA", "MA", "UT") - you can use VPN to simulate location.

For Antidote Telehealth Service Users:

- Answer simple questions about your symptoms
- See a virtual provider for primary or urgent care
- Consult with a provider
- Get prescriptions refilled
- Help managing chronic conditions
- Use with or without insurance
- Get sick notes for work

After downloading the app, log in with your existing account or create a new one in just a few minutes.

About Antidote Health

Antidote Health offers accessible, affordable ACA-compliant insurance in Ohio. Our "virtual-first" approach features $0 virtual visits, low copays, and $0 medication benefits. We also provide telehealth services in several states.

apps.title: HeartWatch: Heart Rate Monitor
apps.description:
"HeartWatch is so good, you’d think Apple built the app itself." John Patrick Pullen, Time Magazine. Top 5 in Health & Fitness in 100+ countries. 

TOTAL PRIVACY
HeartWatch has no user analytics tracking. No advertising plugins. No 3rd party code. No data upload. Ask your "free" heart app if they can say the same.

ABOUT HEARTWATCH
HeartWatch is the best way to get a complete picture of all the health & fitness information captured by your Apple Watch. 

NEWS
- Explore the different News Editions to learn all about your health progress and trends.
- Morning Briefing: read about your key health information to start your day
- Fitness Habits: news all about your fitness trends with a dynamic fitness habit tracker

WELLNESS
- An intelligent view of all key heart rate metrics. Daytime, Sedentary, Sleeping, Waking & Workouts. 
- Detailed trend analysis including heart rate, blood pressure, HRV, blood glucose, blood oxygen (SpO2) and more.
- Background heart rate alerts on Watch with context. 
- Note capture for individual heart rate readings. 
- Detailed ECG analysis

ACTIVITY
- Every day isn’t the same. Intelligent move, distance & steps goals based on your current habits. 
- Daily forecasting to help you stay on track to meet your goals. 

WORKOUTS
- In depth analysis of heart rate, training summary, GPS maps and more. 
- A heart focussed workout app on the Watch with custom alerts to keep you in the right zone. 
- Detailed trend analysis. 
- Stream workout info from your Watch to your iPhone. 

JOURNAL & NOTES
- Keep a daily journal with notes and measurements
- View a detailed list with a complete overview of all notes, measurements and workouts
- Input notes and measurements from your Watch or iPhone. Includes blood pressure, temperature, blood glucose, weight, waist circumference and body fat percent.

GRAPHS & ANALYSIS
- Over 30+ health metrics to view
- Apply 7 day and 21 day trends to any metric, with the ability to overlap
- View over 6 weeks up to 12 months

EXPORT
- Export for all health metrics & workouts. 

NOTHING IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN YOUR HEALTH
Heart Watch is a very useful tool to get alerted about any possible health issues in a concise format that you can show your medical practitioner.

INTEGRATION
HeartWatch connects beautifully with the Eclipse Yourself and AutoSleep apps, our premier sleep, activity, recovery and readiness monitoring apps.

HEART MONTH
Featured app in the official Apple Heart Month 2022:
https://www.apple.com/au/newsroom/2022/01/apple-celebrates-heart-month-with-new-resources-across-services

REQUIREMENTS
This app requires an iPhone that has the Health App installed. Heart readings are read from the Health Data Store which is ideally populated by your Apple Watch.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Updated for iOS 26 and WatchOS 26.
Various fixes and maintenance.

Refer to our Whats New page for more detail: https://heartwatch.tantsissa.com/faq/whats-new

If your heart is loving HeartWatch, take a heartbeat to rate us 5 stars on the App Store! The great support helps us to keep monitoring your heart to better health.

apps.title: Apple Research
apps.description:
Making the world a healthier place just got a lot easier. We invite you to join over 350,000 people contributing to groundbreaking research using Apple Watch and iPhone. Your participation will add to an unprecedented initiative that has already led to new insights in human health and advancements in Appleʼs health technologies.

1. Join the Apple Women's Health Study, conducted in partnership with the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health and National Institute of Health Sciences to help advance the understanding of menstrual cycles and health conditions such as infertility, osteoporosis, and menopause.

 2. Join the Apple Health Study, conducted in partnership with the Brigham and Women's Hospital to explore different areas of health. Researchers are especially interested in the interconnectivity of various areas of health, such as the relationship between the menstrual cycle and heart health, or how hearing health can influence mental health. The study brings together diverse perspectives to advance science and develop features that work for us all.

 3. Join the Apple Hearing Study, conducted in partnership with the University of Michigan to help advance the understanding of how sound exposure levels over time can impact your hearing, stress levels, and cardiac health.

Features:
Review available studies, learn about the research partners and the research goals, understand study expectations, and if you are eligible, enroll by providing your consent.

Choose which data to share and with what study, and review and manage data collected.

Perform relevant tasks for enrolled studies.

Learn how other Apple research studies have contributed to advancements in health science and to the development of innovative health products.

With your permission, this app can securely access the data you choose to share through the Apple Health app.

raw_data.releaseNotes: This update includes bug fixes and improvements.

apps.title: Dr. Kegel: For Men’s Health
apps.description:
The Dr. Kegel app provides men with 6 exceptional features that form a comprehensive solution for improving intimate, overall & mental health.

1. KEGEL TRAINING PLAN - The core feature to improve men's health

Kegel Training provides a step-by-step plan for strengthening Pelvic Floor (PF) muscles.

These are the muscles that stretch from the tailbone to the pubic bone. PF muscles play a key role in erectile function, ejaculation, bladder & bowel control. Without training, the PF muscles lose tone. This can impair the above-mentioned functions.

But just like you can build up your biceps with workouts, you can strengthen PF muscles with Kegel Training & improve men's health.

Kegels aka Pelvic Floor exercises are equally effective for men who feel well, as well as for those with health problems. This is confirmed by the latest studies in which 75.5% [1] of men with ED & 82.5% [2] of men with PE achieved improvements.

Kegel Training can help you achieve impressive results. Because according to the latest user survey, up to 84% of users reported improvements.

- It's SUPER EASY to work out with Kegel Training
- The workouts take just 5 minutes a day;
- Simply follow clear & intuitive instructions to contract PF muscles to the rhythm of your phone's vibration;
- You can work out in any place, position & situation. Nobody can notice;
- No extra equipment is needed;
- The difficulty automatically adjusts to you.

2. GROIN FITNESS - Additional training to accelerate results

Perform special exercises for the groin area, that increase blood flow to the groin area & strengthen the PF muscles in an extra way.

This multiplies the effect of Kegel Training & helps to achieve desired results faster.

3. PROGRESS TRACKER - Monitor your results & increase the chance of success

Take measurements & visualize your progress in clear graphs. Be sure that you are getting real results & boost your motivation to move forward.

4. MIND CLEANER - Take care of your mental health

Mind Cleaner allows you to relieve stress, anxiety & depression with an effective psychological technique. This positively affects your self-esteem & mental well-being.

5. DAILY CHALLENGES - Take simple steps to improve your lifestyle

Complete simple activities to build healthy habits for your physical & mental health, social life & eating behavior, as all of them have an immense effect on your male welfare.

6. INSIGHTS LIBRARY - Discover the latest scientific facts about Men's Health, Relationships, Nutrition & more

Get verified and straightforward answers to the most popular topics made into 2-minute stories with juicy illustrations. Incorporate valuable tips from Insights into your daily life to improve its quality, and be more productive and mindful.

All THE ABOVE MAKES DR. KEGEL IS A COMPLEX SOLUTION FOR IMPROVING MEN'S HEALTH

So install Dr. Kegel now - it can be your best decision this year!

All features require an active subscription.

The Dr. Kegel App and its associated content are for informational and educational purposes only. Dr. Kegel is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The use of this app does not establish a doctor-patient or any other professional healthcare relationship. It's recommended consulting a healthcare professional before starting any exercises or making lifestyle changes.

Privacy Policy - http://appercut.eu/privacy-policy.html
Terms & Conditions - http://appercut.eu/terms.html

If you have any difficulties while using Dr. Kegel or any ideas for improvement, please let us know at support@appercut.eu

[1] Clinical study on the effects of pelvic floor muscle training for men with ED
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1324914/
[2] Clinical study on the effects of pelvic floor muscle training for men with PE
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4003840/

*Dr. Kegel is the most downloaded kegel app in the World according to Sensor Tower analytics

raw_data.releaseNotes:
88.4% of users achieved improvements. This info is based on in-app user survey results.

We are grateful to all users of the Dr. Kegel app.

This update includes bug fixes.

As always, if you have any issues or ideas for improvement, please let us know at support@appercut.eu

Yours sincerely,
Dr. Kegel Team

apps.title: Ballad Health
apps.description:
When you download the Ballad Health app to your mobile device, you get immediate access to secure online healthcare features, such as MyChart, guest bill pay, and Ballad Health Connected CareTM telehealth services.

The MyChart online health management tool gives you access to your health record from anywhere there’s internet – 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

With MyChart, you can:
- Manage appointments
- Request prescription refills
- View test results
- Message your Ballad Health provider
- Access shot records
- Request an E-Visit
- Pay your bill
- Estimate your medical bill
- Upload health and fitness data from Apple's "Health app”, when enrolled in self-tracking programs via MyChart

MyChart also offers convenience when you’re staying in the hospital:
- View your lab results
- Receive education on your condition
- Get an after-visit summary
- See follow-up appointments
- View complete records from your hospital stay

You can also serve as a proxy with MyChart for another patient, your child or another adult for example. Just ask a Ballad Health team member for the appropriate paperwork to stay up-to-date on a loved one’s health record.

Open the Ballad Health app when you want to pay your medical bill as a guest without having to log in. The Ballad Health app makes paying your bill easy, fast and convenient, saving you a stamp and a trip to the mailbox.

If patients want to receive healthcare from the comfort of home, Ballad Health Connected Care™ offers urgent care telehealth visits. You can request an on-demand urgent care appointment through the Ballad Health app for a number of medical conditions, such as hay fever, mild abdominal pain, pink eye, shingles and sinus infections, just to name a few. Once you have been scheduled for a telehealth visit, you will participate in a one-on-one video visit with a healthcare provider.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and app enhancements

apps.title: Iron Health
apps.description:
Meet Iron Health. We’re a virtual care partner for OB/GYNs and the patients that rely on them. Think of us ⁠as an extension of your OB/GYN’s office – a convenient, secure, 100% virtual space for all those in-between-visit conversations and care. 

HOW IT WORKS
Iron Health partners with your OB/GYN to provide extended care, which can include primary care services, chronic disease prevention & management, nutrition & health coaching, mental healthcare, and more. 

Through our secure, HIPAA-compliant app, Iron Health delivers care 100% virtually.

Use Iron Health to easily:

+ Book virtual appointments
+ Attend video visits with our team of licensed providers
+ Message your dedicated Iron Health care team
+ Access your personal care plan
+ Track and achieve your wellness goals
+ Track your activity both manually and by bringing in data from the health app using the HealthKit API integration
+ Access educational resources
+ And more

Download the free app to access the care programs your OB/GYN has selected.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Now you can view patient medications and prescriptions in the app.
• Minor bug fixes and optimizations.

apps.title: iHeart-Pulse Rate Monitor App.
apps.description:
iHeart - Health at your fingertips

*Important
iHeart is not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. The app is not a medical device and users should always seek the advice of a medical professional before making any medical decisions

Main benefits of the app:

-Heart rate tracking: Track your heart rate in real time and generate a visual table for you to help you better observe heart rate changes

-Daily check-in: Record your daily health check-in, track your habits, help you maintain a regular schedule, and develop a healthier lifestyle.

-Blood pressure and blood sugar log: Support manual recording of health data (such as blood pressure, blood sugar), view history and generate simple charts to facilitate your tracking of daily habits.

-Activity tracker: Develop healthy habits with our habit tracker

The app requires iOS 14.0 or later

Disclaimer: This app is only for manual recording of health data and does not provide any diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any questions, please consult a professional doctor.

Download iHeart now and start your health journey!

About subscription:

You can cancel your subscription at any time

If you purchase on an annual basis, your iTunes account will be deducted. Unless you disable auto-renewal, renewal will be automatically charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time by going to your Account Settings in the AppStore after purchase.

Payment and Subscription Terms:
Choose from the following subscription options for unlimited access to all features
• Weekly Subscription
• Yearly Subscription

Manage your subscription directly from your iPhone
Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to Account Settings
- Open the Settings app
- Tap your name.
- Tap Subscriptions.
- Tap the subscription you want to manage.

Privacy Policy: https://remhopte.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://remhopte.com/term
Contact Us: kkheartmail@proton.me

apps.title: Beurer HealthCoach
apps.description:
With the free of charge HealthCoach app we offer an application for easy record and overview of your measurements. All in one app. Health management as it should be today. Forget the many handwritten notes of your weight development. Also record your daily activity and sleep rhythm with ease.

Whether you are on holiday, business trip or at the doctor, you always can view and track your values. Switch easily between weight, blood pressure, activity, sleep pulse oximeter sections.

Each area has a cockpit where the last measured value is clearly illustrated and displayed informatively. Progress graphs and tables with measured values give you a quick and convenient overview of your measurements and make managing mobile health data fun - from anywhere and at any time.
 
Some features of the app:
- Cockpit display of the last measured value 
- Progress graphs of all measured values 
- Table of all measured values
- Integration with Apple Health

apps.title: League - Better Benefits
apps.description:
League is your one place for everything you need to take charge of your health and benefits to live happier and healthier every day.

Digital Wallet: Easily check out your coverage, health spending accounts and submit claims with just a tap, right from your phone. 

Real-time Chat: Get one-on-one, personalized advice for any health question, big or small, from our expert team of registered nurses, including signs, symptoms, and treatment options. Get live support from our Care Team to learn everything you’re covered for, find local health providers, help with your League account, and much more. 

Health Programs: Start a step-by-step Health Program and tackle more than 25 common health concerns while you get rewarded for building better habits. Along the way, you’ll earn League rewards points that you can redeem for League Credit to get health products you’ll love in Lifemarket. 

Lifemarket: Use League Credit, your spending account, or good ol’ cash to reward yourself with health products you’ll love. Curated health items and experiences are hand-picked just for you from trusted vendors. Plus, access exclusive weekly content in The Well. 

Health Journey: Start a personalized, day-by-day journey filled with activities, content, and support specially focused on your individual needs. All in one place, on your own time, and at no cost to you.

Connect Devices: Hook up Apple Health and your connected wearables so that you can automatically track your progress, sync health info, and get extra motivation to hit your goals.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We’ve made some performance updates and bug fixes to improve your League experience.

apps.title: Oscar Health
apps.description:
The Oscar app helps make your healthcare experience even easier. Access your plan and benefits whenever, and wherever.

Here's some great stuff you can do with the app:

• ﻿﻿See all your plan information by pulling up your ID card on the go.
• Find care right away – whether you’re searching for a specific condition or specialty, we’ll show you everyone in network.
﻿﻿• Talk to a provider 24/7 with Virtual Urgent Care.
• Message us with your questions. Our AI Support answers in seconds and our Care Guides are right there, too.
• Earn awesome rewards with Oscar Unlocks!*
• Set up autopay or pay your bill, no need to dig through emails.

*Not available in all markets and certain restrictions apply.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Hooray! Earn rewards just for making the most of your plan with our newest program: Oscar Unlocks!
• Plus, bug fixes and happy little tweaks!

apps.title: Omada
apps.description:
As an Omada participant, the app gives you the best of the program experience and makes it even easier for you to stay engaged. 

With the app, you can:
Connect with your coach via direct messaging
Track your meals while you’re out and about
Track your steps and physical activity from Apple's Health App
Read and complete your weekly lessons in a mobile-friendly format
View your personal progress chart any time 
Interact with your group members on the group board

Omada® is one of the most engaging and effective ways to reduce your risk for a host of serious, preventable diseases, including type 2 diabetes and heart disease. We combine the science of behavior change with unwavering personal support, so you can make changes that actually stick.

About Omada Health:
We’ve pioneered digital behavioral medicine: a new approach to tackling the growing epidemic of type 2 diabetes, heart disease, and obesity. Our online programs combine world-class science, technology, and design to inspire and enable people everywhere to live free of chronic disease.

Named one of Fast Company’s “50 Most Innovative Companies in the World,” our team includes passionate and talented individuals from Google, IDEO, Harvard, Stanford, and Columbia. Our approach has been embraced by major employers across the country, including Costco and Iron Mountain, as well as leading health plans, such as Kaiser Permanente and BlueCross Blue Shield of Louisiana.

apps.title: WiseLife: Step & Health
apps.description:
WiseLife: Your Path to Health and Rewards!

Transform your daily steps into real rewards with WiseLife! Our innovative step counter app not only tracks your activity but also helps you earn EXP (Experience Points) that you can cash out for exciting rewards.

Key Features:
Daily Sign-In Rewards: Earn EXP just for checking in each day!
Step Conversion: Every step counts! Convert your steps into EXP and watch your rewards grow.
Hydration Tracking: Mark each cup of water you drink to earn even more EXP. Staying hydrated has never been more rewarding!
Goal Achievement: Set and reach daily goals for steps, calories burned, and walking distance to earn extra EXP.
Graphical Trends: Visualize your progress with beautiful graphs that track your daily steps and achievements over time.
Cash Out Your EXP: Redeem your hard-earned EXP for exciting gift cards, including Amazon gift cards, Visa prepaid cards, or direct transfers to your PayPal account.

Join the WiseLife community today and start turning your healthy habits into real rewards! Whether you're walking, hydrating, or just checking in, every action brings you closer to your goals.

Download WiseLife now and step into a healthier, more rewarding future! 

If you have any questions, please contact us at official email: wiselife369@gmail.com.

apps.title: Luscii
apps.description:
Luscii is designed with patients in mind, offering an intuitive platform that makes remote care accessible and easy to use. By connecting patients with their healthcare providers, the app fosters a seamless experience for managing health conditions and treatments remotely. Luscii empowers patients with tools to monitor their health and stay informed while maintaining a close connection to their care team. 

Video calling and secure chat features ensure you can reach your provider for advice, follow-ups, or check-ins when needed. Notifications keep you updated about essential actions or new information, while progress tracking helps you monitor key health metrics such as heart rate, blood pressure, weight, and pain levels in a single app.

With over a decade of experience and more than 350 implementations across 150 care pathways, Luscii is a trusted solution for remote care. Its effectiveness is validated by over 30 clinical studies, showing significant improvements in patient outcomes and overall care quality. Hundreds of healthcare institutions worldwide rely on Luscii to support diverse treatments and conditions, giving patients confidence in its capabilities.
Luscii is a CE-marked medical device that adheres to European safety and performance standards. Your data is processed in compliance with the 

General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), ensuring your privacy and security. Certified medical hardware compatible with Luscii meets rigorous standards for health, safety, and environmental protection in the European Economic Area. Luscii, based in Amsterdam, remains committed to patient safety and quality care.

It is important to note that Luscii is an enhancement to your medical treatment but does not replace it. Always consult your healthcare provider for personalized medical advice.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Regional Updates:
- Added US-specific disclaimer and consent button.
- Improved regional controls for faster responses.

Self-Care:
- Improved how Self-Care information loads and displays.

Data Handling:
- Unified all date and time formats for better consistency.

Performance & Stability:
- Faster and more stable health measurements and video calls.
- Improved backend connections and overall app reliability.

Maintenance:
- Updated SDKs, build tools, and workflows for smoother releases.

apps.title: LiveWell with Advocate Aurora
apps.description:
Get all your health info in one convenient place.

With our new LiveWell app, you can manage your health and wellness – as well as everyone who counts on you.

You can:

Start a video visit or e-visit to get a fast diagnosis and treatment plan

Manage care for yourself and everyone who counts on you all in one place

Find a doctor or location near you

View maps and driving directions

Schedule appointments and get medications for everyone who depends on you

Message your providers and care team

Pay your bill

Take health quizzes

Get the latest health and wellness insights

Check lab and test results

Live mindfully with guided meditation exercises

Upload health and fitness data, including data from the Apple Health app, when enrolled in self-tracking programs

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’re making it easier to find your favorite health & wellness content. Now you can make an appointment, find urgent care and access wellness information right from the main menu.

This update also includes miscellaneous performance improvements and bug fixes.

apps.title: everlywell
apps.description:
Put convenient healthcare in your hands—and in your phone—with the free Everlywell App. 

At Everlywell, we believe taking action on your health and wellness should be affordable, easy, and keep you feeling good.

The free Everlywell App provides a seamless, secure, and simple at-home health care experience— wherever you are. 

TELEHEALTH WHEN (AND WHERE) YOU NEED IT
Sick and tired of being sick and tired? We got you. Get care for your concerns from the comfort of home with our new telehealth offering (cash pay and insurance payment options available). Join appointments, view care plans, and more right from the Everlywell App.

Support includes:
• View upcoming and completed appointments
• Schedule and join appointments 
• View care plans 
• Get push notifications about appointments and care plans

MORE COLLECTION SUPPORT FOR YOUR EVERLYWELL TESTS
We know that collecting your own sample may be a new (and exciting!) experience, but with our network of partner labs processing nearly 900,000 blood collection cards in a given year, the Everlywell App can provide you with our collection expertise along the way. 

Support includes:
• Collection tips with the best times of day to collect your sample
• Reminders unique to your test, so you never miss a step or collection window
• The use of Everlywell’s Spotwell Technology: For certain tests, you can use the scanner on your phone’s camera to provide you with instant feedback on your blood spot card to guarantee accurate collection 
• Access to our Customer Care team to have your questions answered 

With convenient telehealth, a suite of vitamins and supplements, and over 30+ at-home lab tests with physician-reviewed results, your healthier tomorrow can start today. You’ve got this!

"...an amazing tool to learn a bit more about your insides" - Marie Claire
"Everlywell is your one stop shop for all your at home testing needs" - Rolling Stone

Disclaimers: 

Everlywell offers health and wellness solutions including laboratory testing for wellness monitoring, informational and educational use. With the exception of certain diagnostic test panels, the tests we offer access to are not intended to diagnose or treat disease. None of our tests are intended to be a substitute for seeking professional medical advice, help, diagnosis, or treatment. For regulatory reasons, our tests are not available in NY with the exception of COVID-19.

Everlywell does not provide professional medical advice. Rather, the Everlywell platform can be used to connect with an independent healthcare provider who can assess your condition. All prescription medications require a consultation with an independent healthcare provider. Prescriptions can be filled by a pharmacy of your choice. Additional terms and conditions apply.

apps.title: Triad Health
apps.description:
Taking care of family members can be overwhelming, especially when it comes to managing their health. Triad Health is your guide to managing health care for you and your loved ones.

This app helps you easily manage conditions and stay on track when it comes to caring for your family and yourself. Plus with the health snapshot, you’ll have peace of mind knowing you’re prepared with all of the right information when an emergency pops up. 

• Create accounts for the whole familyIs this ok: Taking care of family members can be overwhelming, especially when it comes to managing their health. Triad Health is your guide to managing health care for you and your loved ones.

This app helps you easily manage conditions and stay on track when it comes to caring for your family and yourself. Plus with the health snapshot, you’ll have peace of mind knowing you’re prepared with all of the right information when an emergency pops up. 

• Create accounts for the whole family, including pets

• Upload and store medicines, health data, insurance cards, doctors, pharmacies, allergies, and more

• Use the health tracker to keep track of vitals including weight, blood glucose, heart rate, blood pressure, cholesterol, and more

• Manage conditions, share profiles, and stay informed with family and loved ones using the Triad Health app

• Use the health calendar to manage health appointments, get reminders, and invite loved ones to attend. Plus, add upcoming surgeries to stay organized and track progress from preparation through recovery.

• Track potential side effects and interactions between medicines and allergies 

• Get medicine reminders and refill reminders so you can avoid falling out of routine and missing doses

• Create and share health snapshots with loved ones and healthcare providers so you’re prepared at your next appointment. 

• Look up symptom causes, get recommendations for care, learn about potential complications, and much more with the symptom checker.

• Use the healthbook to stay organized and store medical contacts in one place for easy reference when making appointments, filling out forms, and sharing care plans with family members

• Connect Taking care of family members can be overwhelming, especially when it comes to managing their health. Triad Health is your guide to managing health care for you and your loved ones.

• Connect Triad Health with HealthKit to better manage your health. This app integrates with the Health app to read and track then consolidate your health data (e.g. wellness tracking, vitals, and basic information) in one convenient place on the Triad Health App.

Triad Health is here to help you take control of your health management and feel confident knowing your data is safe and secure. We manage health care information responsibly; all of your information is 100% private and secure.

Always seek the guidance of your doctor or other qualified health professional with any questions you may have regarding your health or a medical condition and seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app before making any medical decisions. apps.title: My Duke Health
apps.description:
Note: This replaces the existing MyChart app for Duke patients. If you previously accessed your account on the MyChart app, please discontinue use and download this new, Duke-specific app to access your account. 

At Duke Health, your well-being is at the center of everything we do. The My Duke Health App makes it easy to stay connected with Duke Health and offers you access to the health information of you and your family whenever you want it. With the My Duke Health app, you can conveniently manage your health information and: 
•	See urgent care wait times 
•	Find a Duke doctor
•	Access Duke’s approved health resource library  
•	Easily access Duke Virtual Urgent Care offerings 
•	Find location based resources like parking and hotels
•	Stay connected with Duke Health news, blogs, and  social media 
Through the My Duke Health app, log in to:  
•	Conduct video visits 
•	Review test results, medications, immunization history, and more 
•	Communicate with your care team 
•	Schedule and manage appointments 
•	View visit summaries and doctors’ notes from past visits and hospital stays 
•	View and pay medical bills 
•	Access your family’s health information through proxy access 
•	Securely share your medical record online
•	Connect patient accounts from other hospitals or clinics  
•	Connect your account to Apple HealthKit to share health-related data from mobile devices 

You will need to have an active account to use all the features of the My Duke Health app. If you do not have an existing Duke MyChart account, you can register on our website: https://www.dukemychart.org/home/accesscheck.asp 

To learn more about My Duke Health, see our FAQs: https://www.dukemychart.org/home/Authentication/Login?mode=stdfile&option=faq

•	Access your family’s health information through proxy access 
•	Securely share your medical record online
•	Connect patient accounts from other hospitals or clinics  
•	Connect your account to Apple HealthKit to share health-related data from mobile devices 

You will need to have an active account to use all the features of the My Duke Health app. If you do not have an existing Duke MyChart account, you can register on our website: https://www.dukemychart.org/home/accesscheck.asp 

To learn more about My Duke Health, see our FAQs: https://www.dukemychart.org/home/Authentication/Login?mode=stdfile&option=faq

apps.title: Health - Heart Rate Monitor
apps.description:
Heart Rate Monitor: Your Personal Health Companion

Discover the ultimate app for tracking your heart rate, heart rate variability (HRV), daily steps, and now blood oxygen levels with ease and precision. Say goodbye to manual pulse meters and hello to Heart Rate Monitor, your all-in-one health monitoring solution. Perfect for individuals who value their well-being and want to stay on top of their fitness levels.

Innovative Features:





Heart Rate & HRV Monitoring: Utilize advanced algorithms to measure your heart rate accurately. Analyze your HRV to gain insights into your stress, energy, and readiness levels, with detailed HRV data displayed. These features become personalized over time as the app gathers more information, offering tailored insights into your physiological status.



Step Counting: Track your daily activity with step counting, including detailed breakdowns for hourly, daily, weekly, and monthly progress.



Blood Oxygen Recording: Monitor your blood oxygen levels with the newly enabled feature, providing deeper insights into your respiratory and cardiovascular health.



Blood Pressure Logging: Easily track and organize your blood pressure readings for convenient monitoring.



Breathing Exercise Feature: Improve your well-being with guided breathing exercises.



Fitness Level Insights: Gain valuable information on your fitness levels and potential heart disease risks.



Workout Intensity Tracking: Ideal for monitoring high-intensity interval training or cardio workouts, with personalized heart rate zones.

User-Friendly & Reliable:

Our users love how Heart Rate Monitor has replaced their traditional pulse meters and manual logs. The app offers easy monitoring, with well-organized categories for resting, exercising, and post-exercise heart rates.

Seamless Integration:

Heart Rate Monitor syncs seamlessly with the Health App, sharing your heart rate, blood oxygen, and step count records for a comprehensive health overview. Just ensure a well-lit environment for optimal camera performance, and you’ll have your results in seconds!

How to Use:





Launch the app.



Place the tip of your finger on your phone’s camera.



Ensure the flash LED is on.



Don’t press too hard.

Important Disclaimer:

Heart Rate Monitor is not a medical device and should not be used for medical purposes. HRV and blood oxygen features provide insights into physiological status only and are not indicators of psychological conditions. Always consult a healthcare professional for any health concerns. The app is ad-supported. For terms of use, please visit our blog page.

Download the Heart Rate Monitor App NOW and embark on a journey towards a healthier you!

This application integrates with the Health App and shares Heart Rate and Blood Oxygen Records with the Health App.

Terms of Use: https://myheartratemonitorapp.blogspot.com/2018/07/terms-of-use-ios.html

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Version 4.01
1. new feature: Blood Oxygen logging feature
2. Interface update.

apps.title: RENPHO Health
apps.description:
Good health comes first!
RENPHO Health is the best helper in your journey to becoming fitter. The app can track multiple body composition metrics (BMI, Body Fat %, Body Water, Bone Mass, Basal Metabolism Body Age, Muscle Mass, etc). The cloud-based App’s intelligent data analysis and tracking abilities makes it your perfect digital personal helper. It can even convert your data stored over time into charts and reports that can easily be shared by e-mail and multiple social media channels. On top of all that, your entire family can use the App! RENPHO Health allows the user to create multiple personal profiles to keep your data separated.
When you use our smart body scales measuring body composition , weight, percentage of body fat , fat weight, height, body mass index (BMI), height and resting calorie consumption data will be synchronized to HealthKit in.

How to connect to Apple Health:
1. After install the Renpho Health App and log in successfully for the first time, a pop-up will prompt to ask whether to allow Renpho Health to access all your health data, please tap Allow in the upper right corner;
2. Open Apple Health, enter your profile, tap Apps> Renpho Health, tap Turn All Categories On;
3. After authorization, your Body Fat Percentage, Body Mass Index, and Lean Body Mass will be synchronized to Apple Health.

PLEASE note:
1.When you have purchased one of our medical products (such as a blood pressure monitor), please consult your doctor if you experience any discomfort during use, and the data is for reference only.
2.Medical devices are only available in the USA and UK

Simplify your benefits

apps.title: Best Life
apps.description:
Finally, a health tracker that includes all the things you expect it to. Mood tracker, medication tracker, symptom tracker, fitness tracker, nutrition tracker, you name it, Best Life can do it.

Combining features and data from micro-apps, Best Life helps you understand the big picture of your physical and mental health. Start using Best Life as your health tracker then see insights based solely on the data you put in. Identify triggers for chronic conditions. Learn what gives you anxiety. See how the environment impacts your health in ways never before possible.

Best Life is an all-in-one software for personal insights and data privacy, safeguarded by state-of-the-art security and a Nonprofit data foundation (this bit is critical, learn why on our website llif.org/faq).

Best Life makes logging anything and everything as simple as a tap. Add anything you want to track as an Event, and use Measurements for basic health vitals like blood glucose, weight, blood pressure, and more. Add notes to replace your current journal app, so you don't have to go to many places to see your data anymore! Want to track things for a loved one? Easy! Add a tag to their data and filter by it in your Diary timeline to review later. 

DIARY/JOURNAL

• Record food, drinks, medications, supplements, stress, moods, activity like exercise and social outings, hobbies, online bookmarks, and more
• Record health Events like bowel movements, symptoms, or emotions
• Add Event details like duration and intensity, event types, nutritional values, or category tags

DATA GRAPHS

• Discover patterns between your lifestyle, the environment, and symptoms
• Receive weekly trend analysis reports directly to your in-app inbox
• Sync with popular data provides for easy access to and storage for your data

BEST LIFE FOR EVERYONE

• Chronic condition patients
• Family caregivers
• Individual innovators
• Productivity gurus
• Lifestyle hobbyists
• Anyone and everyone who uses mobile apps to manage their daily lives!

#Consolidate mood journals, symptom trackers, fitness apps, health monitor data, and more.

#Track symptoms, compare them to environmental trends, identify triggers, and leverage data analysis tools to live a healthier, more engaging life.

#Empower yourself to govern anxiety, depression, and other health conditions seamlessly.

#What if you could see all your information in a way that makes sense?

Best Life Health Diary by the Live Learn Innovate Foundation (LLIF) lets you view unique insights from combined health data, environment (weather, air, and pollen) data, online activity data, and personal journal entries. The Live Learn Innovate Foundation's "Best Life" is a mobile and web app that turns your digital life into a visual diary. 

Sync with Apple Health, Google Fit, Fitbit, and more, then capture your Location to overcome device data barriers.

Use us to build your data lake. Strengthen your base with features like a mood diary, event logs, category tags, weather and pollen data, and integrations with big data providers.

See it all in one super-app. Weather, air quality, pollen, heart rate, symptoms, moods, fitness data, food and calories, and health monitors, all these data lakes combined will grant you unique knowledge.

This tool brings in all the information you allow and creates daily, unique insights inspired by your life. By storing that data without profit bias, you overcome device barriers between providers. 

See your life differently today.

Follow us on social media to support our mission to return data independence to the people!
TW/IG/FB @getbestlifeapp

Need help? Reach us anytime [support@getbestlife.app]

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We believe your Best Life starts with small, intentional steps—and now it's even easier to stay on track.

- Bug fixes and improvements
- Login issues

Whether you’re logging a run, tracking your meals, or checking in on your energy, you’ll feel more in control—and more motivated.

This update is part of our promise to help you reflect, act, and grow—one step at a time.
Let’s build your Best Life, together.

apps.title: Calm Health
apps.description:
Calm Health is an invitation-only app from your health insurance plan, physician/care team, or employer.

From the makers of Calm, the leading app for sleep, meditation and relaxation, Calm Health is your guide on the path to better mental and physical wellness. Calm Health features a variety of programs created by our trusted team of psychologists to help you manage your mental and physical health at your own pace. 

Whether you’re experiencing symptoms of anxiety or depression, are working or plan to work with a mental health professional such as a therapist or psychiatrist, or just feel that you need help with your mental and physical health, Calm Health can be a source of support and guidance.

When you sign up for Calm Health, you’ll receive a personalized action plan to help you understand your health and guide you through recommended programs most relevant to your individual needs. You’ll also have ongoing opportunities to complete  short screenings that will give you insight into where you are in your journey and help Calm Health give you a more personalized experience.

Calm Health features:

   * Clinically validated, evidence-based programs developed by psychologists 
   * Simple, effective mental health screenings based on standard questionnaires used by mental health professionals
   * Personalized action plans that include recommendations for programs and resources
   * Condition-specific programs for symptoms of anxiety, depression, heart conditions, cancer, weight management, and more
   * Programs for life experiences including women’s health, support for parents of teenagers, and help with stressful situations like divorce or the loss of a loved one
   * Specific programs created for various occupations, e.g. nurses, physicians, caregivers, and others

Compliance with HITRUST and HIPAA privacy and security standards.

Calm Health is a mental health wellness product. Calm Health is not intended to diagnose or treat depression, anxiety, or any other disease or condition. Calm Health is not a substitute for care by a physician or other health care provider. Any questions that you may have regarding the diagnosis, care, or treatment of a medical condition should be directed to your physician or health care provider.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Introducing Mindshift. A new weekly audio series with insights into the surprising science of your mind and body. Learn something new, shift your perspective, and live with more intention.
Bug fixes and improvements

apps.title: K Health | Primary Care
apps.description:
24/7 ACCESS TO HIGH-QUALITY MEDICAL CARE FROM YOUR PHONE. NO INSURANCE REQUIRED.    

Get the treatment you need from licensed medical providers without setting foot in a doctor’s office. Providers on the K Health platform can treat hundreds of medical conditions, from anxiety to UTIs, and prescribe medication to get you feeling better faster.

At K Health, we use advanced AI to provide better, more personalized medical care. Try it out for free by checking your symptoms: We’ll compare your case to millions of real patient records and tell you how people like you were diagnosed and treated.*

Then, you can chat with a provider to get the care you need. Pay just $49/month** for unlimited visits, $73 for a one-time virtual visit, or $449 for an entire year of unlimited visits (for a savings of $139).

With the K Health app, you can:

-Get free, clinically-proven information about your symptoms from the same AI your provider uses to make smarter medical decisions

-Chat with a medical provider about urgent medical needs 24/7 by text and video

-Make virtual appointments with a provider who can help you manage (and prevent) chronic conditions like high blood pressure, diabetes, high cholesterol, and more

-Get generic prescription medication shipped directly to your door, saving you time and money

-Stay on top of lab orders, medication management, and specialist referrals

WHAT WE TREAT 

Urgent care:
-Cold and flu
-Indigestion and abdominal pain
-UTIs 
-Headaches and migraines
-Dental pain
-Rashes

Chronic care:
-Weight management
-Anxiety and depression
-High blood pressure
-High cholesterol
-Diabetes (type 2)
-Acid reflux

... and hundreds more


*The results from the Symptom Checker are not medical advice or a diagnosis, but you can connect with a medical provider practicing on the K Health platform for diagnosis and treatment.
**Billed quarterly after the first month

apps.title: MedMutual WELL
apps.description:
MedMutual WELL™ helps you be the healthiest you can be for yourself and those you love. Whatever your goals are, the program provides a range of tools and resources to navigate your way to a healthier you. Including:


· Access your personalized journey based on your current health status and preferences

· Link to Apple's Health App or a health tracker to sync your activity

· Create and track goals on a variety of health topics

· Access health content and educational tools relevant to your focus areas

· Stay motivated and get rewarded by earning points and achieving a status (if applicable)

Download the app today to take the first step in your personalized health journey!

Anyone can download this app, but you have to be a MedMutual WELL member to register or log in to the mobile app.

Note: Rewards vary and may not be available to all program participants. The content in the screens shown may vary based on the individual user.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using the MedMutual WELL app. We are always looking for ways to improve your app experience and thank you for your feedback, rating and reviewing the app. In this update you'll find: 

- General bug fixes and improvements

apps.title: Luminis Health
apps.description:
With the Luminis Health app you’ll be able to:
•	Access your medical records from any device – anywhere, anytime.
•	Schedule and manage your appointments.
•	Schedule a video visit with participating providers.
•	Request prescription refills.
•	Message your physician.
•	Update your health profile.
•	Pay your bill online.
•	View and download content, such as medical history, imaging reports or lab results.
•	Upload health and fitness data, including data from the Apple Health app, when you enroll in Track My Health.
•	Keep track of your pregnancy progress with Babyscripts as your premier prenatal & postpartum resource
•	Explore your path to overall wellness via the Wellness Wheel.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Miscellaneous fixes and improvements.

apps.title: MyUofMHealth
apps.description:
Michigan Medicine offers easy access to your medical care through the patient portal at MyUofMHealth.

If you are a current patient at Michigan Medicine, you can request a patient portal account during a clinic visit or at MyUofMHealth.org.

Some of the features and functions available to you through your MyUofMHealth patient portal include*:
•eCheck-In: Verify information to save time when you arrive for your visit
•Fast Pass: Get notification if earlier appointments become available
•Communicate with your care team 
•Request appointments for you and your children
•View appointments and receive reminders
•Fill out questionnaires prior to your visit
•Review test/lab results
•Request refills of eligible medications
•View billing statements and pay your bill*
•Conduct E-Visits: Submit a questionnaire regarding your symptoms for a variety of conditions and receive a quick reply from a Michigan Medicine provider through the MyUofMHealth portal*
•Track your health and link to other health apps – i.e. steps, weight
•Upload health and fitness data, including data from the Apple Health app, when enrolled in self-tracking programs

*Not all features available for all user accounts

apps.title: My Lifestyle iQ
apps.description:
My Lifestyle iQ is a content rich Remote Patient Management app that allows you to manage critical areas of health and prevention. It is self-directed, but is also used by doctors to enhance your in-office care by integrating multiple domains including exercise, nutrition, brain health, positive psychology and the 6 areas of functional preventative health.

MLiQ provides practical programs in 20+ areas including Weight Loss, Pre-diabetic protocols, Gut Restoration, Fatigue, Stress Reduction, Meditations, Cleanses, Positive Mental/Social Well-being, Prevention, a Wellness Boot Camp, Enhancing Immunity and more.

If you have a doctor who is an MLiQ office, your information will be automatically transmitted to your private files so that you and your provider will be able to design personalized health programs, providing you with support and oversight, and giving you 24/7 access to communicating with the office.

Education is critical in empowering you with the knowledge to make your own health care choices/better health care choices. MLiQ includes information, research and consumer based education to this end.

Welcome to the ART OF LIVING WELL.

raw_data.releaseNotes: The New MLiQ App: A new experience that makes managing critical areas of health and prevention better than ever.

apps.title: Ramp Health
apps.description:
Welcome to Ramp Health! As the leading provider of workplace health, safety, and well-being solutions, we provide everything you need in a personalized 24/7 resource to guide your healthy lifestyle journey. Through customized content and simple navigation, our unique approach to personalization keeps you engaged, empowering you to make lasting behavior changes.     

Your Ramp Health experience is precisely tuned to your specific needs, interests, and any health history you choose to include. Rest assured, our app fully complies with HIPAA and privacy regulations, ensuring your data remains safe and confidential.    

Discover these key features and more within the app*:   

• Personalized content and courses served up just for you     
• Recommendations and activities that fit your lifestyle     
• Access to your personal health profile with actionable steps to reduce health risks    
• Challenges, missions, and events to keep you motivated    
• Expert guidance from a variety of healthcare professionals  

*Feature availability may vary based on your program set-up.   

Download the app today to take advantage of this unique and inspiring digital health experience.

apps.title: NYU Langone Health
apps.description:
As an NYU Langone Health patient, you can use our app to manage your health information and care on a mobile device. 

When you log in to the app with your NYU Langone Health MyChart account, you'll have convenient access to features including:  

• Health summary: See your current health concerns, medications, immunizations, allergies, and more. 
• Appointments: Find the right doctor for your needs; schedule or cancel upcoming visits; and see information about previous appointments. 
• Test results: View lab test results and information about what they mean. 
• Messages: Communicate conveniently with your care team. 
• Health advisories: Be notified when it’s time for your annual physical, flu shot, and other preventive care needs. 
• Proxy access: View health information for designated family members, including children. 
• Remote monitoring: Connect the app with Apple Health to monitor and share key health information with your care team, such as blood glucose, blood pressure, oxygen saturation, steps, temperature, and weight. 

(Disclaimer: Remote patient monitoring through the NYU Langone Health app requires prior enrollment of the patient by a healthcare provider. The app currently does not support individual usage without clinician consent and support. Patients must always consult with their healthcare provider before making any changes to a care plan.)

raw_data.releaseNotes: Thank you for using NYU Langone Health App, we have some performance improvements & bug fixes in this version of the app.

apps.title: Wellhub (Gympass)
apps.description:
Wellhub is an employee benefit provided by companies.

Choose from a variety of options for fitness, mindfulness, nutrition, and sleep — all designed to cost less than paying for each individually. Free trial is available.

Use your Wellhub plan to:

 - Visit your favorite gyms and studios — or try something new every day.
Explore hundreds of activities like swimming, yoga, CrossFit, dance, and more.

- Instantly access premium apps for meditation, sleep, and nutrition to support your mind and body.

- Join virtual classes, work with expert personal trainers, and stay well wherever you are.

- Participate in fun wellness challenges with coworkers and friends.

- Your company might offer the option to add family members to your plan.

Wellhub is how your company invests in your wellbeing–every day. Want Wellhub at your company or organization? 
→ https://wellhub.com/en-us/refer-your-company/

Visit our website: https://wellhub.com

Connect with us on:   
→ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wellhub/
→ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/wellhub/
→ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@wellhub

raw_data.releaseNotes: Enhanced performance to give you a smoother and faster experience. Keep enjoying all the Wellhub features more efficiently!

apps.title: Health & Medical News and Tips
apps.description:
Health News Coverage from all leading health news sites, podcasts and blogs.

Get healthy and feel better with all the news from the medical community: new studies, new medicines and the most recent health laws and health care legislation. 

Features:
* All stories, from all prominent sources - in one easy to use app

* Clean feed with no repeat stories - see all the sources that covered any story with a simple tap

* Widget - Glance at the news on your homescreen and stay up to date

* Subscribe for push notifications on the health topics and diseases

* A prioritized feed - the most prominent stories appear first

* Push notifications for prominent stories

* Follow specific topics, like blood pressure, diabetes, smoking or anything else - just choose these topics to add to your personal feed - you can also block topics you're not interested in

* A health centric video channel, curated from top health channels

*Join the community! Post stories or polls, comment on stories, and tag articles!

* Read later - save interesting stories easily and for free

* Collapsed mode - skim through the news and decide what you want to read, save or share

* Block source - filter out unwanted sources

Love the app? Give us a five star rating, write a review and share the app with your friends! 

Need Help? Let us know here: https://loyalfoundry.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/1

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: https://www.loyal.app/privacy-policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Critical crash resolved.
iPad UI Fixes.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

apps.title: myHC360+
apps.description:
myHC360+ guides you on your journey to a healthier life. Access your personal health information to uncover the risks your body may be hiding. Work directly with our bilingual Health Coaches to improve your health or overcome your habits including unhealthy eating, nicotine use, and more. Track activity towards your company’s wellness programs and challenges, connect with colleagues through our social feed and peer to peer challenges.
 
Activity & Health tracking
    * Track your exercise, steps, weight, sleep, blood pressure, heart rate, cholesterol, glucose, nicotine, and more.
 
Health challenges
    * Participate in company-wide health challenges with and against your colleagues. Create your own fun challenges and have fun getting healthy.
 
Biometric surveys and screenings
    * Take your Health Risk Assessment (HRA) survey on the go with the myHealthCheck360 app
    * Access your biometric screening results
    * Earn a score based on your results and gain access to ways to improve
 
Wellbeing Activities
    * Be healthy, get rewarded.
    * Whether it’s going to the doctor, running a 5k, or logging your nutrition habits, you’ll be eligible for credits and monetary rewards based on your organization’s preferences.
 
Apple Health Integration
    * Retrieve existing health data from Apple Health for increased accuracy and ease-of-entry.
    * Connect multiple devices to your Apple Health account to be shared with myHC360+.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes: This update includes various bug fixes and performance enhancements to ensure a smoother, more reliable experience.

apps.title: Fitness App (ABC Trainerize)
apps.description:
The #1 coaching app to better engage your clients. Take your coaching online and deliver an experience like nothing your clients have ever seen before. With fitness, nutrition, and habit-coaching features, plus in-app messaging, groups, progress tracking, and more — it's everything you need to motivate and inspire. 
 

By combining both a trainer and a client-side experience, ABC Trainerize allows fitness professionals to manage clients, and their coaching business from their smartphones anytime, anywhere. 

At the same time, ABC Trainerize helps individuals achieve their fitness goals by keeping them engaged with their coach. This way they stay committed to their program through customized training plans, daily to-dos, and progress reports. 

 
 

WHO CAN USE THE APP: 

ABC Trainerize is for both fitness professionals and their clients. A fitness professional needs to create an account before they can invite their clients to access the app. Clients can only use ABC Trainerize if they are working with a fitness professional or business that uses ABC Trainerize. 

 

FEATURES FOR FITNESS PROFESSIONALS: 

- Customize and deliver training plans with live or on-demand workouts, classes, and exercises. 

- Manage client calendars, check-ins, and current workouts. 

- Offer meal plans, recipes, and nutrition coaching within the app. 

- Create and plan client workouts on the fly. 

- Monitor and track client progress seamlessly. 

- Instantly message clients in real-time and set up client groups and challenges. 

- Extend your business and services by connecting with add-ons like Glofox, Mindbody, Zapier, and YouTube. 

 
 

FEATURES FOR CLIENTS: 

- Access and follow online training plans, tracking your workouts seamlessly. 

- Easily track your food intake with the built-in food calorie tracker. 

- Plan your daily meals and discover new recipes. 

- Engage in real-time messaging with your coach and take part in groups and challenges. 

- Keep tabs on body stats and monitor progress in one place. 

- Work towards your health and fitness goals and stay motivated through streaks and app badges. 

- Receive app reminders for scheduled workouts and activities. 

- Seamlessly integrate with apps, wearables and smart devices (Apple Health, Apple Watch, Fitbit, Withings, Garmin etc.) to sync daily stats such as steps, sleep, activity, weight and heart rate. 

 

IMPORTANT NOTE: This app is a companion app for businesses that use ABC Trainerize. An online account is required. If you're a client, ask your trainer for your account details so you can login to this app. For more information visit our website.
