apps.title: Heart Analyzer: Pulse Tracker
apps.description:
Heart Analyzer offers users the ultimate insight into their Health data.

Utilising the rich data recorded by Apple Watch, Heart Analyzer gives you a powerful understanding of your heart vitals.

------------------------------------------------
■ Simple PRIVACY
------------------------------------------------
◎ No third party analytics
◎ No data ever leaves your device
◎ No modifications to your health data

------------------------------------------------
■ FEATURES
------------------------------------------------
◎ The Dashboard - Where you can swipe between days, scroll through summaries and tap into the details
◎ Charts - Heart Rate and other Health data visualized through metrics and trends of any given day 
◎ Insights - Effortlessly assess your Health Vital trends
◎ Analytics Plus - Gain a unique understanding of important metrics such as Cardio Recovery, Heart Rate Zones and plenty more
◎ Heart Reports - Generate and export tailored PDFs including a large selection of metrics with custom timescales and password protection support
◎ Bookmarks - Highlight specific days of interest, make notes on relevant details
◎ Widgets - Interact with your Home Screen and track your Heart Rate, Resting Heart Rate trends and more at a glance 
◎ ECGs - Compare and analyze data recorded by Apple Watch
◎ Advanced features - Including HRV rMSSD, Heart Rate Calibration, Custom Heart Rate Zones, Smart Heart Rate Recovery and more

------------------------------------------------
■ APPLE WATCH
------------------------------------------------
◎ A re-designed app showing your Heart Rate over the day
◎ Charts with you on the go for Move, Exercise, Cardio Points, HRV, Blood Oxygen Saturation and Resting Heart Rate
◎ Workouts right on your wrist, tap into the detail as soon as you finish your exercise
◎ Customizable complications to keep you up to date with your Heart Rate and also support for Blood Oxygen Saturation, Heart Rate Variability and Resting Heart Rate trends


HEALTH SUPPORT INCLUDES:
• Heart Rate
• Resting Heart Rate
• Blood Pressure (Systolic & Diastolic)
• Electrocardiogram (ECG/EKG)
• Blood Oxygen Saturation (SPO2)
• Cardio Fitness (VO2Max)
• Heart Rate Variability (SDNN & rMSSD)
• Respiratory Rate
• Breathing Disturbances
• Workouts
• Sleep Times
• Heart Rate Recovery
• Apple Fitness & Activity
• Heart Alert Notifications

Heart Analyzer has three Premium purchases or combine them all with the Complete Premium purchase. Heart Analyzer does not contain any subscriptions!

Please Note:
• Heart Analyzer integrates with the Apple Health App to read your Heart Rate and other Health data
• Heart Analyzer is available on iPad with iCloud sync for Apple Health data enabled. However, you still need an iPhone with a paired Apple Watch to generate Health data to display in Heart Analyzer
• To get the most out of Heart Analyzer, an iPhone with a paired Apple Watch is required

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This update build upon our recent major update to Heart Analyzer Version 12!

V12.1 adds two major new features:
◎ Live HR comes to iPhone with compatible monitors such as AirPods Pro 3, just launch the app and see your Live Heart Rate update!
◎ A new sync feature re-enables Blood Oxygen Saturation tracking on select Apple Watch models purchased in the USA

Version 12 introduced:
◎ A delightful new design incorporating Liquid Glass with a focus on clarity and detail across charts and metrics
◎ A new app architecture maximizing performance across the app
◎ New Heart Reports for individual days showcasing all vital data
◎ You can now take notes in your Bookmarks
◎ New charts help you get an overview of your longer term Health data
◎ The Apple Watch app includes performance improvements and design updates
◎ Customizable Complications come to your Apple Watch face with Heart Analyzer

Thank you so much to all our tester who helped make this update the fantastic one that it is.
Please review the app & leave a rating if you get chance!

• To get the most out of Heart Analyzer, an iPhone with a paired Apple Watch is required

Welcome to our Blood Pressure Recorder App! With the help of the latest technology and intelligent algorithms, we provide you with a powerful and easy-to-operate application to help you comprehensively manage and monitor your blood pressure, keeping your health in your hands at all times.

Why choose our blood pressure recorder App?
Data analysis: Our App has intelligent data analysis functions, which can convert your blood pressure data into visual reports and charts, helping you better understand the changing trend and make targeted adjustments.

EagleForce's MIMI-Rx application is for patient engagement, which can help patients to keep track of their medications and immunizations at anytime. Patients can also use this app to see their medical records and history, as well as setting up reminders for themselves about their own health. This app supports Healthkit.

apps.title: Daily Health - Healthy Routine
apps.description:
Daily Health is your ultimate digital partner for achieving and maintaining optimal health and wellness. This innovative app integrates advanced technology with user-friendly features to offer a holistic approach to health management.

Health Disclaimer:
· For any health-related questions or concerns, consulting with a licensed healthcare provider is always advised prior to making health decisions or following any recommendations.
· This app is designed to enhance health consciousness and provide stress reduction solutions.
· It's essential to refrain from using this app for the diagnosis, prevention, or treatment of health issues. The application is not intended to substitute for specialized medical devices or the expertise of healthcare professionals.
· Please be aware that the scope of this app is limited to measuring heart rate, and it does not include capabilities for tracking blood pressure or oxygen saturation levels.


Heart Rate Measurement Guidelines:
· Ensure a quiet and comfortable setting.
· Place your fingertip gently over your device's camera lens, covering it completely.
· Stay still and relaxed during the measurement to ensure accuracy.

Key Features:
· Heart Health Insights: Our cutting-edge heart health assessments and tests provide you with crucial information about your cardiovascular well-being, allowing you to make informed decisions about your lifestyle.
· Comprehensive Health Evaluations: Dive deep into your health status with our extensive health tests. Gain access to personalized recipe plans tailored to your nutritional needs, alongside actionable health tips and enlightening articles. Immerse yourself in soothing white noise to enhance your relaxation and focus.
· Nutrition and Wellness Plans: Dive deep into your health status with our extensive health tests. Gain access to personalized recipe plans tailored to your nutritional needs, alongside actionable health tips and enlightening articles. Immerse yourself in soothing white noise to enhance your relaxation and focus.
· Self-Care Routines: Cultivate healthy habits with our dedicated self-care module. Encourage daily practices that enhance your physical and mental well-being, ensuring you give yourself the care you deserve.
· In-Depth Health Reporting: Keep track of your vital signs with precision. Our platform allows for meticulous monitoring of heart rate, blood pressure, blood oxygen levels, blood sugar, body temperature, and weight. These insights are instrumental in managing your health proactively.
· AI-Powered Health Advisor: Leverage the expertise of our AI health advisor, which provides personalized recommendations and advice based on your health data. This intelligent system is your 24/7 health coach, guiding you towards optimal healt
· Health Widgets: Enhance your daily health management with our convenient health widgets. These tools are designed to seamlessly integrate into your lifestyle, providing you with easy access to your health metrics and progress updates.

Subscription Plans:
Weekly, Monthly, or Yearly Options
· Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account once the purchase has been verified.
· Post-purchase, you can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by accessing your Account Settings.
· Unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period, your subscription will renew automatically.

Daily Health invites you to embark on a transformative journey towards enhanced health and happiness. With a blend of cutting-edge features and personalized health insights, this app is your all-encompassing guide to a vibrant, healthier life. Join us and unlock your path to wellness.

Privacy Policy:https://www.joysmoremobile.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: Cedars-Sinai
apps.description:
Cedars-Sinai is the standard for excellence in care. Those values extend to our mobile app. With our app, patients can connect with their care team, manage their medical records and track their health progress. U.S. News & World Report ranks Cedars-Sinai among the best hospitals in the nation. 

App Features

Stay Connected  
Communicate with your doctor, check lab results, schedule appointments, track your medical records and more. Connect your account to Apple Health to pull health-related data from your personal devices right into My CS-Link.

Find a Doctor  
Find the doctor who can treat your medical needs based on specialty, condition or location, or just search by their name.

Location Information  
Get directions to the nearest Cedars-Sinai urgent care, hospital or medical office. Looking for a bite to eat at the hospital? The app can help with that, too.
 
Urgent Care Save My Spot 
With Save My Spot, simply choose the location and time you want to come to an urgent care. Saving your spot in line helps minimize your wait time upon arrival. If the Save My Spot times are taken for the day, you can still walk in and be seen during business hours. 
(Note: Please be aware that clinical needs are evaluated on a walk-in basis, so your reserved spot in line may change depending on the urgent medical severity of others. Wait times listed online are estimates and subject to change.)  

Apple Health Connectivity  
Using your My CS-Link account, you can download your medical record to Apple Health and take it with you wherever you go. When you connect your My CS-Link account to Apple Health, you can add information to your medical record like steps, blood pleasure, glucose levels and BMI.
 
Walking Directions  
Getting around the Cedars-Sinai Medical Center just got easier. Our new Walking Directions feature allows you to get turn-by-turn directions to nearly  400 points of interest. You can also mark your parking spot.

Schedule an Appointment 
Our updated appointment scheduling just got easier. With My CS-Link, you can schedule an appointment with a provider you’ve seen before.

Contact Us  
The Cedars-Sinai app provides contact information for our departments and services. Cedars-Sinai is available to take your call 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to help with your health needs, billing questions and more. 

If you do not already have a My CS-Link account, please go to https://www.cedars-sinai.org/mycslink.html

raw_data.releaseNotes:
The latest release of the Cedars-Sinai app includes the following features:

Minor performance updates.

Love the app? Please leave us a review in the App Store.

apps.title: HealthCues App
apps.description: HealthCues is a cutting-edge preventative healthcare platform designed to empower employees with personalized and accessible benefits through a single app. Upon joining, members complete a health assessment that tailors the app’s experience to their specific needs. From managing physical health with $0 copay telemedicine and mental wellness support to offering DNA testing and hundreds of free medications, HealthCues makes staying healthy easier than ever. Additional benefits include virtual veterinarian services for pets, credit counseling, and tax advice. The app’s intuitive interface ensures employees stay engaged and informed, promoting healthier lifestyles and smarter healthcare choices. HealthCues transforms healthcare from reactive to proactive, keeping employees healthier, happier, and more productive.

apps.title: ALYKA: Heart Health Advisor
apps.description:
ALYKA is your personal health assistant for a stronger Heart and Mind!

Created by Doctors trained at the Best Schools to help you:

UNDERSTAND YOUR HEALTH DATA WITH INSIGHTFUL LEARNINGS.
ALYKA Health integrates data from your responses to questions and surveys, your Electronic Health Record and home health devices. Now easily review your essential health data with insightful multi-media learnings in one place!

RECEIVE PERSONALIZED HEALTH REPORTS AND SCORES.
Are you Resilient? Let’s find out through your health knowledge and confidence. Get your own Wellness Report that breaks down your health across six different dimensions with opportunities to improve across each. Calculate your Heart Risk score to estimate your 10 year risk of heart disease.

CREATE A SIMPLE AND EFFECTIVE PERSONAL HEALTH PLAN.
Several factors influence cardiovascular and mental health, including your overall sense of wellbeing, eating habits, physical activity, everyday stress, sleep patterns, tobacco and alcohol. ALYKA will improve each of these areas, lower your risk for heart disease and place you in the mental position to perform at your optimal YOU!

SET CUSTOMIZED GOALS WITH REMINDERS TO BUILD HEALTHIER HABITS.
With ALYKA you will gain knowledge and now empowered to set goals to improve areas of concern found in your Wellness Report.

GET REMINDERS FOR HEALTH TESTS AND SCREENINGS.
Your personal health assistant at your side to provide weekly check-ins for monitoring important vital signs as well as health screenings, tests and immunizations.


BUILD YOUR CARE TEAM AND MANAGE IT IN ONE PLACE.
Organize your entire care team from primary care, specialists, pharmacy, labs and imaging centers within ALYKA so you can make your calls or get directions in one place.

Strengthen your Heart and Mind with ALYKA Health!

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
ALYKA Health is free to download. We offer monthly and annual auto-renewing subscription options. Payment will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

ALYKA Health is provided for educational and informational purposes only and does NOT constitute providing medical advice, diagnosis, treatment, or professional services. Individuals should contact their healthcare provider with any questions related to their health needs.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:

Streamlined background event handling for smoother performance.
Applied minor UI improvements for a cleaner experience.

apps.title: Fidelity Health®
apps.description:
Easily manage your health care benefit plans and expenses.

The Fidelity Health® app was built to help you minimize the time, cost, and hassle of managing your health care needs. It can help you manage your benefit plans and accounts if you’re enrolled in an employer-sponsored health benefits plan through Fidelity or if you have a Fidelity Health Savings Account (HSA).

With Fidelity Health, you can:

Access key info about your coverage and benefits
· See all your health plan coverage and benefit details
· Save and share pictures of your health benefit, prescription, and vaccination ID cards for easy access anywhere

Manage your health care expenses
· See your Fidelity HSA balances and transaction history, or balances for certain flexible spending accounts (FSAs)
· Reimburse yourself from your Fidelity HSA or FSAs for qualified medical expenses you paid out-of-pocket
· Pay your providers directly from your Fidelity HSA, brokerage or cash management accounts, FSAs, or personal bank accounts
· Scan a bill, so it’s easier to pay for health care expenses using your Fidelity HSA, brokerage, or cash management accounts
· Take advantage of your Fidelity HSA on the go by making one-time, tax-deductible contributions from your Fidelity brokerage or cash management accounts, or linked bank accounts
· Upload and save receipts for health care expenses 
· Link an external bank account to your Fidelity HSA in real time so you can make a one-time contribution
· Track activity across your accounts, including the status of payments, reimbursements, contributions, and other activity
· Activate and set your initial PIN on your HSA or Health & Benefits debit cards

Navigate your day-to-day health care needs
· If enabled by your employer, search for in-network medical providers close to your location
· Scan a product’s barcode to help find out if it’s a qualified medical expense for your Fidelity HSA or FSAs

The Fidelity Health app is available to people who enroll in their employer-sponsored health benefits through Fidelity or have an HSA with Fidelity. The features and functionality will vary based on the relationship between you, your employer (if applicable), and Fidelity. You can use your current Fidelity NetBenefits® or Fidelity.com login information to access Fidelity Health. Fidelity Health and the Fidelity Health logo are registered service marks of FMR LLC. Images are for illustrative purposes only.

Fidelity Brokerage Services LLC, Member NYSE, SIPC

apps.title: Youper: AI Mental Health
apps.description:
Youper is your Emotional Health Assistant—an AI designed to help you feel better. It guides you through science-backed conversations and exercises to reduce stress, feel calmer, boost your mood, and build healthier relationships.

Trusted by over 3 million users, more than 80% report that Youper has helped them manage their mental health.

Youper has been featured in leading media outlets, including Health, Elle, Forbes, Yahoo!, Cosmopolitan, Bloomberg, and more.

YOUPER AI PRINCIPLES

Safety First
Youper was programmed to never engage in interactions that might harm our users or others. Safety is our most important principle.

Empower Humans
Youper is designed to improve human relationships, not replace them. The name ‘Youper’ is a blend of ‘you’ and ‘super,’ reflecting our commitment to empower you.

Protect Privacy
All chats with Youper are private, secure, and not shared with anyone. We will never sell or share users' data for advertising or marketing purposes.

Guided by Science
Our team, led by renowned psychiatrist Dr. Jose Hamilton, developed Youper based on the best research in the mental health field to provide you with scientifically validated solutions.

TERMS

apps.title: Health Mate: Life&Heart Health
apps.description:
Live a healthy and happy life with Health Mate!

Monitor heart rate is a major key to overall health. Take daily measurements to track your history by placing your finger on the camera. This powerful heart health app will help you relax and lower heart risk factors. Start now and take all uncertainty out of your health!

With Health Mate, you can check your pulse, log your blood pressure diary, learn knowledge about health, control your stress level and stay healthy.

How to use it?
Make sure your fingers are not wet or too cold. Be sure your fingertip fully covers the lens and flashlight. Hold your phone and keep it steady until the measurement ends. Remember press too hard to influence accuracy. Don't forget to grant access to the camera.

Why choose Health Mate:
1. Monitor your cardio health.
2. Detect your heart rate in different states.
3. Analyze your stress, recovery and energy level.
4. Generate time period health reports and easily consult with professionals.

The Main Advantages of the App:
- Measure your heart rate with your phone's camera.
- Track HRV& all your measurements history.
- Use the diary to monitor your blood pressure and blood oxygen.
- Gain daily insights about cardio and control heart health risks.
- Receive reminders to develop healthy habits.
- To better understand yourself with mental health tests.
- Follow dash diet recipes to stay fit.
- Read useful healthy articles to take care of health.

Disclaimer
- The app is NOT designed for medical use. It is meant only for fitness use and as a source of general health information.
- The app is not intended to diagnose, prevent or treat any condition, or to be a substitute for a medical tool.
- The app can only measure heart rate, but not blood pressure or blood oxygen level.
- Please always consult your doctor if you have a health issue or are concerned about your heart condition.

Subscribe to get unlimited access to all features

-monthly
-yearly

- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase.
- Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Terms of Service: https://www.robentadigital.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.robentadigital.com/privacy-policy

apps.title: Mayo Clinic
apps.description:
The Mayo Clinic app connects you to the No. 1 hospital in the nation, as ranked by U.S. News & World Report*.
 
The Mayo Clinic app gives you practical, helpful tools to manage your health on the go. Your care journey is now more seamless, secure, and accessible. Track your health information, schedule appointments, and complete check-in questionnaires at your convenience. You'll get easy access to your appointment itinerary, important reminders, campus maps, and medical records.
 
Receive your daily dose of health news and advice from top doctors, dietitians, fitness experts, and more. You can also search for reliable, research-backed answers to your questions about diseases, symptoms, and health procedures. Plus, you can request an appointment with world-class experts in top-ranked specialties.
 
Favorite features:
•	Make appointments at your convenience.
•	Check your appointment itinerary.
•	View test results.
•	View radiology images and exams.
•	Access and pay your bills.
•	Communicate with your care team in a secure messaging system.
•	Get Express Care Online within an hour for common ailments that don't require an in-person visit (available in select regions).
•	Send your health data from Mayo Clinic to the Apple Health app.
•	Daily health insights, fitness videos, recipes, and wellness tips.

* Mayo Clinic, Rochester, Minnesota

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes

apps.title: Livongo
apps.description:
If you are eligible for Livongo services, we make it easy to be healthy. Our tools, support, and guidance help you understand and manage chronic conditions like diabetes and high blood pressure while adopting the nutrition, exercise, and other lifestyle habits proven to help you live a healthier life.

The Livongo app works with the Livongo Blood Glucose Meter, Livongo Blood Pressure Monitor, and Livongo Scale to give you a more detailed picture of your overall health.

SEE ALL YOUR DATA IN ONE PLACE
Record every blood sugar, blood pressure, and weight reading, as well as daily steps counts, and view them all from one place in the app. You can gather insights, learn, and adapt your routine.

CREATE A CUSTOM ACTION PLAN
When you create an action plan, you’ll set your goals, and we’ll suggest activities specifically designed to help you reach them.

GET A LITTLE NUDGE AT JUST THE RIGHT TIME
Well-timed reminders can make a big difference. We’ll guide you to a healthier lifestyle with recipes, articles, tools, and more.

CONNECT WITH APPLE HEALTH
Sync with Apple Health to further customize your Livongo experience. You’ll be able to import your Apple Health lab results and export your Livongo blood sugar data to Apple Health.

MESSAGE A COACH
Reach out to our expert coaches anytime. They can help you with healthy eating, activity, stress, medications, and more.

LOG YOUR FOOD
Track what you eat to help you build awareness, spot patterns, and stay accountable to your goals.

UNDERSTAND YOUR PATTERNS AND TRENDS
Our simple, easy-to-understand charts and summaries provide you with all the information you need to make the right choices to improve your health.

GET REAL-TIME FEEDBACK AND GUIDANCE
Personalized insights after every reading help you learn and improve. Our healthy tips and advice are always available.

ORDER TEST STRIPS WITH ONE TAP
We provide UNLIMITED strips and lancets sent to your door at no cost to you so that you never have unnecessary hiccups in your checking routine.

Livongo integrates with Apple Health, so you can import fitness and lab results data from Apple Health to Livongo and export blood sugar data from Livongo to Apple Health.

ABOUT LIVONGO
Livongo has a vision of empowering all people with chronic conditions to live better and healthier lives. Livongo is now a part of Teladoc Health.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Condition Management Updates:

Members in Diabetes Management, Hypertension Management, Weight Management, and Diabetes Prevention programs can now access Core Engagement Loops, featuring personalized goals, daily activities, and gamified rewards like badges and streaks. This update replaces Action Plans and the Health Journey Launchpad with a more engaging experience to help you build healthy habits through daily tasks and progress tracking.

apps.title: Dario Health
apps.description:
SMART THINGS COME IN SMALL PACKAGES


Dario makes monitoring blood glucose easy thanks to the small size of its medical device. The Dario Blood Glucose Monitoring System combines the meter, lancet, and a pack of 25 test strips in a unit so small, it can fit in your pocket. This makes it easy to keep with you, whether at home or on the go. With Dario, checking your blood glucose is quick, easy, and discreet, one drop at a time. It’s an all-in-one diabetes tracker.
 
NOW SUPPORTING BLOOD PRESSURE

Dario is more than just a diabetes tracker for monitoring blood glucose. The app also pairs with the Dario Blood Pressure Monitoring System to record and store blood pressure measurements in the same logbook where you track blood glucose. This gives you a more complete perspective of your health. Track these two medical conditions together to learn more about your health for better conversations with your doctor, and to help you live better every day.

WHAT MAKES DARIO DIFFERENT?

Dario was designed with convenience in mind, to make it easier to see your medical trends and help build healthy new habits according to your results. With insights gained through the Dario app, you may learn which foods and activities lead to better results. You may see how following a treatment plan improves your blood pressure results. Getting this positive reinforcement in real-time can be a powerful motivator! One drop is all it takes to see where you stand with this innovative diabetes tracker.
 
KEEP YOUR DOCTOR & LOVED ONES IN THE LOOP

Keep your medical care providers and family members up to date on your diabetic measurements. You can share all the data and logbooks inside the Dario application with anyone you like. Simply tap the share icon and select a contact from your address book to share your data instantly.
 
COUNT CARBS & TRACK ACTIVITY

Any diabetic knows how challenging it can be to keep track of carbohydrate intake. Dario does the math for you. Simply tag which foods you ate, and Dario will automatically calculate how many carbs that gave you. With time, you may even start spotting patterns between the foods you’ve eaten and your blood glucose results and learn how to choose foods that your body responds to better. The same goes for activity. With Dario, you can keep track of your daily exercise (even washing the dishes!) and see if it influences your blood glucose levels. The results of this diabetes tracker may surprise you!
 
HOW ACCURATE IS DARIO?

Dario has been tested extensively to ensure it meets FDA guidance for accuracy, that 95% of measurements are within ±15% of a true lab-tested value. This means you can be assured that the Dario meter will provide results you can trust. Dario has also presented several studies to the ADA, demonstrating how its system can help improve life for people living with diabetes.
 
HYPO ALERT SYSTEM WITH GPS LOCATOR

Hypo alerts may save your life! If you have diabetes and have suffered from hypo events in the past, or have a child with diabetes, Dario's hypo alert system with GPS location can help bring you peace of mind. Simply connect the Dario meter to your smartphone, and upon recording a dangerously low glucose reading in one drop of blood, the Dario app will prepare a complete text message, including current blood glucose level and GPS location, to send to up to 4 emergency contacts. Because when a hypo strikes, time is of the essence. And you may not feel well enough to describe your situation. Dario is here to keep you safe.


The information provided is not intended to be used for medical diagnosis or treatment or as a substitute for professional medical advice. Please consult your physician or qualified health provider regarding your condition and appropriate medical treatment. Individual symptoms, situations, and circumstances may vary.

 Dario integrates with the Apple HeatlhKit, so your exercise, nutrition, and health data are recorded in one easy-to-access location.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We've made exciting enhancements to your profile experience, making the app smoother, faster, and more intuitive. This update ensures effortless navigation and better health management with improved data protection.


Your feedback helps us grow, and we appreciate your support!

Take control of your health with Welle.

Welle looks at your health as a whole—not just data points. Unlike traditional reactive medicine, Welle is a proactive telehealth platform designed to optimize your longevity.

With advanced diagnostics, an evolving action plan, adaptive nutraceuticals, and tailored therapeutics, Welle helps you live healthier, happier, and longer.

HealthTunes is a scientifically backed platform that uses music to improve your physical and mental well-being. Whether you’re managing stress, enhancing focus, or addressing conditions like anxiety, pain, or sleep disturbances, HealthTunes provides personalized music therapies tailored to your needs.

Our app offers curated playlists for relaxation, meditation, and recovery, designed by leading experts in neuroscience and sound therapy. Experience the power of sound to strengthen your vagus nerve, reduce stress, and boost overall wellness.

Custom playlists for relaxation, focus, and healing.

apps.title: NorthShoreConnect
apps.description:
NorthShoreConnect makes it easier than ever to take charge of your health care, simplifying how you communicate with your care team, schedule in-person or virtual visits and access your medical records. NorthShoreConnect is available to our patients, with the latest features. 

The app provides you with these features:

• Schedule or manage appointments with physicians and other healthcare providers
• Find urgent care, hospital and clinic locations
• Book a virtual video visit
• View your medical records and lab results
• Find a physician
• Send a secure message to your physician
• Request prescription refills
• Receive text and e-mail alerts with appointment reminders and completed test results
• Access your COVID-19 digital vaccination card and proof of other vaccinations
• Check in for appointments
• Pay bills
• Manage multiple accounts for your entire family 
• HealthKit enables you to log your health and activity in Track My Health

apps.title: My Health Planner
apps.description:
My Health Planner helps connect you with your care team right on your iPhone or iPad. You can send a private message at any time to your care team — it's as easy as texting, but more secure. Your care team can help you feel in control of your health and ensure you understand what you need to do to feel your best.

Keep in touch with our care management team — in between appointments. Set reminders to help remember your medications, and track your steps and progress over time. We take your privacy and security seriously and My Health Planner is fully HIPAA compliant.

My Health Planner is free for eligible members as part of your benefits — just sign up with the access code you received from your care team. You will need your insurance card as well.
If you have questions or need help signing up, please call the number on the back of your member ID card.

Who can use this app:

- If you are a member of BlueCross BlueShield of South Carolina, BlueChoice Health Plan or the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Service Benefit Plan, also known as the Federal Employee Program (FEP ® )) this app is for you.

- If you are a member of a different BlueCross plan, this app may be included. Just check the back of your insurance card to see if “My Health Toolkit” is part of your health plan’s website.

- This app supports all medical and dental benefit plans administered by BlueCross BlueShield of South Carolina and BlueChoice Health Plan. This app also supports some large employer plans administered on behalf of Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Florida, CareFirst BlueCross BlueShield, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Kansas, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Kansas City, Excellus BlueCross BlueShield, BlueCross BlueShield of Western New York, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Louisiana, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina, BlueCross & BlueShield of Rhode Island, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Vermont, Capital Blue Cross and BlueCross BlueShield of Tennessee. Each of these Blue Plans is an independent licensee of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association.

The app supports most of our members, but will not work for:
Medicaid members

My Health Planner works with Apple Health for certain care programs, such as those that provide a step count task.

Seek a doctor’s advice before making any medical decisions. This app is designed for education and to provide support between provider visits. If you're enrolled in an eligible care program you may connect a glucometer to share readings with your care management team, but should continue to check with your doctor before making any changes to diet, exercise, or treatment plan.

apps.description:
PLEASE NOTE: Low Carb Program is free to download and requires an active subscription/referral to use app features.

The Low Carb Program is a multi award-winning, evidence-based behaviour change platform for people with type 2 diabetes, prediabetes and obesity. Benefits of a low carb diet include lower blood glucose levels, less dependence on medication and improved cholesterol levels.

Join the community and get the tools you need to succeed:

* Award-winning education on therapeutic nutrition and wellbeing, starting with a 16-module structured programme tailored to you.
* Support from Behaviour Change Mentors to keep you motivated and accountable
* 24/7 support from 390,000 people in the support community
* Personalised resources, including daily meal plans tailored to your health and dietary preferences
* Daily updated guides, recipes and motivational support
* Integrated food diary and barcode scanner
* Track your health to visualise your progress - you can now sync with Apple Health, FitBit, and Nokia 

Let your Program Mentor walk you through a program of achievable, sustainable lifestyle changes that can improve your health. Over 1,800,000 kilograms of weight lost and counting! 

The platform's global impact has featured in Forbes, BBC, ITV, Daily Mail, Sky News, The Times, The Sunday Times and The Telegraph. 

LEARN LOW CARB: Learn the ins and outs of a low-carb lifestyle and how it helps manage weight, blood glucose, and reduce risks of complications. Enjoy multi-award winning education, starting with a 16-module program developed with the world's leading experts including Dr David Unwin and Dr Kesar Sadhra. 

APPLY LOW CARB: Action Points at the end of lessons so you know exactly how to progress.

LOW CARB SUPPORT: Ask your low carb questions to a community of people just like you; or ask your Behaviour Change Mentor.

MAKE LOW CARB A LIFESTYLE: Lifestyle keeps you up to date with the latest low carb news, interviews, recipes, meal plans, research and success stories. A constantly evolving, ever expanding, online magazine.

IN YOUR OWN TIME: Thousands of people have placed type 2 diabetes into remission with the Low Carb Program. However, it’s not enough on its own. Real change requires practice. It's up to you to apply what you learn in the program. 

AI OPTIMISED: Everything you see and experience is personalised to you; right down to your food likes, food dislikes, allergies, other conditions, culture and budget. We're constantly learning from the footprints of over 390,000 members - we call it health intelligence.

CONNECT: Connect your app to the Apple Health app to sync your data. Sync your blood glucose, insulin, medications and more.

TESTIMONIALS:

"I lost 50kg and no longer have type 2 diabetes" - Mark 

"There's lots of support and backup… it feels like you're not alone." - Mandy

"My HBA1C reduced from 77, to 55 after 3 months and 33 now after 6 months. As a result, I eased off 3 x 500mg of metformin a day to now no medication." – Peter

"My HBA1C has dropped by 3 points and my average blood glucose has dropped from around 9 to 5.6. I’ve lost nearly 2 stone and feel so much better for it!" – Andrew

Terms of use: https://www.lowcarbprogram.com/terms
Privacy philosophy: https://www.lowcarbprogram.com/privacy
Billing terms: https://www.lowcarbprogram.com/billing

Payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. All payments made through iTunes are controlled and managed by Apple. Manage your subscriptions and auto-renewals in your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

raw_data.releaseNotes: We're always trying to improve your experience. Update to the latest version to make the most of the Low Carb Program application!

apps.title: Ambetter Health
apps.description:
Manage your healthcare benefits on the go with the Ambetter Health mobile app.† Sign in to your current account or create a new account to easily and securely access the information you need.

•	View, save, and share ID card
•	Find care: View current primary care provider (PCP); Search for in-network doctors, specialists, hospitals, and clinics near you
•	Pay premium and view payment history
•	Get answers to your questions: View FAQs; Contact member support
•	View covered services and benefits usage, including deductible and maximum out-of-pocket amounts



† Ambetter Health is the brand name used for products and services provided by one or more of the wholly owned subsidiaries of Centene Corporation, who are Qualified Health Plan issuers in the states indicated at ambetterhealthAmbetterHealth.com. Health benefits and health insurance plans contain exclusions and limitations. ©2024 Centene Corporation, centene.com. All rights reserved. For information on your right to receive an Ambetter Health plan free of discrimination, or your right to receive language, auditory and/or visual assistance services, please visit ambetterhealth.com and scroll to the bottom of the page.

raw_data.releaseNotes: This version includes improvements to account registration and bug fixes.

apps.title: MorDee -  หมอดี
apps.description:
ให้การหาหมอเป็นเรื่องง่ายและดีกว่าที่เคย 
ด้วยแอปฯ MorDee – หมอดี หมอประจำบ้านในมือคุณ

ให้คุณสบายใจ พบหมอออนไลน์ได้ทุกที่ ทุกเวลา
รักษา เคลมประกัน ได้ในแอปฯ เดียว



- พบหมอได้ 500+ คน จาก 20+ สาขา พร้อมคลินิกเฉพาะทาง



- วิดีโอคอล โทร หรือแชต กับหมอได้ ในวันและเวลาที่สะดวก



- เคลมประกันผ่านแอปฯ ได้ ไม่ต้องสำรองจ่าย เมื่อผูกสิทธิ์ประกัน OPD จากบริษัทที่เป็นพาร์ทเนอร์



ดูแลได้ครบทั้งสุขภาพกายและสุขภาพใจ ด้วยบริการให้คำปรึกษาทางการแพทย์ที่หลากหลาย และครอบคลุม



- เด็ก
- สุขภาพสตรี
- ผิวหนัง ชะลอวัย
- สุขภาพใจ
- อายุรกรรม
- โรคทั่วไป
- หู คอ จมูก
- LGBTQ
- ออฟฟิศซินโดรม
- ศัลยกรรม
- เภสัชกรรม
- มะเร็ง
- กระดูกและข้อ
- แพทย์แผนจีน
- แพทย์แผนไทย
- ตา
- ทันตกรรม
- โภชนาการ
- ฯลฯ



สามารถเลือกปรึกษาแพทย์และผู้เชี่ยวชาญของเรา ตามวันและเวลาที่สะดวกได้ด้วยตัวคุณเอง การใช้งานง่ายและเป็นส่วนตัว ด้วยการสนทนาแบบรายบุคคล และสามารถชำระค่าบริการผ่านระบบออนไลน์หรือเคลมค่ารักษาพยาบาลกับพาร์ทเนอร์ของเราได้อย่างสะดวกและปลอดภัย



#หมอดี #MorDee #หมอประจำบ้านในมือคุณ #TrueHEALTH

raw_data.releaseNotes:
พบหมอออนไลน์ง่ายๆ ไม่ต้องรอนาน สะดวกกว่าเดิม ผ่านแอปฯ หมอดี (MorDee) พร้อมเคลมประกันสุขภาพได้ ไม่ต้องสำรองจ่าย*

- ปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพ
- บริการฉีดวัคซีนถึงบ้าน Home Vaccination
- เลือกช่องทางพูดคุยได้ทั้ง โทร แชท และวีดีโอคอล
- เคลมประกันได้ พร้อมรับสิทธิพิเศษได้มากขึ้น
- เลือกวัน เวลา เองได้ พบหมอเมื่อสะดวก ไม่ต้องรอนาน
- เลือกพบหมอได้ 500+ คน จาก 20+ สาขาเฉพาะทาง

สอบถามเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ Line OA: @mordeeapp

apps.title: Health Widget: My FitWidget
apps.description:
FitWidget: My Activity Tracker: Your Ultimate Wellness Companion.

Looking for a smarter way to monitor your health and fitness? Track your walking, running, sleep, breathing, blood oxygen, Stress tracking, HRV, and more with accurate Apple Health data presented beautifully in widgets and the main app. Stay motivated, reach your daily goals, and live a healthier life with Heart Points and other innovative features.

WHAT IS INSIDE THE APP
Heart points, Steps, Workouts, Calories burned, Distance, Floors climbed, Heart rate, Blood oxygen, Breathing, Weight tracker, Water tracker, Sleep, HRV, Store Medical files, and Blood glucose.   

Widgets:
25 Health-focused Colorful Home Screen widgets.
20 Health-focused Lock Screen widgets.
20+ Health-focused Apple Watch complications/widgets.
Live activity tracking: See real-time updates directly on your widgets.

Introducing Heart Points: Your Motivation to Move
Heart Points are designed to help you stay on track with the American Heart Association’s recommendations:
At least 150 minutes of moderate exercise (like brisk walking) per week
Or 75 minutes of vigorous activity (like running) per week

These activities reduce the risk of heart disease, improve sleep, and boost mental well-being. Heart Points make it easy and fun to monitor your progress and maintain a healthy lifestyle.


Main App
Track steps, workouts, calories burned, distance, and floors climbed.
Stay motivated with Heart Points, heart rate, and HRV (heart rate variability).
Start a walking/running session with a built-in speedometer.
Monitor sleep quality, blood oxygen levels, and overall health.
Keep track of your weight and stay hydrated with the water tracker and reminder.
Practice mindfulness with regular breathing exercises.
Visualize progress with the Activity Rings: Move, Stand, and Exercise.
Safely store medical files and vaccination certificates for easy access.

Apple Watch Integration
Track steps, Heart Points, sleep, heart rate, distance, and floors climbed directly on your Apple Watch.
Start and monitor workout sessions or check your speedometer in real-time.
Seamless syncing with your iPhone and Apple Watch.


Why Choose This App?
Whether you're walking, running, swimming, or climbing, this app provides accurate tracking to ensure you hit your fitness goals. With features like Heart Points and live widgets, it’s easier than ever to stay active and healthy.

Designed to provide a comprehensive overview of your fitness journey, this app is quickly growing in popularity thanks to its accurate Apple Health data representation and user-friendly design.

Note: FitWidget only reads data from your Apple Health app and never sends it anywhere else. Your data stays completely private on your device. To use the app, you'll need to grant access to the Health app.

To access all features, an In-App Purchase is required.

Start your journey toward a healthier life today!

Privacy Policy
https://www.fit-widget.com/#privacy

Terms of Use
https://www.fit-widget.com/#privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This is our regular update:
performance improvements and minor bug fixes.
